name: charles spiteri
text:
First impressions are everything! As a new patient, and waiting for this specific office to open to make it more convenient for my travels, my appointment (not-including) a cleaning was 3 hours long.  The staff needs to be proactive on informing their patients on the wait limits, if its extensive due to missing Docs, or absent staff members offer to reschedule, just don't let them sit there wondering what is happening and why they are waiting so long.
Let see how the next appointment goes before making a full judgment on this facility.

resp.text: Charles, I’m so sorry your experience did not go as expected. Our new patient appointments include x-rays and full comprehensive exam with the doctor and hygienist, to determine and discuss any treatment that may be needed. The office manager will review and provide a treatment estimate, discuss any payment plan options that are available and schedule follow up appointments. Please call me at (844) 296-0187 extension 201706,, so I can help address any further questions or concerns. — Dawn, ADMI

text: Service was amazing doctor was amazing staff was amazing my only complaint is when you check in they don't tell you that you're doing a consultation I was there to have my mother's tooth pulled and that was my goal I was in told this was a consultation and then I would have to reschedule it how do you tell an 84 year old with a broken tooth that they have to reschedule after a bit of prodding and kindness of a doctor and his staff they went ahead and did the extraction the same day but they do really need to tell people that at the beginning not at the end.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us so that we can continue to improve patient experiences. - Dawn, ADMI

name: Bonnie Buck
text:
Had an infected tooth that needed to be extracted after antibiotics.
Their  ad says 117 for extraction and x ray, exam and initial visit are free. I had a 3:15 apt and my doctor finally came in at 7:15. He went over exam and noted that I had an infection. He thought the tooth should be extracted. In order to get the tooth out, I would have to pay $381.00 and they would schedule another apt. to remove the tooth. I have no insurance and this was much more than discussed so I ask for an antibiotic until I could get the tooth out. I was told no, that doctors were handing out antibiotics like candy! I left the office in the same pain I went in with!

resp.text: Hi Bonnie, I'm really sorry that you didn't have a positive experience. If you would like to share more detail about your visit, I would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 844-296-0187 EXT 201152. - Julie, ADMI

text: I can honestly say that I have never felt more comfortable at a dentist office before. The staff was amazing and I cant wait to go back!

resp.text: I'm so glad the team helped you have a positive experience, Junebug. I hope you enjoy future visits just as much. - Emily, ADMI

name: Elaine W
text: Came in today as a new patient. Very pleased that I was able to get in three weeks ahead of when I had initially scheduled on the 28th, but not so pleased about the wait. I also liked how I was able to come in later rather than first thing in the morning. I read the other reviews before posting this and do not understand the last review about Mrs. Jessica having an awful attitude. She went above and beyond to make me comfortable with bringing me water, helping fill out paperwork on the Apple as I forgot my glasses, and even getting me a blanket once we were in the room as they keep it frigid inside. We had a lovely chat and she even let me show her pictures and made me feel at ease as I told her I have an awful fear of the dentist. I did not like when they took my xray as they kept jamming it into my mouth and the girl doing it seemed very annoyed and like she would rather be elsewhere. I heard her talking negative about other patients with another girl in scrubs while she was doing my xrays as well which makes me wonder what they said about me and my silly fears. She left me in the room for over an hour waiting for the dentist, and the girl at the front came and checked on me more than the xray girl in scrubs did. I enjoyed meeting with the hygienist I belive her name was Miranda as she explained everything I needed done and was very understanding about my fears. She even spoke to me about possibly numbing it before she did any work which definitely makes me feel like I found the right place. The dentist Dr. Ebby was very kind and had kind eyes. He seemed to genuinely care and made jokes to make me feel more at ease once we were in the room. I’m sure he has a nice smile but I couldn’t see with the mask on. He was definitely better than my last dentist who didn’t care about people of my age and only want money. He seemed to want to help me get what was best for me and not drain the little savings I have left. When i spoke about the money to man at the end named Austin he was an absolute sweetheart. I have never met someone so understanding and kind, and he even went out of his way to give me more adorable options and let me take up so much of his time just to make sure I would be able to afford what I need. He gave me his personal office number and told me to call him with any questions. I learned later from the front girl he was the office manager and I find it so refreshing that an office manager is willing to spend that much time with a woman like me to make sure I’m taken care of. The level of care I received was unbelievable and I truly feel like I found a place where I am cared for and taken care of financially and healthily. I would give 5 stars but I do not appreciate the rude xray girl and the wait was rather long.

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. Thank you for taking a moment to let us know about the experience you had during your visit. - Michelle, ADMI

name: Lynne Daly
text:
Absolutely wonderful dentist and staff. Could not have been more kind and compassionate. They were right on top of serious issues and I could not be more thrilled!!  They have a lifelong patient

My first review (above) still stands.  It is now months later and I have my final dentures. Dr. Abtin Iranmanesh is the consummate professional with a very big heart and compassionate  side. When I first net him, I had been the victim of extreme dental malpractice from another local so-called dental franchise. I was in dire shape. Dr. Iranmanesh 'took me under his wing' and today I am finished with my treatment plan, out of pain and have a beautiful smile. I could not be more pleased with my outcome. Many others in that office have been very kind and helpful as well. When I first started treatment at this office, it was brand new and barely established. I received a lot of personal attention and there was no issue getting the needed appointments. I do miss that part. Their popularity has grown along with the number of patients. That is a great thing for the business but not so for the patients unfortunately. I guess I was spoiled in the beginning.  However, Dr. Iranmanesh has always made sure I was well taken care of and given the best treatment available. I am very happy to say that this was a story with a happy ending.

resp.text: Lynne, thanks for taking the time to let us know, ! The office will be so happy to read this. — Dawn, ADMI

text: Words really cannot express my families love for this practice and Dr. Keller. They are amazing, worth any distance to ensure your kids are not terrified of the dentist but excited. Thank you Dr. Keller and Staff.

text: Best Pediatric Dentist in town!! I have been bringing my grandson here for years and he loves Dr. Keller. I would say he is a magician, but I will just say he is excellent at amusing the children to laughing to the point that they don’t know he did anything!

text: He engages the kids, is patient with them and his years of experience gets the procedure done fast and efficiently. My son still calls him the “funny” dentist and this momma is truly grateful he worked with us when we said we preferred not to have our three y.o undergo general anesthesia. Ive been to four “pediatric” dentists and Will take my kids to see Dr. Keller even if I have to drive an hour.

text: Dr. Michael Keller and his staff are, hands down, the best pediatric dental practice in all of Birmingham.  We LOVE them so much.  They are fast, friendly and caring.  One of the hygienists even cleaned my child's teeth while he sat in her lap. They are AMAZING!!  Dr. Keller himself is hilarious and personable.  He loves playing and horsing around with the kids. We love you Dr. Keller!!

name: Kristal Sullivan
text: Not one bad thing to say, I loved my experience overall. They're very professional, relaxed and they have a great sense of humor.

text:
Dr. Keller's office offers the best Pediatric Dentistry services around, HANDS DOWN! Dr. Keller and staff uphold the most professional practices while providing superb customer service. The office is very kid-friendly creating an environment that is comfortable and fun. My 3-yr old handled himself exceptionally well at his visit, which is a result of the environment. His comfort makes us as parents very pleased!

I highly recommend this practice to anyone who asks! As always, thank you Dr. Keller and staff :)

name: Tressa Fancher
text: Dr. Keller and his staff are wonderful! The office staff is always friendly, cheerful, and helpful, and after years of dealing with office staff at medical practices that are very unfriendly, this is a welcoming breath of fresh air. Dr. Keller has a laid back personality that puts my child at ease, and he actually looks forward to his checkups. The waiting area is roomy with plenty of room to spread out, and there are two play sections for kids: a room with toys for younger kids, and a video game room for older kids.

name: Bledsoe
text: We love doc keller him an his staff took wounderful care of my son when we took him in for consultaion and for one day surgery!!

text: Great, friendly, and kind staff. Works amazingly with my three year old very patient and gentle which is a great ease on the mind of a worried mom!

name: Sharon Hauser
text: I visited Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry earlier this week for my six month check-up. As usual I was treated by a professional staff who was kind and thoughtful. The expertise of Vanessa, my hygienist was exceptional. She was very thorough. Finally, I love Dr. Hall. He does great work. I have been his patient for quite a few years, and give him nothing but high praise. I feel at home here.

name: Jeff king
text: Dr Hall is a very caring doctor and does not recommend any thing that I do not need. The staff is absolutely wonderful.

name: Steve Davies
text: I am so glad my wife found Dr. Hall and got us both in for some awesome dental work. In my 60 years I have been to my share of dentist.  But I have never been to one where I had zero pain while in the chair. Dr. Hall did 2 crowns and a filling on me all at the same time and I never felt any pain. It's well worth the 40 mile drive to see a great dentist. 👍

name: Bev Hunter
text:
I recently visited Hall Dentistry for my three-month cleaning appointment. Debbie, my longtime Super Dental Hygienist uses her great skills and the latest equipment to give me the brightest and  cleanest feel you could want.

This office is filled with the friendliest staff and highly qualified personnel to make your visit great every time.  I have been a patient at this practice for more than ten years and I am always pleased with the quality of care I receive.

Dr. Hall is a wonderful dentist and does amazing work.  He always wants to ensure that I am comfortable and have no pain.

I highly recommend Dr. Hall and his staff to you!

name: Mallory Carrington
text: I have a lot of anxiety about going to the dentist,  but Dr. Hall and his staff made me feel very comfortable and eased my anxiety the minute I walked in. The staff was very patient with me and my cleaning went perfect.  I would highly recommend Dr Hall and his team for anyone who is in the same boat as me. They did offer me some medicine (while there) to ease my fears, but I ended up being ok without it. It was nice to know that it is an option.

name: Gretchen Youngdahl
text:
Dr Hall and the staff are both professional and compassionate.  There are several dentists in the area, but this staff works as a unit and are on the same wave length. Not only would I recommend Dr. Hall, I already have to my best friend.  He was concerned about making sure I fully understood all of my options and let me make the choice of what I am comfortable with.
Highly recommend them. I’m glad I found a good dentist.

name: Gabrielle Carrier
text: I was so apprehensive about some much needed cosmetic work on my front teeth and by chance a friend recommended Dr. Hall and staff! Upon initial consult Dr. Hall made me feel very at ease and comfortable and listened to what I wanted, a NATURAL smile! He did not talk me into any extra add ons and braces like other dentist. He did only what I wanted/needed to be done and made it work. I ended up with a wonderful two new front teeth and could not be more pleased with the outcome! The staff are so kind and very attentive to your needs! I can’t wait to show off my new smile!!! I highly recommend him!

name: Logan Echave
text: I’m new to the area and could not be more satisfied with my experience. They were professional, gentle with my teeth, and happy to walk me through everything. As someone who isn’t a huge fan of going to the dentist, I’d recommend Hall to anyone.

name: Tyler Scott
text: Dr Hall and all of his staff are always amazing. I highly recommend Dr Hall if you are looking for a new dentist in the Birmingham area.

name: Tommy Maddox
text: Because of a sensitive gag reflex, I had not been to the dentist in 2-1/2 years.  I suffered a broken tooth and contacted Hall Dentistry at the suggestion of my wife, who uses them.  They were great in using sedation dentistry (oral and nitrous oxide) to replace a crown and insert a new crown.  I am now able to go to the dentist regularly again.  Kudos to Dr. Hall and his entire staff!

name: Paul Ferrill
text: Dr. Hall's office is professional and efficient. I was able to get in to see him with a tooth issue in just a few days. I especially like their new portable X-Ray machine. My issue required a small amount of bite adjustment and now I'm good to go!

name: Todd Osborne
text: Love my hygienist (Donna) and Dr. Hall. I’ve been treated well every visit and they make it enjoyable. Sometimes they make it fun. The ability to crate a custom cap while you wait is a huge convenience. I’m not too crazy about the automated text system to confirm your appointment. It’s persistent if nothing else. I’m willing, however, to overlook the nuisance factor for the other good things. :-) Let me know when I can pick up my Yeti cooler.

name: Ashley Serio
text: I was a first-time patient today and could not have been more pleased with my experience.  I don’t have “dental anxiety” by any means, but was nervous simply because I’m overall a very picky person!  From the front office staff, to my wonderful hygienist Vanessa, to Dr. Hall, my expectations were greatly exceeded!  Dr. Hall and his staff were all OUTSTANDING and I look forward to being an established patient at this dental practice!

name: Joy Cannon
text:
Very upbeat, friendly, knowledgeable, and competent staff!  They work together like a well-oiled machine, all the while making each patient feel welcome and important.

This was my first visit to Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentistry.  From taking and showing me all the xrays/pictures to customizing the most thorough cleaning procedure for my needs, Deb is the best hygienist I have ever had.  Dr. Hall is a very personable, calm, and amazing dentist.  Great "chairside" manner!  He explained the problem areas and shared his plan to fix them in a concise and easy-to-understand manner.  I couldn't be happier!

name: Jeremiah Langston
text: Very comfortable and professional! Everyone there is very polite and kind. Great work too! They always call to remind me of my appointments and they also call the day after to check on me. They go above and beyond what you expect! Couldn’t be happier, I highly recommend this office!

name: Karen Upchurch
text: What a great dentist!  Dr. Hall is very patient, gentle and friendly. I had to have some major work done over several visits and he worked with my schedule. His entire staff is friendly and qualified.  I highly recommend this dental practice. Five stars across the board.

name: Kisha Davis
text: Oh my, I honestly don't know where to start! All the staff was AMAZING! They're very welcoming and helpful. Dr. Hall was very informative in explaining  my oral hygiene situation. I have always had high anxiety about going to the dentist and I was literally shaking when I was there. By the time I left, I was relaxed, happy, and pain free. It may sound corny but this dentist office is EVERYTHING you could possibly ask for in any establishment. From excellent customer service to awesome oral hygiene care!

resp.text: We are so thrilled to have helped! Thank you so much for taking the time for this review. It means more than you know.

name: andre smith
text: Dr Hall is fantastic! He is passionate about his work and his patients. His staff goes the extra mile and then some. I was crunched for time on my recent 1st visit and his staff was very accommodating. They all went out of their way to ensure that I got the best treatment in the allotted time. I have since done veneers with Dr Hall. He once again delivered on time. And his work is absolutely amazing. His pricing is more than fair for the quality he delivers. Thank you Dr Hall and Staff. You all Rock!

name: Mary Hayes
text: Doctor Hall and his staff are awesome. I have had multiple visits and each visit they have given exceptional service. The office plays music which is calming and relaxing.

name: Eva Pickens
text: After experiencing an unexpected tooth issue, I looked for a dentist that could help me diagnose my problem. I called and they scheduled me the same day. Dr. Hall examined my tooth problem and made recommendation. He did not do anything but help resolve the problem. No unnecessary tooth repair. I made an appt to have my teeth cleaned.  The staff were very personable and professional. It was a great experience and I highly recommend Dr. Hall and his staff.

name: Mary Vensel
text: As always, Dr. Hall and his staff were courteous, proficient and on time. I am happy to trust them with my dental work.

name: Candous Langston
text: Super impressed! I've never been to a more thorough dentist. Staff are so sweet and professional and everything flowed smoothly! Extremely friendly administrative staff in the front, delightful dental hygienist, and a dentist who seems to have a good personality for dealing with people of all ages. Dr. Hall took time to go over my concerns and created a plan of action to give me a confident smile... Thankful for finding them!! If you want to be treated well and have top notch care, this is the place! (P.S. Donna is awesome!)

name: Hannah Hendricks
text: First,  I am terrified of the dentist.  Both Dr Hall and Debbie worked hard and patiently to put me at ease.  I am missing several teeth and they helped me with a workable plan. This plan not only helps with my phobias but works with my pocketbook without requiring many months to accomplish good oral health results.  If you are like me;  scared and in need of an excellent,  caring dentist and staff!!,  give Dr Hall a chance to solve your oral health concerns/needs.

name: Sheri Nichols
text: The staff was very friendly & took extra time to explain and answer all of my questions. Also communication through email was quick & easy!

name: L C
text: Everyone at Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry welcomed me as if I was family. They are very pleasant and calming. I was a first time patient and they did a thorough exam, explaining as they went along. I feel like I have found exactly the place I need to be for all my dental needs.

name: Ariel Croom
text: I get very nervous when going to the dentist, but I have had 4 crowns done with Dr. Hall and he is very aware of my fear and makes me feel very comfortable! Everyone is professional and kind, and it’s very clean. I highly recommend!

name: Melanie Anderson
text: Dr. Hall and his staff are always so friendly and professional. When arriving for my appointment  I am always called back promptly. They go above and beyond to accommodate their patients.

name: Marjorie Crawford
text: We appreciate Dr. Hall and his staff very much. We have received excellent service and would highly recommend them if you are looking for dental care.👍🏻👍🏻

name: David Pruitt
text:
Always a friendly and professional atmosphere when your being seen.
The technicians explain every detail of their work and Dr Hall is ready to discuss all the details of his examination.
Cannot imagine any place better for my dental care.

name: Jo Jo Broski
text: I had the best experience I've ever had in any type of medical office ever. I got the answers I wanted precisely down to the exact amount of what I wanted to know. Dr Hall, Mrs. Leslie & all of the rest of the team, were all extremely kind to me. They all answered every single question I had and I left the office feeling like I was a family member and can't wait to go back.

resp.text: Thank you for the great review! We are excited to see you again.

name: Tyler Davis
text: This place is fantastic. Everyone is super nice & they are very understanding and encouraging when it comes to dealing with dental related anxiety. Highly recommend!

name: Kristy Gray
text: Dr. Hall and his entire staff are amazing!  They are kind and caring as well as being consummate professionals!  I highly recommend Dr. Hall!

name: Tami Wood
text:
I have been in the Birmingham area for 12 years. Visiting dentist after dentist. I am extremely picky with Dentist and Doctors. Even more so important I have been struggling with Extreme teeth grinding for a year! So bad it has interfered with my daily living!
I went to multiple dentist and specialist to try and find some answers and relief ! Needless to say one injected Botox did nothing another said it was all in my mind!  Another wanted to completely redo the 25K dollars worth of crown work I have done over the last few years. I have seen Dr Hall now 3 times and what I like most is he LISTENS! Nothing is worse than feeling rushed at an appointment! We as patients pay for services and deserve the time and respect. This is exactly what Dr Hall gives you. He was the first dentist to actually not only listen to me but to help me find a resolution! Although I have a few more appointments to get my issues under control I am completely satisfied with Dr Hall and his staff! I have moved my entire family from our existing dentist to Dr Hall. I hope to be his patient for years to come! Highly recommended!

resp.text: Tami thank you so much for taking the time for this wonderful review!

name: Kathy Olive
text:
Dr Hall is the best! And so is his staff. Thanks Debbie for taking good care of me. ❤️
Ps. Discovering the coffee station in the waiting room means I can bypass Starbucks next time!

name: Ellen Bryant
text: I’ve never been a huge fan of going to the dentist, but I’ve never had anything other than a positive experience at Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry. The moment you walk through the door you are greeted with a smile. Dr. Hall and his staff make you feel at ease whether you’re just in for a cleaning or a more involved procedure. They are very patient and willing to answer any questions you may have and/or explain any procedure you’re having done. Debbie Carter is a fantastic hygienist. She takes the time to get to know her patients, and she has always done an excellent job cleaning my teeth without causing me any discomfort. I cannot recommend this practice enough. If you are new to town or just looking for a new dentist you should definitely go see Dr. Hall.

name: Sharon Lee
text:
Dr. Hall has been my dentist since he took over Dr. Chuck Ellis's practice.  He and the staff are very professional yet they make your visit feel like you are part of a family. Since I drive from South Alabama to come to Dr. Hall, I would definitely recommend him and his wonderful staff.
Sharon Lee

resp.text: Thank you Sharon! Always a pleasure to see your name on our schedule and to catch up when you are in town.

name: Courtney
text: This has been by far the best experience I’ve had during a dentist visit, since a teenager. Every visit has been amazing and very welcoming. I Definitely will be referring people to visit. Thank you again Dr.Hall and the team!

resp.text: Awesome! Its been great getting to know you Courtney!

name: Edward Hauser
text: I have been going there for years . The staff is very friendly and very professional. Dr Hall is a one of a kind . He does procedure without pain. They are also a one day crown provider without any wait and reasonably easy on the pocket. If professional dentistry is what you are seeking call Hall Family Dentistry you won’t be disappointed.

resp.text: Awesome review! Thank you so much.

name: Dez Johnson
text:
Really enjoyed the Staff here. It was fun and amazing to know that this staff went all out to make me feel welcome wanted and important.
They deserve 10 stars

name: marsha hancock
text: I had a very good experience at Hall Dentistry. I was told to let them know when I arrived for my appointment. I did so and was called in immediately. Donna my hygienist did a wonderful job x-raying my teeth, cleaning and checking for any problems. She was very prompt, pleasant and efficient. Dr. Hall came in to recheck my teeth. He too was prompt, friendly and  efficient.  He explained what my x-rays showed and what we needed to watch. I was very pleased with my dental visit and would highly recommend them.

name: F C
text: Great service, friendly, they fit you in when you have an emergency. Dr. Hall takes whatever time necessary to explain what is happening. Excellent quality workmanship.

name: Joy Jager
text: Every one in Dr. Hall’s dentist office is welcoming and kind. The office is beautifully decorated and comfortable, not to mention completely sanitized. Dr. Hall is very considerate to give options of dental treatments without putting any pressure on me or my husband to schedule those treatments. I highly recommend this practice.

name: Alan Cannon
text: Pick a category... any category.  I give them 5 stars across the board!  I'd give more if Google would let me!

name: Glenda Boutwell
text: I have been using Dr Hall over 4 years.  My experience is great .NO PAIN..ALWAYS EXCELLENT CARE...EVERYONE IS VERY FRIENDLY AND TRAINED TO EXCELLENCE WITH MY DENTAL CARE..Dr Hall is a specialist in his dental care. Go visit and you will see why I honestly re commend Dr Josh Hall and his team..CALL TODAY FOR YOUR APPT..

resp.text: Always a pleasure to see you Glenda! Thank you for the kind review!

name: Angela Jester
text: Excellent! Just finished my 3rd visit. Very comfortable and safe during covid pandemic. I also had some issues with my teeth due vomiting with pregnancy and they went above and beyond to help me protect my teeth and help restore what had been done ✅ I’m so thankful for them!

name: John Michael Berna
text: An absolute first class facility!! Leslie, Peyton and Dr.Hall were amazing. The quintessential professionals

name: Patrick Hutton
text:
I needed an emergency fix on a front tooth after my old crown broke off out of state. Dr. Hall was able to squeeze me in the very next day despite how busy they are there. He did an amazing job of reconstructing it. So good, in fact, that I decided to finally get my smile fixed. I've had terrible experiences with dentists in the past, so I've gone a long time without getting the dental care I need. Everyone there was so nice, so professional, and so, so amazing!

I'll update after my next appointment, but so far it's been a wonderful experience! I think I've found a dentist I'll actually want to go back to!

name: randall cox
text:
Through the years Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentistry has taken care of my dental needs. The staff is helpful, friendly and through when processing my insurance claims. As technology changes, the office is constantly up dating their equipment and procedures.  One example is the use of a 3D CAD In-Office Dental Crown Manufacturing unit.  The last crown I had was completed in one visit to include all aspects of the crowning process.

I would highly recommend Hall Cosmetic & Family Dentist for your dental needs

name: Russell Wood
text: The staff and doctor was very knowledgeable and friendly. I would recommend them to anyone I knew.

name: Jacey Evans
text: This place is amazing they make your teeth white like a brand new car they fix your teeth as sone as possible!

name: Macie Wilkins
text: I had an amazing first appointment at Hall dentistry. I was looking for a dentist who did cosmetic dentistry and his reviews were great, and my first visit was very impressive. The dental hygienist was kind and explained what and why certain things were done (xrays, gum measuring, photos) and Dr. Hall himself was very kind. Being a UAB dental grad, I knew I could trust him. Overall, I expect a lot from my dentist due to complex dental conditions, and Dr. Hall and Debbie (one of the dental hygienists) did not disappoint!

name: Jeff Garth
text: Dr. Hall is a fantastic dentist that takes time to get to know each patient and deliver pain free dental work. The staff in the clinic are super friendly and work quickly to get you in. My hygienist (Donna) has a lot of experience, is very personable & always does a fantastic job. I highly recommend Dr. Hall and his entire practice.

name: Samantha Stewart
text: Dr. Hall is wonderful, he's great at what he does and very gentle. I have a phobia of needles and the drill and he put me at ease and offered sedation, they're very friendly and a great place to go for all of your dental needs. 10/10 would recommend

text: I was pleased with my experience but I felt like your prices were not in line with the products.

name: Harold Williamson

name: Bridget Broadhead
text: Dr. Hall & his staff go the extra mile to make sure you feel comfortable.

I have been coming here for years now, and have never had any issues. I can’t imagine going anywhere else. I would recommend this office to everyone I know in the Birmingham area who is looking for a GREAT dentist.

name: Jasmine Mims
text: This place has such a great atmosphere and smiling faces. They always answer calls which is a huge plus. My hygienist, Donna, made me feel so comfortable as a new patient. She also made sure to keep me very informed during my visit. I recommend 10/10!!!

name: Garrett Williams
text: Love this place!! They are very professional clean and always remember everything about you!

text: The staff at Hall Dentistry is always efficient, professional, and courteous. They remember you as returning patient and treat you like a friend!! On the rare occasion you need a referral, he and his staff reach out to specialists promptly on your behalf and often same day care is expedited. Highly recommend!!

name: Allison Turner
text: I had such a positive first experience at Hall Family Dentistry! A friend who has been a patient there for quite some time recently recommended them to me, and I couldn’t be more impressed! The staff and Dr. Hall were all extremely kind, made me feel comfortable, and were so helpful and engaging with any questions that I had!

name: Mike Dove
text: I feel that I was fortunate to find the great people of the Hall Family Dentistry. Hygienist Debbie totally educated me on how to take care of my teeth with information I had never heard. Then Leslie took care of me very efficiently regarding a crown issue I had. The atmosphere of the place is quite welcoming and professional. You come out feeling better than you did when you entered. Check them out.

name: Eston Cobb
text: I came as a new patient and received the most thorough oral exam I've ever had. They even took photos of individual teeth to show me problem areas. Incredibly friendly staff! Debbie did an excellent job cleaning my mouth and was so kind and gentle. I will be back!

name: Rob Hottel
text: This a great place to have all your dental needs met!  Dr. Hall and his staff do a great job.

name: Chasity Skinner
text:
I’ve been a dental assistant and temp assistant for 5 years, and a current full-time dental hygiene student. Being in the dental field, I’ve seen my fair share of dental work. I met Dr. Hall and his team a little over a year ago while temping and helping out. After helping over a week, I saw what an amazing job he did on his fillings and crowns. I told myself, “If I ever needed work done, I’m coming here.” Well, fast forward a year later, and I have a small crack in my tooth. Dr. Hall fit me into the schedule and wanted to be as conservative as possible with restoring my tooth, which is what you WANT! I’m lucky I don’t need a crown yet, and only a tiny filling, but If and when I will need a crown, I will be seeing Dr. Hall and his team.
His team is wonderful, not only to their patients, but to each other. Everyone is so kind!

name: Melanie Averill
text: Being new to the Birmingham area gave me numerous choices for a new dentist.  Dr. Hall and his staff are at the top of my list!  Every exam is very thorough and professional.  I am very pleased with the decision to make Dr. Hall our family dentist.

name: Boyd Forsyth
text: Dr Hall and staff are very professional and kind, always had good work done, no complaints, very satisfied every time I go, I would highly recommend to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you Boyd!

name: tan lankford
text:
The Best team in Birmingham, AL
Love y’all!👍🙏🏻💕

name: Ann Coyle
text: Although the staff, generally speaking, is nice (not a fan of the sarcastic hygienist), they billed my insurance company on a plan I no longer had (so they effectively were paid twice for the same work). I begged them to correct it--they didn't--then BCBS caught it and I had to pay the difference (for work I wouldn't have had done if I'd known the real cost up front). Beyond that, I just left the office of my NEW dentist where I found out I will have to spend nearly $10,000 to correct the 2 crowns Dr. Hall did. Again, he's a nice guy, but if you need something beyond whitening, I recommend you find a better dentist.

name: Olivia Schor
text: My dental hygienist, Donna was ABSOLUTELY the best! I went to the appointment with severe anxiety thinking about all the dental work that was going to have to be done on my teeth to repair them from years of neglect. There is no way I could have gotten through my appointment without her kindness and all the sensitive she treated me with while cleaning my teeth. Lindsey Schor

name: Megan Miles
text: Dr. Hall was recommended by several of his other patients and I haven't looked elsewhere since. He's reasonable with his diagnoses so you can be confident it's what's best for you--and your wallet. His staff are great...shout out to Donna, a team hygienist who makes an effort to know you personally. And the outcome is perfect every time. Good color matching, bite alignment, and no pain.

name: Sherry Bomb
text: They are always friendly and explain everything very well.  Their work is top quality.  I love my new smile!

Everyone in his office is always helpful and cheerful. This is the first time in my life that I am proud of my smile.
Thank you Dr. Hall and your team of professionals.

text: I can’t say that I love going to the dentist but I don’t mind going to Dr. Hall. Everyone there is super friendly, and I always receive excellent tooth care. If you are looking for a dentist that will go above and beyond any other dentist out there then give  them a call. I did😊

name: Courtney Berg
text: I had a great first experience at the office. All of the staff is very friendly. Dr. Hall took his time, made me feel comfortable, and gave a lot of information. I would recommend Dr. Hall to anyone needing a dentist.

text: I can not stress enough how great Dr. Hall and his entire team are! I’ve now been a patient for a few years and I plan on being his patient for many years to come! Dr. Hall and the entire staff are friendly, caring, and personable... and they truly care about every patient that walks through the doors! He has truly transformed my smile and has improved my overall dental health and I’m forever grateful for it! ♥️

I will continue to use their office for all of my dental needs and would recommend them to anyone!

text: It was their first day back open after the covid issues & they took every precaution. They had me sit in car & they took temp & all the appropriate questions & then took me in & straight back to the dental chair for my exam. I was very thankful & happy they had taken all the precautions. I felt much safer knowing this! Great job!!

name: Janet Cleveland
text: Thank you Dr. Joshua Hall and your amazing staff for giving me my new All on Four smile. Every visit to the office was professional and caring. I would recommend you 100%.

name: Seth Wiener
text: Dr Hall and his team are experienced, professional and caring. My family and I have been going here for many years. I would highly recommend this practice.

name: CheaperHooker
text: I grew up extremely poor and even a doctors visit was a luxury! Went to the good ole health department dentist when I was 15 to get teeth pulled to give wisdom teeth room to grow in...absolute nightmarish experience so I've sadly been terrified of the dentist ever since then, like NO!! Fast forward 22 years and I had to force myself to finally go due to what I thought were fairly minor issues that needed addressed. Referred to Dr. Hall by a friend based on my known extreme fear. These people are fantastic and my hygienist, Mrs. Donna, couldn't have made me feel any more comfortable 😁 X-rays, pics, and a very thorough cleaning/scrape were performed on my first visit along with an overall smile assessment. Luckily I have only a few minor fillings to be done, 2 small pits to be filled in, and only 1 wisdom tooth that will have to be extracted. I'm just still amazed that I'm actually looking forward to going back soon to work towards getting my pretty smile completely back 🤷🏻‍♂️ Wonderful place!!

name: Victoria Pollock
text: Dr. Hall is always pleasant, and the office is clean and well kept. They have done great work on my teeth and have always been very good at following up/being responsive.

name: Lawanda Robinson
text:
They all was very friendly. They had me in and out with an appointment for my wisdom
tooth removal in the same day. Wonderful!!!!! Never had such great service in my life.

name: Sarah Grace Moody
text: I have had a lot of dental work here - both necessary and cosmetic. I had the end goal of getting veneers across my front teeth. Dr. Hall and his hygienists are top-notch! I think I have gotten to know each employee over the course of my visits and they always take great care of their patients and I am so happy with my healthier, new and improved smile!

name: Jean Prewitt
text: Dr. Hall and his staff are always so kind and caring.  They are all concerned when a problem arises and do their best to accommodate me.  I can’t praise them enough!

name: Steven Kulback
text: Worked me in quickly to assess my tooth pain and got me taken care of!  Great staff.

name: Mila Emerson
text: I, literally, cried when I saw the end result of the work Dr. Hall and Brittney had put into restoring my smile.  The entire staff is so kind, helpful, and patient that it blows any other practice out of the water.  When I met them, they had a huge job in front of them-4 of my teeth (toward the front) ended up being involved.  I’m terrified of dentists, but they never judged that, took their time and did an incredible job.  I never thought I would say this, but I was able to relax some yesterday-I really do think that was because Brittney and Dr. Hall were there (the “happy gas” really does work when you relax!).  Dr. Hall even sent back my, original, “permanent” because he wanted it to be perfect.  And it is.

text: I called with a major issue on a Monday afternoon they took me in a couple hours later. I live the staff and Dr Hall they all have such wonderful bedside manner!

text: Always a great experience at Hall Cosmetic Dentistry!  Professional staff - all do a wonderful job!

text: We love Dr Hall and all the wonderful staff at Hall Cosmetic and Family Dentistry! They are so warm and friendly and always get you in and out in a timely manner!

They are so caring, professional and if you choose to come here for any dental work, i know you will feel the same way that I feel” At Home” ) Dr. Hall is a perfectionist and has instilled this quality in all of his staff. If you need any kind of dental work done, go see Dr. Hall and his staff, you will be very pleased!

text: I had a wonderful experience at Twickenham with Dr. Cook and his staff. They were all so friendly and patient, whether on the phone or in person. text: Amazing environment and people. They squeezed me in the same day my appointment was cancelled at another dentist. All of the staff is sweet and welcoming. Cat and Dr Cook were the people that assisted me. They gave me a consultation on my failing rootcanals and helped me find a solution. Super kind and helpful. And they even gave me an awesome bag with a pen of my favorite color 😁. Best service I've ever had! I am definitely going to continue using them for my dental needs.

text: I have a severe dental phobia and this office was so helpful and understanding.  The technician talked me through everything and was very kind.  The environment in the office is calming. text: My experience with Twickenham Family Dentistry has been great. After having wore braces for years, taking care of your teeth is very important. Dr Cook is the best dentist I’ve known. He really cares about each patient and provides a clean and healthy environment for his patients. Cindy does a wonderful job cleaning and helping keep my teeth healthy. Anytime I need to change my appointment, Terry is right there to help. Thank you Dr Cook and Twickenham Family Dentistry for taking care of my family’s teeth.

text: I've been a patient here for 5-6 years and always have a flawless experience. Stephanie at the front desk is amazing. Dr. Cook is very thorough and takes his time with his patients. Love the small office feel and knowing the staff by name. I always recommend this office to my friends.

text: My experience with Twickenham Family Dentistry was excellent. Terry and Stephanie were both professional and prompt in making appointments and responding to my questions. Thanks to all of them, I am much happier with my smile!

text: Every visit has been a pleasant one! The staff is very nice and there is rarely any wait time. I even brought in my baby once, after childcare fell through last minute, and they were so sweet about it. The hygienist rocked him in his car seat while cleaning my teeth. Such skill!

name: Holly Doll
text: I found Dr. Cook by accident when I was experiencing tooth pain and didn’t have a family dentist. He diagnosed and repaired my tooth quickly and painlessly. I highly recommend his office. He is now my go-to tooth guy.

text: Dr. Cook and his staff go above and beyond to make the patient feel warm and welcomed.  Dr. Cook is always so polite and professional.  I am so glad I found his practice and look forward to my next visit.

name: Jay Hughes
text:
Best dentist I’ve ever found! And Stephanie is the best! Hands down!

Update!
I wanted to wait to post the final review. But here it is.
I would like to say “sorry” to Lindsey. You are a great person and I’m sorry for the way I treated you.

Now, to Dr. Cook and his staff. These fine folks took me in and actually listened to me and what I wanted. We were in the same page from day one. I would recommend this Doctor and his staff to anyone needing dental work! Hands DOWN!! There has been full transparency throughout every visit! The best Christmas present I could ever give myself, a smile full of teeth and I owe that to Dr. Cook and his staff! Thank you guys for understanding what I needed and what I could afford and helping me achieve my dental goals!

name: Dominique Hudson
text: I was recommended here by a coworker bc I don’t have dental insurance. They have a great program if you don’t have insurance. Everybody here made me feel right at home!! They explained everything to me in depth and were very upfront and honest with me, and didn’t leave me hanging. They didn’t act like it was a chore to be there and I could tell they genuinely wanted to help me. Cat and Dr. Cook are amazing! And the lady at the front, i think her name was Elizabeth if I remember correctly, was so helpful and sweet too! I will be recommending people to come here for sure! I loved my visit here!!!

resp.text: We so appreciate you offering those words of kindness and love that you felt at home with us!

text: The Twickenham Family Dentistry is the best! They accept new patients and the staff is very friendly, especially Kayla! HIGHLY RECOMMEND this practice!

name: Chirmere Driver
text: Choosing Twickenham Family Denistry was the best decision ever, the staff is amazing from Dr.Cook down to the receptionist area. (I'm a talker and they talk back)😁 After years of no dental insurance my teeth needed lots of TLC and boy did they get it. I've been going to Dr. Cook for a year and I've gotten a deep cleaning with follow ups every 3 months, 6 fillings, an extraction, and a temporary tooth. I'm very pleased with the work I've received and will be going to him until I lose all my teeth and then I will go to him to take care of my gums😁

name: Ryan Felton
text: Dr Cook and his staff are great!!! I not sure where to start or end. The Twickenham Family Dentistry is more than just a dentistry to me. He went over and beyond to make sure I was going to be ok. For That he gets an A+. I have nothing but good things to say about this dentistry. If you are looking for a good dentistry don't come here,  but IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR A GREAT/AWESOME FAMILY DENTIST. THIS IS WHERE YOU SHOULD BE. HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!!! 2021!!!!

name: Larry n Heidi Burger
text:
I started with Dr Cook 3 years ago.   I have a terrible fear of the dentist.  I mean the kind of paralyzing, crying kind of fear.   My mom was a dental assistant when I was a kid and she was always with me.  As an adult she still went with me.  When she passed away I just didn’t go back..

I had an issue and found Dr Cooks office.   I shared my fear and they put me at ease.  They didn’t make me feel childish or crazy.  He is amazing.  He takes his time to relax you with his sense of humor and he is gentle.   Another thing that may not matter to you but it did to me, he has a strong faith.  You can feel that being around him.  I feel I could go to anyone in that office with a fear or concern and they would talk me thru it.  Or even pray thru it if that is what was needed.

While this is his practice it’s a team effort.  He has the best staff.  Everyone in the office is there working together.  They feel like a family and make you apart of that.

An example... While in the office I got a call that a family member had passed, one of the ladies sent a sympathy card.  Another time after some serious dental work they called on a weekend just to check on me.

You can not go wrong by choosing Dr Cook and his staff...

name: David Attig
text:
Edit: Since I guess you want details, the reasons for me not visiting your practice again and leaving the least number of stars available are separate.

Not visiting anymore:
My tooth was in no pain at all until you prepared it for a crown.  The pain persisted after placing the permanent crown (on the second try, and it still did not look great on the X-ray).  I gave up on you as a dentist after the third or fourth bite-adjustment that did not solve the problem.  On the most recent visit (after my new dentist told me to go back to the person who placed the crown to get it re-done), you said that this crown is "perfect" and told me to go to an endodontist.  You also mentioned that you had told me before that the root could be damaged from previous tooth decay - you had not told me this about this specific tooth in the past, only a different tooth on which you had already performed a root canal.  According to the endodontist that did perform a root canal, the roots were in good shape - there is a crack in my tooth underneath the crown, which was the source of pain whenever debris got in the crack and irritated the root.  Whether this crack was because of a poor bite when I first got the crown or something else, I guess I'll never know.

Zero Stars: You lied to me.  I am listing several instances here, in no particular order:

1.  As I already mentioned, you did not discuss this tooth and its root with me in the past as you stated at the most recent visit.  The assistant at that visit even looked for it in the chart notes and could not find it .

2.  After the insurance claim for the crown was denied the final time, I asked you about the dentist's narrative on why it was necessary that should have been included in the files that were sent to the insurance.  You said you typed a full page for this, your receptionist said it was a few lines handwritten.  Neither of you could find a copy to provide to me.  When I was filing the appeal to the insurance company a few months prior, I asked if there was a narrative, and was not made aware that such a thing existed.  One or both of you lied directly to my face.
* If you did not file anything because I was on the "patient appreciation plan" which states that you won't file insurance while I'm on it, you could have told me that and I would not have had an issue.  This was why I filed insurance on my own after paying you for the procedure, expecting them to reimburse me the covered percentage of what I paid; admittedly, I did not realize the amount of paperwork and effort needed for this.  Instead your office told me that you did file all the needed paperwork, which the insurance company never received.

3.  I'm not even convinced that this crown was necessary (and there apparently is no narrative to state that it was).  Your office seems to put a higher priority on crowns and other high-dollar work than on fillings, which seems backwards to me as I would think that you would want to do a filling as soon as you find it so the tooth does not get bad enough to need a crown.  Another tooth of mine which you said would need a crown (which I never got from you because the pain on the other side of my mouth never stopped) currently has a filling from my new dentist.

4.  You said an endodontist can remove and save the old crown to place it back on later.  This is incorrect, both endodontists I visited stated that they drill through the crown to perform the root canal.  This may not have been intentional, but I'm counting it as another lie.

5.  After I got the root canal, some porcelain chipped off of another surface of the crown.  I called your office to ask about what material the base metal is (and if I should worry about corrosion) and was told that ALL the crowns you perform are pure zirconium and not porcelain-on-metal.  When I asked how that could be if mine clearly has exposed metal, the person on the phone got quite defensive ... like accusations of lying (perhaps not unfounded) is a common phenomenon.

resp.text:
David, I'm sorry you are unhappy. I do hope you at least realize we tried our best to provide all the Care that we could. If you don't mind, as you leave us one star would you mind elaborating on what you wish we had done better? That would be helpful for me and anyone reading this. However, respecting your privacy, I don't want to elaborate on what I think your experience may have been.

Update: David, I am so happy that you have found a new dentist with a relationship that you have confidence and Trust in! Thank you for taking the time to share this with me.  It will do neither you nor I any good for me to make a defense of the experiences that we had together. I'll leave it at I am so sorry for the misunderstandings we had and I wish it had gone otherwise. I do wish you the best going forward.
Sincerely,
Brian Cook

name: Andy Walburg
text:
Go to this dentist... And I'm not a relative, I swear.
I live in Austin Texas and was visiting Huntsville and had a dental emergency. My crown post broke and I was left without a front tooth. I went to Dr. Cook for options and after extensive discussion decided to put a new post in and a temporary crown so my dentist at home could then replace the temporary with a new crown. But when Dr Cook got into the process he discovered an old-school resin that had been used  to fill the root canal and determined that the chances of success for a new crown were significantly reduced. Rather than continuing with the new post, he simply glued the old crown back in place and suggested that I discuss my options with my dentist at home. Wow... He had the opportunity to charge me for a new post that probably would have been unsuccessful but instead was honest and told me that I would probably need an implant.
Patient before profits. For me this is something significant and something I was extremely impressed by. On top of all of that, the office was friendly, extremely organized, and seamless throughout the entire process. I highly highly recommend Dr. Cook if you happen to be fortunate enough to live in an area where he can provide dental services for you.

resp.text: Andy, thank you for the kind words. Good luck with your your dentist on Monday!

resp.text: David, glad you had a positive experience.  Thank you for posting!

name: Andrew Melton
text: Professional, kind, welcoming, personable...there are a lot of adjectives you can use to describe Dr. Cook's office and staff and they're all positive. You can tell they care about their patients by their investment in the patient experience; they've always got something new that makes the experience less intrusive and uncomfortable than I remember dentistry being even in more recent years, be it ways to watch an iPad and Netflix during a dental procedure to tools for quicker/more comfortable x-rays. I've recommended Twickenham Family Dentistry to all my friends.

resp.text: Andrew, you guys have supported us from the beginning, Thank you so much!

name: Samantha Schrader
text: Love this place and the staff. Always ready to strike up a convo on life instead of just pt. Care..

resp.text: Samantha, we appreciate you and your taking the time to post!

Dr. Cook and staff are awesome! If you have any fears of going to the dentist (like myself) this is the place to go as they go out of their way to make it a pleasurable experience.
Highly recommend!

resp.text: Billy, we appreciate you and your taking the time to give us a review.  Thank you!

name: Taylor Woodward
text: All of the staff were knowledgeable in their departments and welcoming. The service was top notch and timely. Dr. Cook's office can count on me to refer the team.

resp.text: Taylor, thank for your confidence in us!

text: This dental office made me feel welcome be sending friendly letters. I had pleasant and smooth experience with Yuliya, RDH who was attentive and gentle with care she provided. Dr. Cook was honest with me about my dental needs and he gave me options for treatments and offered necessary referrals. I definitely would recommend this dental office. They have a knowledgeable and fun staff!

resp.text: Marina, so glad you guys are with us and we appreciate you taking time to share your kind review.  Thank you!

name: Nicole Quick
text: The staff at twickenham dentistry are amazing. I was referred by a friend to have a second consult by Dr Cook. It turned put to be one of the best decisions of my life. Terry, Cat, and Dr Cook gave me options I didn't think I had left. They make sure you weigh all available options and that your comfortable with your treatment plan. The environment is very relaxing. There is not a long wait time. My overall experience was great. I would referr this dentistry to everybody. Thank you twickenham dentistry for giving my smiling back.

resp.text: Nicole, what a kind review!  Glad we made you feel comfortable and thank you for posting!

text: The staff was great, very friendly! Dr. Cook was great also. I will refer people to them for sure!

resp.text: Jeneal, thank you for posting your kind words!

text: This is a amazing office!! Dr McRae and Dr Reardon are caring professional dentist.. the staff are all friendly and take extra care to make sure you have a good experience.. I have been a patient for years and I highly recommend them, you won’t find a another office like this one!

text: I originally went in for a cleaning and that checked for cavities, they told me not to worry that I could get all of them done, they scheduled my appointments all at one time. Every time I went in they would make sure I was comfortable and during the process always cared about how I was doing.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review!

name: Kristen Taylor
text:
I haven’t been to the dentist since 2006...why?? Because I’m terrified of the dentist! 😩😩😩 But  a recent broken tooth left me with no choice, and I was led, with divine timing but that’s another story altogether) to Midtown Dental Studio! As I told the kind woman at the front desk (I hate I didn’t get her name!) as I was leaving, “I see WHY you all are so highly rated!”

Casey was AMAZING and really made me feel super relaxed and comfortable throughout my visit! Dr. Macrae was soooo nice and also helped me ease my anxieties as he explained my options to me! The entire process was painless and I was in and out in less than two hours!

Also, based on the reviews, this was the very first dentist office that I called and I was able to get an appointment within the week! I thank God for that! And thank you, Dr. Macrae and Casey for taking such good care of me and that wretched tooth! 😆😁🥰

resp.text: This is WONDERFUL!! We are so grateful for this absolutely terrific review. Thank you so very much, Kristen.

text: This place is the best hands down!!! They are very patient with you, they will make sure you are comfortable and won’t for nothing ❤️

text: Staffing is amazing and Friendly specially Tracy I will recommend this place to everybody That I know

name: Kindal Shirah
text: Coming from a lifetime of fearing dental visits, it is refreshing to have found such an amazingly genuine experience! Every single staff member is warm, welcoming, and attentive. I truly wouldn't go anywhere else!

name: Ken Tomlinson
text: I just recently moved to Mobile and chose them due to location. I came to town needing a crown. Getting the work done was a pleasant experience. They explain what's going on and make me comfortable in the process.

name: Barbara Sanon
text: This is the best dental experience ever. Everyone is so nice and courtesy. If you looking for a welcoming but concerned environment, this is the place. Excellent Customer Service!!!

name: Margaret Mangham
text: I really like Jennifer, who was my hygienist today. She has a very pleasant demeanor and was very pleasant. I left feeling and look forward to seeing her again in your office. Also, I appreciate being scheduled within a short period of time to get started on a crown for my broken tooth.

name: Ms. Kay
text: Great professionals. I was seen today as a new patient and from the moment I walked in I knew I would be well taken care of. After working as a Dental Technician for over 6 years I expected the best service and that is what I received from the time I turned in my new patient forms to receiving my next exam date for my six month f/u. I left there knowing the names of the two young women up front, the young lady that performed the initial consultation/x-rays, the hygienist name, and the name of the Dentist. Great professional service, well explained treatment, and most importantly local.

name: Voncile Owens
text: I had what I considered to be a dental emergency. I couldn't have asked for a nicer group of professionals, who made sure I was taken care of -- in one day.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review! We appreciate your kindness!

name: Janet Keene
text: The Doctors and staff at Azalea City Dental are professional and caring. Every visit is pleasant and positive! I would recommend their offices to anyone, even those that are fearful of the dentist! They will set you at ease and take great care of you!

name: Samantha McEachern
text: Amazing dentist office! Very professional!!

resp.text: Samantha, thank you so much for your review!

name: Gretchen Otero
text: I get very nervous at the dentist and Dr. Kern really took his time with me to make everything as easy, stress free and pain free as possible .I would recommend him to all of my friends. thank you! The staff is also incredible caring and helpful!

name: cindi christian
text: Very professional. The staff is Caring and always makes sure Everything is to your satisfactory!  Love the atmosphere and how comfortable they always make you feel!

name: Miranda Sutherland
text: If you're looking for a new dentist in the Mobile area, I highly recommend Dr. Kern. He's very warm and friendly. Plus the office staff and assistants are very nice. I have a lot of anxiety when it comes to dental cleanings and treatments. They have satellite radio, TV, little neck pillows,etc. They go above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and relaxed.

name: Maggie Krueger
text: I never wait!  Seriously, haven’t sat in the waiting room for more than 5 mins.  They are super easy to communicate with and I like the email reminders for appts.  Front desk ladies are the best part.  They need a raise!

name: Tara Hart
text: I work for a dental practice in Hartford, Alabama and received a call from the dad of a 15 year old patient who is a currently a student at the Alabama School for Math & Science.  Our patient had an anterior crown come off while brushing his teeth.  I called Azalea City Dental, explained the situation, and Wendy was so helpful and professional. She immediately offered an appointment for 1:00 this afternoon.  After speaking with her, I have no doubt our patient will be taken care of in the best way.  THANK YOU, AZALEA CITY DENTAL & WENDY for the assurance our patient is in caring hands!

name: Carissa Pessia
text: Great group of people and a nice office to boot! Very friendly staff that genuinely care about their patients and do their best to make you as comfortable as possible during procedures.

name: Luis Jaar
text: I'm honestly looking forward to coming back here. The staff was incredibly helpful when my insurance was being really confusing and scheduled me right away. All of my questions were answered and the environment itself is very welcoming in general. It kind of felt like I was getting my teeth looked at by a family member.

name: Jimmy King
text: I love the staff at Azalea city  dental.  They are always so nice. Growing up I had bad experiences with other dentists.  They are gentle and careful when doing procedures.  Dr. McRae and Heather are the best.

name: Devlin Wilson
text: Best dental practice in Mobile area!   The office staff is amazing and address you by name when you enter the office!  The clinical staff ensures that you are comfortable and all the dentists are top notch!   Our family wouldn't go anywhere else for our dental needs!

name: NiShawndra Henderson
text: Friendly and professional atmosphere. The staff knows my family and I by name which  always makes us feel welcome. Absolute best dentist office in Mobile!

name: Edith Gray
text: Very nice and caring staff. I have been going to Azalea City Dental for years and have never had a bad experience. Everything is explained upfront. Great dentists!

name: Katey O'Brien
text: Love Dr. Kern and his staff! Wendy is always very kind and helpful. Everyone at Azalea has you in their best interest! Strongly recommend.

text: I can't say enough good things about this office and ALL of their staff. It's not just going to the dentist it's an all around experience. They really take care of you and look out for you as a customers best interest. They call and check on you after you have had major work. Really an all around great service more like a five star hotel. This is what keeps me coming back and I would highly recommend them to anyone!

name: Lauren H
text: I started going here shortly after moving to Mobile. Every visit has been a wonderful experience. Always get in and out quickly and everyone is very knowledagable.

name: Sherri Alexander
text: I called for a dental emergency the evening  before and was seen the next morning first thing. The experience was friendly, helpful and painless. I would highly recommend this group of caring caregivers.

name: David Trimmier
text: Azalea City Dental is THE greatest provider of excellent dental services in this area. ALL of the staff are friendly, caring & are only interested in the well-being of their patients. I have 100% trust in their collective judgements.

name: Judith Hayes
text: The staff was pleasant from the moment I walked in the door, when I went to the back, my visit with the Dr and then my checkout. They know great customer service

text: Always very professional and friendly. I would recommend this office for your dental needs.

name: Bowdoin Atchison
text: Excellent service with a clean and welcoming atmosphere. Convenient location as well.

name: Christopher Hill
text: My comfort and concerns were of the upmost priority to all of the staff I had the pleasure of meeting. I thoroughly enjoyed my visit.

name: Kimberly Wilson
text: I’ve had facial pain for 7 days straight - went to 3 ER’s and 2 MD’s - a primary and ENT - everyone kept saying that I had a sinus infection - finally, after 7 days, my jaw popped - leading us to TMJ disorder - Dr McRae spoke with me on Saturday and was able to provide instructions to maintain my comfort until I could be seen - over Memorial Day weekend!  Dr. Kern saw me as a walk in first thing Tuesday morning and was extremely compassionate, as were all the staff!  He was able to get me a referral to an oral surgeon today - so relieved!   I love this office and everyone who works there / this is the dentist office to go to hands down!

name: Solomon Mumford
text: Great experience from genuine people That take pride in there work highly recommend.

name: Linda Stringer
text: The office staff is slways friendly and insurance claims are filed promptly and efficiently.  Dr. Kern is the best!

text: Professional. Friendly. Terrific as always.

name: Gwenevere Jones
text: Great service.Extremely professional.Friendly staff.

name: Matt O'Gwynn
text: Awesome as always!!

name: Ashley Hotard
text: We initially came to Bush Pediatric Dentistry for my 2 month old having a tongue tie. I didn’t know why you’d choose a pediatric dentist over just taking your kids to your dentist with you until then. Couldn’t be more impressed! All the staff are so great with children.  Dr Bush isn’t “scary” and the kids look forward to getting their teeth checked. They love watching a movie during their exam and the entire office is bright and cheerful. I wish adult dentist offices were as cheerful as it is here! Love this office and all the staff!

name: Amanda Mack
text: We drove almost two hours to see Dr. Bush. They were so sweet and timely. The doctor and the hygienist took time to explain what they found in the x-rays and what they needed to do. They also explain what will go on during the procedure and about how long it would take. The front desk went over all the things with the insurance which was very helpful. They also made it easy to make an appointment within a timeframe that I could drive there. Great dentist! Highly recommend! Can’t say enough about the clinic! PS the dog is pretty cool too!

name: deven mack
text: Great friendly people. They work sooo great with kids. These are true professionals, from the Dr. to the nursing staff. I highly recommend for all your child's dental needs.

name: Kaitlyn Wilson
text: The sweetest staff! The office is SO NICE and clean!!!! Everyone was so friendly upon arriving! Our hygienist Hannah was very sweet and took good care of my sweet boy! Dr. Bush was so nice, professional and took time to talk to me about questions and concerns!! We will be seeing them again in 6 months!❤️

name: Mark & Dawn Ellis
text: Printed off the forms online to fill out before the initial visit, and handed them to the lady at the front desk when we walked in. Waiting area was set up nicely. My son enjoyed playing with the toys and watching Poppy. We were called back quickly for our cleaning. His cleaning was completed quickly and Dr. Bush discussed healthy tips and what teeth to expect next. Petting Poppy was my little one’s favorite part! Positive first experience!

name: Jeannie Shell
text:
Dr. Bush and his staff at Bush Pediatric Dentistry are all absolutely amazing. Everyone is so kind and makes even the most nervous patient enjoy their experience! I love that us parents are able to go back with the little ones, which is one reason that I originally chose Dr. Bush.
The office is immaculate and super cute. Speaking of cute, my kids LOVE seeing Poppy when they visit! I am so thankful that Montgomery and surrounding areas have such a wonderful pediatric dentist.

name: Dorothy Gentile Huston
text:
Dr. Bush and his incredible staff have done it again!  My daughter broke off part of her filling leaving her tooth exposed and hurting.  They were able to get her in and fix it right away.  My daughter is Autistic and used to be afraid of the dentist.  With the patience, kindness, and love she experiences at Bush Pediatric Dentistry, she loves going to the dentist now.  Thank you Dr. Bush and staff for always taking the time to make her feel safe and secure.
BTW my 2 typically developed daughters also love Dr. Bush and his staff 😊. This military family wishes that we would never move away from this dentist❤️

name: Katie Thorpe
text: Fast, professional, and affordable tongue and lip tie release. They scheduled an appointment for my newborn within 24 hours and when I came made sure I understood the procedure fully before it was performed. Dr Bush was kind, sympathetic, and clearly very experienced and all of his office staff were also warm and welcoming. I would recommend him to anyone needing a tongue or lip tie released!

name: Ginny Zipen
text: This office is everything everyone said it would be. My 3yo is a little different and loves going to the Dentist and having her teeth cleaned. I asked her how she likes this one (just moved) and I got two thumbs up and a “I love it”. It doesn’t have a dentist office feel, there are items in place for children who may not be comfortable with the dentist from Lucy the weighted stuffed dog to the real pup that stays in the reception area. The staff is amazing with kids and providing encouragement when needed. Highly recommend.

name: Melissa Yaros
text: Everything was perfect, from setting the appointment, completing paperwork online prior to appointment, reminders, the appointment -from walking in to walking out etc. We came in for our first appointment 10 minutes prior to the time just incase I forgot to complete something online, we were called back a minute or 2 after our apt time-there were other patients in and out. My child (5 yr old) was a bit apprehensive to get on the bench but the assistant was great, she walked us through everything she was doing before she did it, was very thorough, reassuring and made my child feel very comfortable. Dr. Bush is very sweet as well. They have a very well run office and sweet staff!  My child asked to go back tomorrow lol

name: Amber Shock
text: My 2.5 year old had a little meltdown while waiting to see the dentist and everyone in the office was extremely kind, professional, and patient. They took time to listen and also to explain the process for the visit and what I can expect on our next visit. Dr. Bush was kind and professional as well. I'm a transplant and I was so pleased to find such a high quality of dental care for my son. It's well worth the drive from Prattville.

name: Edwina Riddlespriger
text: I loved our visit and am very happy to have chosen Bush Pediatric Dentistry as our new dentist. My seven year old son is on the autism spectrum and the staff as well as Dr. Bush were very accommodating and patient. 100% satisfied.

name: Shyla Sheridan
text: The staff are all so friendly and welcoming! My daughter has been afraid of going to the dentist in the past (different office), but left saying how much she likes the dentist! Hana cleaned her teeth and took an x-ray! She did awesome with my daughter and really made her feel comfortable!

name: Hannah Pursley
text:
This is the best pediatric dentist. They see all 4 of my kids (as young as 2)
Never have an issue with crying or being scared. They truly care about the kids and giving them a good impression of the dentist.
I found this dentist as a second opinion when I refused to have my 3 year old put to sleep for a filling from another pediatric dentist.  I was told by another I would have to agree bc no one would attempt her filling with her awake, but Bush DID. With no issues at all. She is even excited to go back for cleanings because it was a great experience for her (awake)

I would recommend them for any pediatric services.

name: A. Moors

text:
My daughter had a  great report from her dentist today! Her experience  with

text: Absolutely wonderful office from the first time calling & speaking to Karly ( i believe was  her name) giving me all the info i needed, answered every question to calling back making the appt- which was a month out BUT she reassured me she would be able to get me in before then and actually got us in within 3 business days. My son, who has ASD and is non verbal, went to the dentist for the first time today! My son absolutely hates anyone touching his mouth and brushing his teeth is always a fight, however, we were able to have his teeth cleaned and checked all in a course of about 12 minutes. Yes, my son screamed and fought it the whole time (which is normal for us when handling his teeth) but the dentist and staff were all SO patient and kind. They were calm and talked us through everything.
They even put on a movie (one of his favorites) for him and gave him a private room due to sensory overload. Highly recommend!!!

Thank you so much Dr. Brush and team for going above and beyond, being honest, and caring. I am so glad I made the switch.

Because of COVID19 restrictions, I was unable to stay in the room. I was concerned about my son not handling it well without me, but he didn't bat an eye. I can't recommend this doctor and staff enough. We will continue to see Dr. Bush and will bring our toddler here as well. They have a special gift of working with young children.

text: Dr. Sam Bush was really nice and made us feel at ease for my daughter's surgery!

name: Addie Edwards
text:
Super sweet office! Hygienist and Dentist both worked quickly and efficiently with my little nervous guy. Great relaxed, toddler and kid friendly atmosphere. Deff recommend to anyone, friends and family.

We had another cleaning today and since our last one my little boy had a bad experience with doctors in general and now he is SUPER nervous around them. Today everyone at Bush was so patient and understanding of our situation. I am so glad to have an office for my son where they take their time and actually show they care. ❤️ Thank you! It means so much!

text: Dr. Bush and his team are excellent!  He spent time with me and my son explaining everything.  I would highly recommend him to anyone needing a pediatric dentist!

text: I love how they treat me and my son every time we go visit. They make us feel very welcomed and nice. Dr.Bush is very considerate and patient with my little one

name: Amanda Gantt
text: I would give 10 stars if that option was available! Dr. Bush and his staff(especially Poppy!) were absolutely wonderful!

name: Clint Moore
text:
This is a long review but I feel parents need to understand where this dental practice falls short.

Edit: dropped to one star after some discussions with my wife regarding Dr. Bush’s overall demeanor with children. He is a really nice guy but seemingly lacks the energy and spirit to meet children where they are emotionally.

Our 5yo daughter has significant anxiety regarding dental appointments. Some of this is due to bad experiences with previous dentists and some due to poorly handled situations by Dr. Bush.

Our daughter initially went in for some routine fillings, however, during the process of proving local anesthetic Dr. Bush actually nicked her lip with the needle. Of course, this brought that attempt at repairing her teeth to a screeching halt. We were advised to have the procedure accomplished at Baptist East in the outpatient surgery.

This is where our deep displeasure with the process really came to life. Our appointment was the first of the day and we were directed to be at the hospital at 6am. We were told our daughter would get an oral sedative that we would administer to calm her prior to going back with nurses. Instead, since we were first of the day, the anesthesiologist didn’t even mention an oral sedative. We asked Dr. Bush again about that ensuring him our daughter was nervous about the process and he basically blew us off claiming the nurses “do a really good job”.  Come to find out the sedative takes time to work so the first appointment of the day WILL NEVER get that sedative; parents beware!

Well I can tell you they may have been doing their best but they had to tear my daughter away from me kicking and screaming. There was nothing I could do as the room was already prepped for the procedure.

Dr. Bush, in his infinite wisdom of child psychology, was sure our daughter would have “retro amnesia” post-op. Again I can tell you the very first thing out of my daughters mouth was recalling how she did not want to be on the bed the nurses initially put her in. During consultation, Dr. Bush was barely apologetic and completely glossed over the fact that he screwed us due to scheduling/timing while speaking incorrectly on behalf of the anesthesiologist.

I could go on and on about how the entire procedure was a complete and utter cluster. Apparently this is the norm for them, I hope you other parents can avoid a similar experience for your little ones that have anxiety...our daughter will likely have issues with the dentist for the foreseeable future.  But hey they have a dog...

Bush Pediatric Dentistry employees do not bother responding to this, that ship has sailed. If we have to go to another city, we will find a dentist that works for us.

name: Jessica Joyner
text: My child has been seen by 3 different dentist before we were referred to Dr. Bush. Great experience each time we come out and we love poppy!!!
