text: Great service from the moment I entered the office. Everyone was very professional and kind to my child.  Super clean environment. The doctor took the time to listen to all of my concerns and made recommendations to correct my childs issue. Would highly recommend to anyone with children.

name: Candice Kirk
text: Dr. Curtis and his staff are extremely friendly. They made our son laugh and feel very comfortable. They slowly introduced the spinning toothbrush by tickling his finger. Our son had a great check up. Super quick. We feel very lucky that we found his practice! Can't recommend them enough!

name: D Richardson
text: We all love our pediatric dentist.  In short, my kids cry when we leave!  Dr. Curtis and his staff knows how to bring a positive experience - the facilities, the kid friendly ambiance, friendly faces and of course excellent care!

name: Ginger Barton
text: My 7yo son was a new patient and the process was simple and everyone was helpful and friendly.  We waited less than 10 minutes before being called back.  Dr. Curtis and his staff were great.  My son had his teeth cleaned, X-rayed, and examined.  He said he liked it there and was happy with his bag of dental hygiene goodies so that is a good thing!  I would definitely recommend this practice to others.

name: Sarah Duenas
text: I absolutely LOVED this dentist office! They did amazing with my 2 kids (10 & 4)! Their office was super clean and comfortable, staff was incredibly sweet and welcoming, and the doctor was very sweet and knowledgeable! We were in & out in no time at all! I’m so happy that I’ve switched dentists!

name: That1 _mom
text: Love everyone! Kind people! Do a great job.

name: brittany nicole
text: Only dentist i have taken my kids to they are wonderful

name: Lise Arnold
text: Office staff is horrible, delayed submission of billing to insurance, which requires me to pay for their mistakes. Unacceptable!!

name: Kristen Lowe
text: Awesome staff all the way from the Receptionist to the Dentist! You are NOT just a number here. The dentist actually took his time to explain all treatment options and advised us in many different ways about continued oral health and hygiene for our child. So thankful for the referral and suggestion to check in to a practice that is individually owned. Highly recommended!

name: Kieli Treadway
text: Great staff, and very good with my shy 2 year old! Easy check in, quick check up and was sent on our way. I had a great experience.

name: April Linville
text: The staff is so patient and kind. They took the time to explain each step of the visit to my 5 year old that was feeling anxiety. I would recommend to anyone!

name: Stephanie Redic
text: Everyone in the office is so kind and puts my little ones at ease. The office has cute toys to keep the kids entertained and they are quick so the kids do not get restless. My kids actually enjoy going to the dentist because of the friendly staff and environment here. Thank you!

name: Becca Jemison
text: Dr. Curtis and his office and kind, patient, and loving. I trust that Dr. Curtis has my children's best interest always. The office staff is very thorough and knowledgeable. I also really like the way the office is set up.

name: Alegra Teague
text: my son was so scared of his first apt. but they are ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!! I would recommend them to any and everyone. I don't mind the 45min drive at all knowing that my kids aren't scared there!

name: Christina Riley
text: Everyone is very friendly and professional.  Dr Curtis has always been great.  I have 5 children, been coming here for years . 💗

name: Michael
text: My son was nervous and shy for some strange reason. The dental assistant was fantastic with him, she got him to let her floss and polish his teeth just by conversation. It was great, he's still kinda iffy on the doctor, but he's like that with all guys.....but the Dr was great as well......it took him a little extra effort, but my son finally let him see his teeth. I'd say it went pretty good for the 1st visit.

name: Taissa Bergeman Gonzalez
text: Best dentist we could ever ask for. Dr Curtis is very well-informed on all aspects of oral care and medical issues and has provided us with valuable information and guidance. And he is just so great with the kids! The dental hygienists as well. My shy 3 year old loves coming here and feels so special.

name: Katrina Teague
text: The nurses where extremely helpful and kind. Dr.Curtis was amazing with my two year old daughter and my five year old son. I highly recommend this children’s dentist office.

name: Matthew Irvin
text: This was the worst experience for my daughter she cried for hours and the way he talked to her was horrible. He never even would help her because he said he wouldn’t one tooth at a time I’m very upset and have a crying daughter.

name: Jennifer Gibson
text: Love Dr. Curtis!

name: trinity sutton
text: My son loves Dr. Curtis!! We are so glad that we started seeing Dr Curtis 2 years ago.we wouldn’t take our son anywhere else . Thank you so much!! God bless.                               The Sutton’s

name: Laurie Morton
text: I highly recommend Pediatric Dentistry! My nephew has an anxiety disorder and they are so patient and kind with him during his check ups. The first couple times he went he needed extensive caps and fillings and they explained what they were doing and used gas to help ease his stress. The facility is state of the art and designed with kids in mind.

name: Kristen Manthey
text: Very friendly staff. Dr. Curtis took his time with us and helped us go over our treatment options. Wonderful at explaining everything in detail.

name: Maria Vera
text: My first daughter's appointment and i already loved this place.  It is a very clean and friendly environment. Dentist is so professional and nice. Receptionists speak spanish.

name: Jessi White
text: My child has become terrified of any doctors offices and they took such good care of her. Everyone in the office went above and beyond to make her feel comfortable.

name: Melinda White
text: Dr. Curtis is absolutely the best pediatric dentist!  The only one my girls have ever felt comfortable with.

name: teresa bridges
text: Kennedy Cannot wait to come to see her dentist she has always had such a positive experience which makes it great for lifelong dental care thank you so much

name: Martina Grimble
text: Dr. Curtis and his staff are extremely nice and efficient. We did not have to wait long!

name: Colleen Paine
text: Awesome! They are efficient, friendly and organized! The staff were super sweet and accommodating and the dentist was great!

name: Anne Wright
text: What a great experience! All 4 of my kids loved it and can't wait to go back. The staff was awesome. The dentist was so friendly and hands on. I will recommend Pediatric Dentistry of Madison to all of my friends.

name: Amy Woods
text: Dr. Curtis makes toddler dentist visits a breeze. He is great with my son, gives him stickers and acts silly with him.  Very knowledgeable and explains things very well to me. My son is 3 and we’ve been going to Dr. Curtis for a couple years now and I absolutely love it - the staff is so kind and courteous. The facility is always very clean and the waiting room has fun toys - although I’ve never had to wait very long ever as they stay on schedule very well. 5 Stars & highly recommend!!!

name: Beth Rogers
text: I was nervous about taking my 2 year old daughter to the dentist for the first time, but Dr. Curtis and his staff were great! My little girl loved all of the toys in the office, and she wasn't afraid of Dr. Curtis at all. He made her laugh and he even played catch with her! I highly reccomend Dr. Curtis.

name: Steffan de Graffenried
text: Dr. Curtis is amazing with our autistic daughter. She loves him. He really loves kids and does fantastic work. Our daughter’s has a beautiful smile now! Thanks Dr. Curtis!

name: Kelly Trevaskis
text: Excellent dentist and staff!!

name: Kristen Clark
text: This was my daughter’s first visit to the dentist  so she was a bit nervous. She had a great hygienist who explained everything as she did it. Dr. Curtis and his staff are fantastic! I highly recommend them!!

name: Michelle Self
text: Best pediatric dentist I’ve ever used. and I’ve used a few between my 6 kids (3months-21 yrs old)   Not only are they super friendly  but they took the time to put my children at ease before doing anything. I didn’t feel rushed at all. They also encourage the parents to stay with their child during treatment which is super important to me. Their patient care is the best I’ve ever seen. My 3&5 yr old who before would cry and scream when you mentioned the dentist is now excited to go. After their great report (no cavities) I took them swimming and playing for the day and at the end of the day I asked them what was the most fun  and they both said the DENTIST!! My only complaint is with myself, that I didn’t find this office sooner. Dr Curtis and his staff are the best!!

name: Soumya A N
text: Excellent service and  staff and Dentist are very friendly.

name: Heather Phillips
text: Wonderful experience! The staff and Dr. Curtis were friendly, helpful, and personable. I appreciate Dr. Curtis being so patient with our two year old. And the front desk went out of their way to help us get registered, get our health history, and address any concerns we had prior to our first visit. We will be back and I highly recommend them!

name: Amanda Lampiasi
text: Dr.Curtis is GREAT and his assistants are always AMAZING Just not to happy with the receptionist I needed to reschedule my last apt which was 6/18/19 and couldn't because she told me if I did I'd have to find another dentist for my boys.. so I had no choice but to keep the apt and figure out a way to actually get there on time. I felt like she was being rude especially in the manner she it. That's really the only bad experience I've ever had.

name: Tatiana Robertson
text: Love Dr. Curtis because kids love him. He’s great at making them feel comfortable! He makes dentist visits fun. He’s also very patient and understanding with parents and their concerns.

name: Lady B
text: Dr. David Kennon Curtis and his entire staff are absolutely wonderful! They are amazing with the children and have a beautiful, open and pristine facility. The service and care we receive is top notch. Thank you for the outstanding service.

name: jennifer robbins
text: This is the first time I brought my 2 yes old to the dentist. I was nervous because he is very shy around new people. But Dr Curtis quickly won him over and even held him before we left- something some members of our family have not been able to do! Excellent experience, I highly recommend

name: Skye Major
text: Went in for my sons first dental appt. Dr. Curtis was phenomenal with my son. Came in and made us really comfortable.  Whenever my husband and I go to ANY kind of appt for our son , every doctor only speaks to me and acts like my husband isnt there. He spoke directly to the both of us and was very professional and treated our child as his own. I will definitely be using this office for a LONG time. I definitely reccomend this office for young children.

name: Rachel Holloway
text: Dr. Curtis is such a nice dentist! He is always kind, gentle, and patient with my children. They are not afraid to go to the dentist. All of the staff are friendly and helpful.

name: J A
text:
My 3 year old daughter has literally the best dentist. I wish my dentist was like this growing up. He is so gentle and kind with her and makes her feel at ease when he was examining her teeth he was soft-spoken  but yet cheerful like a child. As he was examing her teeth with the flashlight he made it fun using adlibs like do da dur da ru .... Lol hope you all got that.
Anyway he's quick efficient and nice. Great experience.

name: Zandra Parker
text: We had a great experience for our first visit. The staff was extremely nice and kid friendly.  And they explained things so that she understood them.

name: Christina E. Hughes
text: Dr. Curtis is amazing. He is great with my kids and educates us parents. The office staff is wonderful.

name: Brooke Roberts
text: I went there today with my son Bryson. This was his first time and he loved it. He was so excited when he got there and he was more excited when he left. I would refer him to anyone with children. He is so amazing and very good with kids.

name: Geralyn Smith
text: We love Dr. Curtis! He is gentle and kind. His office is pleasant and fast. We get in and out within an hour and the staff always have smiles on their faces! I recommend Dr. Curtis to anyone looking for a great pediatric dentist that’s honest and trustworthy!

name: D'Anna Agnetta
text: We love Dr. Curtis and his team! They are all so sweet and patient with my son. Dr. Curtis truly cares about the health and wellbeing of his patients.

name: Amber Crow
text: The office staff is polite and Dr. Curtis and his team always make my kids feel welcome while not forcing them to feel the pressure, rush, or stress that comes with some dental visits. They leave looking forward to coming back. Most importantly, teeth are cleaned and no one cries!

name: Emily Kitching
text: Dr. Curtis is amazing and has an awesome staff!!! He truly cares about his patients and will do whatever it take for kids to trust him!

name: Melissa Carroll
text: Dr. Curtis is great! He is very thorough and so kind. His staff is very sweet and pleasant to work with. I love how they interact with my child and build relationships. That's why I continue to drive over an hour to use him!

name: Cookin Mama
text: This is an amazing dentist office. Dr. Curtis is wonderful with children. He speaks softly to them and makes them feel at home. You can tell that he cares about the children and is passionate about his job. The girls that assist and the girls that work at the desk are also very pleasent and helpful. I would highly recommend this dentist for your children.

name: April Scott
text: This is a wonderful office.  The staff is very friendly and professional.  Dr. Curtis does a fantastic job making my 3 year old comfortable and explains everything to her before he does it.

name: Sarah Jones
text: They take very good care of my son. Would recommend this place to anyone. We love it! Thank you!

name: Sandee Beee
text: Fast and friendly service. They explained in great detail what work needed to be done for my son which was awesome. My son loved their play areas and the staff made us feel comfortable with everything. Highly recommended !!

name: Tracy Cunningham
text: There was a mix up by insurance company and the front desk staff kept working at it to get the issue resolved.  And the dentist was amazing with my rambunctious 2 year old.  My oldest can't wait for his next appointment.

name: Morgan V.
text: The dentist and staff are so amazing we will never go anywhere else. They want you and your child comfortable and knowledgeable on everything that's happening. 1000% satisfied!!

name: Terrie Denmark
text: Dr. Curtis is simply amazing.  He pays attention to your concerns, he does not rush you out of the office and he is amazing with children. He has the patience of a saint and the tone of his voice with children makes them completely comfortable. I highly recommend Dr. Curtis.

name: Youlanda Walker
text: My children love Dr. Curtis. He engages them during procedures and calms any nerves. Happy Mommy

name: Cynthia Coy
text: I was so impressed with Dr. Curtis and his staff, they were all so kind and helpful. The kids actually had a great time in the two play areas and they loved the prizes.

name: Christy Williams
text: Dr. Curtis and his staff are AMAZING! They are prompt, courteous and willing to listen to or answer any questions or concerns. Pediatric Dentistry of Madison should be your number 1 choice for any child’s dental care!!

name: Magan Speck
text: We were referred here because my daughter had to have a lot of work done on her teeth. Dr. Curtis did a  wonderful job and my daughter has even asked to continue going to him over the dentist she had previously seen. Highly recommend.

name: Whitney Waldon Collier
text:
Very sweet dentist my sweet girl was upset and they were very patient!
Update! Shes almost 3 and went in today with NO tears, she lovea Dr. Curtis. So thankful for him being so knowledgeable ❤

name: Angie Harrison
text: Highly recommend Dr. Curtis and his wonderful staff. We will never go anywhere else! My 3 yr old has gone to the dentist twice before with no success. I was very worried about my child being more difficult. The staff was so supportive and reassured me many times that it was ok. While filling out paperwork Dr. Curtis slipped into the lobby and sat down on the floor and played with my girls, drew them pictures and watched Daniel Tiger. When the time came to go back they grabbed his hand and followed him happily. I was blown away! My 3 yr old let him look in her mouth and do everything necessary only because of his expertise in dealing with her fearful heart. I'm forever grateful! He was patient, kind and understanding. He surely has a talent!

name: Amanda Francis
text: Dr. Curtis and his staff are just amazing!! My son was terrified of the dentist and Dr. Curtis eased his fears. All 3 of my children love him and his staff!! We have never had a long wait to be seen. We are usually in and out in less than 45 minutes on a normal cleaning visit.

name: Ana Lewis
text: Great dentist and staff! Very thorough and patient with my girls. Thank you Dr. Curtis and staff!

name: Dotson Amber
text: Extremely nice people! They did a great job!

name: TaMara Love
text: We absolutely LOVE Dr. Curtis and his staff! The appointments are staggered so there aren’t too many “overwhelmed” children and once. He is attentive and thorough with each child (I have two). He remembers them and the small things about them even though we only see him twice a year. The wait is never long and the lemonade stand in the waiting area is amazing, the kids get hands on Montessori learning with it. The staff is gentle and does not push the kids to do anything unless they are comfortable. We leave with a smile EVERY time!

name: Alison Lovelace
text: We had such a great experience with Dr. Curtis and his whole staff!  It was my son's first dentist visit and everyone was so patient and kind, and Dr. Curtis took his time making sure that he was comfortable and that all my questions were answered.  Really looking forward to future visits!

name: Eve Gallegos
text: Dr. Curtis and his staff are amazing. Highly Recommend! All of the staff were friendly and the one on one was taken with care. Dr.Curtis treated my daughter with care and took his time with speaking with us on the care needed.

name: Cj Johnson
text: We love Dr. Curtis. He has always been so sweet my boys. I love the fact that he really cares about his patients. Both of my kids are so shy but have always done good with cleanings. Last visit the older brother, he is 6now, went right in and hugged his dentist. Little brother sat on his knee and got his teeth brushed and looked over. Dr. Curtis keeps a close eye on issues arising and let me know how it's going to be handled in a certain amount of time. I love this because I'm the type of person who needs to know what to expect and went to expect it. He is also good with the special needs. One child is neutropenic so his teeth have to be watch and both are hearing impaired.

name: Tia Peden
text: I was very pleased with our visit! Dr. Curtis is awesome! He is very kid frfriend and made sure my son was comfortable. I drove an hour to bring my 2 1/2 year old to see him and will definitely be making the drive for all his future dentist visits.

name: Maria Vogt
text: Best pediatric dentist! My daughter used to be very afraid of the dentist until we met Dr. Curtis. It's always a good experience now and I feel she is always getting the best treatment.

name: Costello Clan
text: We have had two visits with Dr. Curtis since we moved to Madison. Both experiences have ranked among the best we have ever had with our children seeing the dentist. We have four kids, 3 of which have developmental delays, autism, sensory and language issues. The team is always so kind and they give my children the time and space they need to get through their appointment. They even have quiet and isolated rooms that really helped my 3 y/o twins relax and not feel too overwhelmed. We couldn’t be happier with the care our children receive at Pediatric Dentistry of Madison with Dr. Curtis and his team!

name: Nene Burgess
text: DR. CURTIS IS THE BEST HANDS DOWN...MY 3 YEAR OLD IS VERY RAMBUNCTIOUS AND HARD TO TAME AT TIMES BUT HE IS PATIENT WITH HER AND SHE LOVES GOING TO SEE HIM...THEY HAVE A NICE CLEAN WAITING AREA WITH NICE TOYS AND THEY GIFT THE CHILDREN WITH TOYS AFTERWARDS...

name: Bridget Long
text: Dr. Kennon Curtis and his staff was wonderful and professional upon first impression. They really care about how comfortable my son feels. A kind, friendly, and gentle atmosphere for the kids. I will most definitely recommend Pediatric Dentistry of Madison to all my family and friends!

name: Jessica Silver
text: Dr. Curtis is very polite and nice. His staff is always friendly and responds to questions promptly. Thank you so much for your patience with our children!  - Jessica Silver

name: Carla Watters
text: Dr Curtis was amazing with the kids. My 2 year old daughter sat in his lap while he cleaned her teeth. It was as if she had known him. Also my 6 and 9 year old said they love going to the dentist now. I also have an 8 week old son he that he recommended some wipes to use to wipe his gums and he told me to set him up an appointment with the girls in 6 months. I love that he see's kids before the age of 2.

name: Virginia Smith
text: Best dentist ever! Couldn't recommend any more highly. Our kids look forward to their visits so much. My daughter had several pre-existing cavities when we first starting going, so much so that they had to be capped. Dr. Curtis did them all over the course of a few visits. She was awake for all of them, and -still- wanted to go back for each appointment. A concern for respect, consent, and maintaining a healthy relationship with dentistry are evident from the moment you enter the doors. Dr. Curtis and his staff are truly a blessing.

name: L. Cricket Parker
text: The whole staff is great! They make my two year old feel so comfortable , and he is so kind and gentle.  He talks to them , and makes them feel comfortable instead of being afraid ! Highly recommend!

name: Laura Westbrock
text: Perfect first experience for our 27 month old.  No tears... Dr Curtis was wonderful!

name: Tandra Oliver
text: I absolutely love Dr. Curtis and his staff and my kids do too! He's amazing with children and has such a great personality with them and makes them feel comfortable coming to him to get their teeth cleaned!! Best pediatric dentist hands down!!

name: Ashley Rose
text: Dr. Curtis and staff are AHHHHMAZING! They are great with the kids, extremely nice and helpful as well as consistently building personal relationships with you. My kids love going to the dentist, which says a lot! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!

name: Melissa Hackler grace
text: Absolutely phenomenal! Very understanding and caring!

name: Keanna Houston
text: Great experience every time we come! Staff is friendly and courteous. Doctor is very knowledgeable. Just what I was looking for!

name: Jennifer Seal
text: Dr. Curtis and his staff is so friendly. They are patient and answer all of your questions. He even carried my 5 month old around just talking to him. I live over 30 minutes away and it is worth the drive.

name: michaela moses
text: The dentist was great with my little boy with his first dentist appointment! I would highly recommend them for first timers!

name: Alisa Warren
text: Kindness starts when you walk in the door. Receptionist was overly kind to difficult patients. Hygienist are just as great. Dentist wanted my three year old to be as comfortable as possible. He spent time establishing a trusting relationship with both of us and thoroughly went over medical history/concerns. My son let the dentist clean his teeth, then the dentist showed me how he diagnosed my son's tongue tie that had been over looked since infancy and took a lot of time discussing options.

name: Alex Izzo
text: Dr. Curtis was awesome with my daughter! He took time to explain all my questions and concerns. The only problem was my daughter didn't want to leave his office! She loved it there!

name: Ashley Rosa

name: Jason Shaw

text: Dr. Curtis is not just a doctor, he’s a teacher. I love how we discuss my little one’s dental needs. He has an amazing bedside manner. I always walk away feeling like an empowered Mom. His Dad was a Pediatric Dentist and his Dad’s Dad as well! I can’t imagine finding A better dentist in the ENTIRE world. ❤️❤️❤️

text: I love the atmosphere. The place was so clean and organized. The people are sooooooo nice and friendly, and the dentist is the sweetest person!!!! I love taking my children here

name: Tipp Love

text: Great dentist and vet modern office. The boys always like going to their appointment. The staff is friendly and professional. They play cool movies on all the TVs, which helps distracting the patients 😀

name: Mocha S
text: Dr. Curtis is AWESOME!!!

name: Nicholle Robertson
text: Our family absolutely loves Dr. Curtis and his staff! I honestly can not say enough good things about this office. I have three children who see Dr. Curtis, and they are always excited to go to the dentist. My 5 year old is autistic, and had horrible experiences with dentists in the past. She was terrified of anyone trying to look in her mouth, it was a very tough battle for us. Dr. Curtis was so patient, he builds his patient's trust and will NEVER ever force them to do anything. He plays with the kids and they just love him! My daughter, who used to scream if anyone tried to go near her mouth, now climbs in his lap and let's him polish and look at her teeth. This man is an angel I swear. He is a wonderful Pediatric Dentist, thank you, Dr. Curtis!!

Such a great staff and Dr!

text: Dr Curtis is very knowledgeable regarding lip and tongue ties and did a wonderful job revising our 2 week old’s ties. I highly recommend him!

text: Dr. Curtis is the best pediatric dentist I have came acrossed he takes the time to evaluate and assess any issues that you may have he cares for your child as if it was his own make sure everything that he does is done right I would recommend him to anyone who has a child if I could give more stars I would say he's a 10

text: Dr. Curtis and his staff are amazing and have so much patience with these littles. You will not be disappointed!

text: We had our first visit today, unfortunately we’re moving so we can’t go anymore, but what a wonderful experience. I was early, and was out by the time my appointment was supposed to start. Everyone was so friendly!

name: Deanna Resler
text: My children have had Dr.Curtis for years when he was in Florence had to switch when I heard he was near us in Madison he takes special care of all 3 of my children's needs and they love going to the Dentist........ What more could you ask for😊

name: Melinda Beck
text: Friendly staff and great dentist.  My teenagers even enjoy going to the dentist!

name: Paige Richardson
text: Wonderful staff !! Everything was smooth and perfect with no tears !

name: youknowit158
text:
Today was my first time bringing my children to this dentist, and I am extremely happy that I chose this place. My daughter, who is not normally a fan of the dentist, was by the end of this appointment was looking forward to coming back again. My daughter was so calm and relaxed at the end, which I have never seen her like that at the end of a dentist visit.  One thing that I loved about this place if they had when Kid had a cavity and they didn't make me feel like a bad parent for it, you know those judgy looks that you will get? I didn't get any judge he looks here.

With a super friendly staff Dr. Curtis made a routine cleaning and check up a fun time for my kids. I would highly recommend checking out this place if you are looking for a GREAT pediatric dentist!

resp.text: Thank you for this great review! All of us are parents also, and none of us are perfect. We are glad that you left our office feeling as comfortable as your children.

name: Sonia Ramirez

name: Heather Hollis
text:
I went here for a free treatment plan for new patient 2 years ago, I was given a two-page treatment plan, there were a lot of things on there I did not need and a bunch of teeth listed on there that had no problems at all ...

Then a couple months ago I went to Complete Dental and got a treatment plan, literally one page with nine teeth listed, minimum treatment at that.. they were accurate and did not list teeth that had no problems in order to fraudulently charged people with no insurance.. I'm sticking with Complete Dental from now on and I won't be going back to Aspen that's for sure. I mean Aspen had Dental code d4341 which is periodontal scaling and root planning 4 plus teeth, listed four times for each section of my mouth... I did not need scaling and replanting at all at the other place. Another thing that really made me mad was that the teeth they x-rayed 2 years ago and Aspen dental, there's a bunch of three surface composite d2393 codes listed and at complete dental, none of these teeth were listed as teeth with cavities. I examined my x-ray from both places and Aspen was really trying to charge me for teeth that had no problems. I just don't know why they do that... That makes people not want to return.

Complete Dental listed 10 items on my treatment plan, x-ray taking last month.. Aspen Dental listed 35 items on a treatment plan that was taken 2 years ago from today. You tell me who you would choose

resp.text: Thank you for being in touch, Heather. The well-being of our patients is our priority, and we value your feedback. We will share your thoughts with our teams with an eye to always do what we can to improve the patient experience. This is not the experience we want for our patients. If at any point now or in the future you would also like to speak with our Patient Satisfaction team, their direct phone number is 1-866-767-0890. Be well. - Cindy ADMI

resp.text: Thank you, Brandy, for saying you will recommend us. This is the highest form of appreciation, from our patients, that we receive! We take patient satisfaction very seriously, thanks again. - Cindy, ADMI

They also wanted to do root canal, 2 or three crowns all of which came to $6000 after insurance. They said they could do nothing until I had cleaning and did nothing for broken tooth. name: Alison
text: I really liked the dentist that looked at me but I feel like Aspen is more concerned with upselling their patients than the patient’s overall dental health.  They said I needed a special kind of deep cleaning instead of just a normal cleaning which is fine and great until I was informed that the special deep cleaning was going to cost me over me $200! With my dental insurance 2 cleanings and X-rays are included with my dental insurance at no cost to me as preventive care.  When the dentist told me that she wanted me to get a special kind deep cleaning I figured it was covered under one of my cleanings.  I had no idea that particular cleaning was going to cost me over $200.  So when the office manager made me aware that when I came back in for that kind of cleaning I would need to be prepared to pay over $200 because it wasn’t considered preventive care but basic care because it was a deep cleaning.  I told her that wasn’t explained to me an I wanted to change my treatment plan back to just a normal cleaning.  The office manger said that the treatment plan couldn’t be changed without the dentist approval so she went an asked the dentist.  The dentist refused to change the treatment plan to just a normal cleaning.  At first I thought well maybe I am in need of the special kind of deep cleaning until I sought a second opinion from someone in the periodontal field and they informed me that a normal cleaning would suffice just fine.  So, with that being said I feel like they were trying to upsell me especially since they refused to do any kind of cleaning unless I agreed to pay over $200 for the deep clean! I had to make another appointment with another dentist so I could get the care I need.  More of my time spent on something I had already done.  This whole situation stinks and should be unacceptable!  Dental health is so expensive and stuff like this just makes it more difficult!  Aspen Dental and some of the other companies like them have a reputation for this but I was still willing to give them a chance. Unfortunately, the reputation that proceeds them was proven to be right!

resp.text: Thank you for being in touch, Alison. The well-being of our patients is our priority, and we value your feedback. We will share your thoughts with our teams with an eye to always do what we can to improve the patient experience. This is not the experience we want for our patients. If at any point now or in the future you would also like to speak with our Patient Satisfaction team, their direct phone number is 1-866-767-0890. Be well. - Cindy ADMI

name: Sherry Huckaba
text: I was thinking the quote they gave me was for my dentures were both top and bottom, but was told after 4 months that my bottoms were going to cost  me over 4000.00 and I still paying on my dental card  for what I thought was for both.i left there almost in tears .because know I have to do without my full set of dentures until I can afford get them hopefully I can someone that's cheaper or can work on payment..just wished I had been told that it was for both ,and I had asked was that price for both and was assured it was ..

name: Tim McCarley
text: 10 days to get an emergency appointment then they rescheduled.  Took X-rays turned out if they had just looked at my record with them they would have prescribed meds and made a referral to another doctor who is more capable but  no.  Doctor never looked at me only X-rays.  Does not know how to provide IRS formatted statements for FSA payments after repeatedly asking for the correct documentation.  Bottom line workers are nice, doctors are rentals who may not be there the next time and don’t seem to care.  I’ve spent $2700 out of pocket over the year with other dependents care with Aspen.I come in with an emergency tooth pain which can be saved but all they could do was extract it. Without sedation. And no pain meds till antibiotics have took care of the infection Love those options.  Done with it. Now my tooth and my but huts and they got paid for nothing.  It might be convenient but it’s not the level of service you should expect when you are basically bringing them insurance that pays well and they get theres but you might find yourself in the same shape as when you walked in.  Buyer beware

resp.text: I am so sorry Tim, this was not the experience we want for our patients. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

resp.text: I'm happy to hear that. Thanks for sharing! - Cindy, ADMI

name: Tonja Murdock
text: Staff is terrific, office manager great with explaining charges.  I was very happy with the service, and "bedside manner" of the employees and dentist.  After my extractions, I don't know what happened to the dentist, but they can not see patients now because there is no dentist in the office.  I received a text that they would have to cancel my appointment and will reschedule, but it seems they have left all of their patients in the dark.  I was so impressed with this office until this.  They really should be reaching out to their patients with some kind of update, especially since the full service has already been paid.

resp.text: I'm happy to hear that, Tonja. Thanks for sharing! - Dawn, ADMI

name: Leann Bachman
text:
I used Aspen 7 years ago because they was awesome... Since then I have been to several around the country... I have changed to Affordable Dentures & Implants... The majority of the Aspen staff is very nice... Every time there are 1 or 2 in the office that treat the customers awful, myself and others I’ve observed... As a person who has spent my life in customer service I would not refer anyone to Aspen!!!
😢💯😢

name: Cynthia Mote
text: After requesting pain medication three days after three teeth were extracted (one sawed) and infection set in, I was called a liar and treated like a drug addict. Very Humiliating.

resp.text: I am so sorry Cynthia, this was not the experience we want for our patients. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

name: melissa leslie
text: I recently had my 1st root canal. I was anxious but it was nothing like I thought it was going to be. I felt no pain and the girls were so nice that took care of me. I love Aspen Dental.

resp.text: I'm happy to hear that, Melissa. Thanks for sharing! - Dawn, ADMI

name: Joey Wise
text:
This place was not for me
My insurance covers for x-rays and for dental cleanings twice to year 12 years I've been going to Monrovia family dentist I've never been charged and aspen dental just charged 253 said insurance wouldn't cover it because it's a peredontal cleaning I said well I would just like to have a regular cleaning  and they refused to do a regular cleaning and said I would have to pay for that and they were charging me in advance for it and not seeing  me till next week so after I paid for everything I turned around and canceled it and got a refund
They done this to a friend of mine as we went together
His was 217 paid in advanced
Got it canceled
Guess I will continue to go all the way out to Monrovia  I was hoping to be able to use this insurance as they accept it and I'm 2 streets over from this place. This place is more or less a place to process people in as fast as they can charge what they can get out of you and then send you out the door don't even do the work the same day set you up for a different day

resp.text: I'm sorry that your experience didn't live up to expectations. We value your feedback, and I will pass your message along to the team so they can address concerns. - Michelle, ADMI

name: Pamela Battle
text: Everyone I encountered on my visit there, 5 different people total were super nice and friendly.   I did not want to drive 40mins there but insurance required it and im so glad they all made it such a pleasant visit

resp.text: I'm glad you enjoyed your visit, Pamela. Patient satisfaction is very important to Aspen Dental practices, and it's great to hear that the team helped you have a 5-star experience. - Dawn, ADMI

name: Bridget Miller
text: Everyone was nice and kind on my first day.I Thank you all!!!!!

resp.text: I'm so glad the Aspen Dental team in Decatur made a great first impression, Bridget! Thanks for sharing. - Krista, ADMI

text: They really do care and try their best to keep costs down. For a firm that sees so many patients, that is rare.

name: Linda parker
text: I was very disappointed. They said I needed $1800 of dental work. Had to pay $386 for a partial cleaning. I got checked buy another  Dentist without telling him l had been to Aspen. All I needed was a cleaning. He even had to clean what Aspen had already cleaned. He only charged $75.

resp.text: I'm really sorry to hear that, Linda. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Dawn, ADMI

name: Jeckel Nunya
text:
Absolute nightmare!  The office manager Brady is awful.  He acts like giving out any information is illegal.  I have never had such issues trying to obtain information about the simplest dental questions!  Aspen Dental Decatur is not going to get my business.  That man should be FIRED.

Edit to respond to message below - I DID call yesterday and left a message.  Dawn called me back, promised that she would have more information for me by 3:30 yesterday.  NO CALL as of today.

Now I am being told that I must have additional work done before they can start on the procedure we discussed.  I was in that office for three hours and no one mentioned that.

resp.text: I am sorry you did not have a positive experience; We would really like to speak with you about it.  Will you please call us at 1-866-767-0890 Thank you! ADMI

text: The staff was friendly and knowledgeable. The service was great. The office manager helped me determine a treatment plan considering my insurance coverage and my personal financial capabilities. Very helpful!

text: Loved it. She had small hands and I liked that. Aspen Dental (Great place)

text: Didn't like the long times between people seeing me.

name: Grace A Fugate
text: I would never go again. They do not work together to communicate as a team. Too commercialized for their own good. Walked in for a cleaning and walked out with a 20,000 estimate and no work done. Got 3 different opinions while there. Dentist looked to be early 20"s and seemed to know more than anyone else there.

resp.text: I'm sorry to hear that, Grace. Thank you for sharing your feedback with us so that we can continue to improve patient experiences. - Julie, ADMI

name: Angie Villafane
text: Normally I'm terrified of going to the dentist. It's really the only place that scares me to death. The staff was so kind and really went out of their way to make me feel at ease. I had put off going for too long because of my fears. Dr Ross was so nice and funny. Shes extremely good at giving the shots. I didn't even feel them at all. I had prepared myself for the worse. It never happened. I broke my tooth months back and I just couldn't bring myself to go. So I got the courage up to go and it turned out I just needed a filling. Thank you Decatur Alabama Aspen Dental for being a dentist office i can truly tell everyone about being absolutely great and meaning it 100%.

resp.text: It's so nice to hear this, Angie. I'm glad you felt at ease and were able to make your oral health a priority despite your fears. - Emily, ADMI

text: Everyone was wonderful!  They had amazing patients with my mother who has dementia.  Office is very neat and clean,  very organized. I would recommend Aspen Dental to anyone looking for a dentist.  😁🤗

text: They are a rip-off tell you one price and then come back charge you $$$. More.  Don't go here ! I called the better business bureau   They took my complaint and told me to call dental board on them.  I ask anyone else to do the same that got told one price and then owed lots more.

name: Reginald Priest
text: They were very nice and none intimidating, very Informative  and made me feel excited. That was a year ago. Now this year the real truth. Ok I had insurance all i wanted was a cleaning and counsel on future services.  Well they talked me into financing this upgrade on my teeth it was gonna cost me almost 10,000.00 dollars. I signed and payed my monthly payments,   the office closed for Corona virus so reschedule over and over again because the virus and work schedule  after the third reschedule they told me they could no longer see me still the financing company wanted payments. It was a awful experience.  Dont go there. Go to a local privately owned dentist.

text: I cannot say enough about this crew! My last experience at a different dental office was HORRIBLE and they worked so hard to make me comfortable going to the dentist again. The insurance people were also great to work with, but I cant remember their names!  😁

text: So far their service has been excellent. Front desk had answered all my questions even when I called 5 minutes after leaving the office. I am terrified of dentist, but Dr. Narissa Ross was very friendly and professional. I had 10 teeth pulled at the same time and she made it as painless as possible. All of the assistant's in the office was very nice. They always had a smile. I would recommend them to anyone who needed dental service.

resp.text: That's so nice to hear, Dena. It’s great that you felt at ease with the team, and I hope that you continue to have 5-star experiences. - Emily, ADMI

name: Kenneth Clayton
text: They were very friendly and professional

name: Shirley Bates
text: Very nice & polite. Showing they care about you and was very helpful to me.

resp.text: I'm glad you enjoyed your visit, Shirley. Thanks for sharing! - Emily, ADMI

name: Jacob Hanley
text: HORRIBLE!!! I came in for a cleaning (First Visit) and they took x-rays. After waiting around 30 minutes after receiving x-rays, they came in and informed me that my teeth looked great with ZERO cavities. The lady who cleans teeth came in and looked at my teeth and said that I had some kind of bacteria (I don't know how in the world you can determine by looking at teeth what kind of bacteria they have without placing under a microscope). I said okay when can you clean my teeth? She said she would be right back that she would get it set up. While waiting patiently, I hear her in another room telling someone else they have the same kind of bacteria and would need advance cleaning. After waiting they informed me that my teeth would need an advance cleaning and it would cost $281 to have my teeth cleaned after my insurance (MY INSURANCE COVERS 100% of basic care including cleanings). Basically, for first appointments and cleanings, they tell all of their patients the same thing to try and drag as much money out as possible. After this I was not going to post a review, but I decided to go with another dentist and have called them 5 times to have my x-rays emailed, but they keep insisting that they have emailed them, but have not. They are completely dishonest and are trying to charge almost $300 for a teeth cleaning that shouldn't be over $50-$100. Please save your money and go somewhere else. I asked, "Can I not just receive a regular teeth cleaning that my insurance company covers?". They explained company policy that they are not allowed to give regular teeth cleanings for first visits, so basically they lie and tell everyone they have some kind of bacteria. PLEASE SAVE YOURSELF TIME AND MONEY AND GO SOMEWHERE ELSE

resp.text:
Jacob,
Thank you for providing this information.  I would really like to speak with you.  Will you please call me at (844) 296-0187 ext. 201152 — Julie, ADMI

name: Kimberly Rivers
text: The hygienist was superior. Dr. Ross excellent.    I only have one complaint.  Aspen does not offer the nitrous oxide.  For a person like me this makes a big difference

name: Randy Harrod
text: Super nice people! Very friendly and they encouraged me to relax as they review what is in my best interest, to correct various problems with my teeth! Unfortunately, my severe gag reflex, will not let me continue with this caring group of people! But Dr. Ross searched a local dentist, that uses sedation in order to correct my teeth! Thanks to the Aspen group in Decatur, Al. for their assistance! Sincerely, Randy Harrod

name: CedCritt In Real Life
text: 0 stars if I could. The staff was so dry. No emotion. Almost like robots. The dentists were not rude, but they wasn’t friendly either. Kinda had the feeling that no one really knew what they were doing. My overall impression is that they were there for one reason.......to get as much money out me as they could. I went to get some work done even though it was only my initial visit. I had $1800 in my pocket because I already knew what I wanted when I got there. Once I saw it was a money mill I pretended like I couldn’t pay for ANYTHING that day. Different are going to have different opinions. I’m not trying to influence else’s opinion of the place. I’m merely expressing my experience. I wouldn’t recommend Aspen Dental to anyone. Not even an enemy.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention,  I am sorry you did not have a good experience. I will certainly pass this information along to management. Thank you — Kelly, ADMI

text: Dr. Ross and the staff in the back were very friendly and nice,  but the office girl up front was not friendly at all. A little smile and thank you when I gave her my papers, that I filled out at home, is not going to hurt anyone.

name: Renee Thomas
text: This was my first visit. I was expecting to go in, get a procedure done and leave. Instead, I got a free initial exam, and everyone explained things to me and listened to my concerns, my fears, and my input on what they were telling me. The doctor and hygentist, office manager, and dental assistants were all very professional. Because of my dental issues, I will have my first procedure done in two days, and I have confidence that they will do a great job and help me ease my fears of the dentist.

name: Charles Key
text: Went in yesterday for my first exam.  Everybody was very friendly and knowledgeable. I have allot of work to be done and the prices seem to be good.

name: H P
text: Told me I had a ‘dangerous gum disease’ and that the dentist would be in shortly to tell me ‘what procedure’ would be necessary.  They were talking about gingivitis LOL.  Flossed and rinsed vigorously for 2 weeks and done for about $7.  This place just tries to scare you in to paying more and squeezing visits and procedures out of you. Find a you a local dentist- you’ll be glad you did.

resp.text: I'm sorry you felt that way, Hannah. We value your feedback, and I will pass your message along to our Patient Satisfaction team. - Emily, ADMI

name: Lisa Mitchell
text: As always, service was amazing!  Everyone I have had contact with is professional and courteous.

name: Shakethia Norton
text: I went in for a procedure that I thought was supposed to be a total procedure: Bridge work, deep cleaning, etc. It was explained to me before going that the cost of the procedure was 1000 plus dollars but both insurances would pay the cost of up to 900 and some change. Nothing was explained in detail to me. I got the deep cleaning that i know damn well doesn't cost 1000.00 and it was only one cleaning!  I received a bill in the mail for 454.00.  Now my teeth feel worse after having my teeth pulled and the cleaning...I will be finding another dentist immediately and i should have listened to the reviews.

resp.text: I'm so glad to hear that the team put you at ease and helped you have a positive experience. Enjoy your future visits, Shakethia! - Emily, ADMI

name: leslie russell
text: Very professional! Very sweet! Made a grown nervous woman feel at ease! Thanks for a good experience ❤️

name: Chyna Corum
text: Went in today for my six month cleaning. Since I’d been in last December, they have new doctors and I wasn’t aware, which is fine. However, I’ve had fillings done and the new doctors have no record of the last filling that I had and are wanting to fill and make me repay for a tooth even after it’s already been filled. I feel as if they’re trying to make me think I’m crazy when I know for a fact that I went in to have that specific tooth filled. When I asked them what was it I paid for then, they told me they didn’t know because they weren’t there at that time. So in their minds, there was a doctor messing around in my mouth, telling me he was filling a tooth when he really didn’t? They are also saying I have another cavity that I wasn’t aware I had (they didn’t find it this time, apparently it’s been there sometime but I’m assuming the previous doctors didn’t tell me or it’s not true??). Aspen was fine when I first went to them a little over a year ago but I feel that they have become very unprofessional. I don’t understand how they can just tell patients that they didn’t have a specific work done just because there’s no record of it because they changed doctors. I will not be paying twice for work that I know for a fact that I had done. I will be finding a new dentist that doesn’t have multiple doctors in and out. Dr. A at Aspen informed that I would see doctors come and go from there and I’d much rather be at a facility that has the same doctor(s) so that I don’t have this unprofessionalism.

name: chiquta mosley
text: The staff was very friendly and when I say Dr.Ross was Great!!!! she was Great!!! .Didn't feel any pain at all.

resp.text: We’re happy to know you had a great experience, Chiquta.  Thank you for sharing! – Courtney, ADMI

name: Joyce Wilson
text: Very professional while also personable. Explained in terms a layperson found understandable. State of the art facility; yet comfortable and concerned with my confusion. Lovely staff /Denise! and of course Dr. Green.  Would  recommend to my own family.

name: Misty Davis
text:
It was a great experience. I've suffered for a few years with 2 top plates that never fit & were very uncomfortable, & crooked. (I tried going with a nationally advertised, cheaper same day service). Cheaper is not always better!! I set up an appointment, got in the next day. Everyone was very professional, caring, & understanding. They done everything to make me comfortable & to meet my needs. Needless to say after being there nearly 4 hours, I walked out with a great big smile, new denture, no adhesive, I can honestly say my experience was a blessing! Also the staff was super excited for me. They made sure everything was perfect, to my standards. (They even stayed a few minutes late to accomodate me).
Still Smiling!!!!😁😁😁😁😁

name: SHANAAH CHEREE
text: The staff is so friendly and inviting! They make you feel welcome regardless of what your teeth look like. I would recommend it over most dentists in my area.

name: Jason Keltner
text: They're extremely overpriced and a little bit rude I did not appreciate the fact that I feel that they were only worried about money even the staff is very polite the the financial consultant however is very rude

resp.text: I am sorry you did not have a positive experience; If would like to discuss the care plan you received during your visit or you need any additional care in the future, we’d still be happy to help. You can reach me directly at (844) 296-0187 ext. 201706. — Dawn, ADMI

text: Very nice people here....thank you all and Mrs.Regina

name: Terrill Borden
text: They were very nice and thorough with me on my exam I would recommend them to anyone

name: B Walker
text: Their office make you feel welcome and don't charge you a high price.  I checked with a dental office on Spartman St in Hartselle, Alabama and they wanted $235.00 to pull one tooth, I needed 13 teeth pulled and I would of had a fortune just in the pulling of these teeth.  I highly recommend Aspen Dental in Decatur, Alabama they are 5 stars in my opinion.

text: Very clean with all new equipment.  The staff was very helpful and accommodating. The only negative I have (and I understand it’s not the fault of the local office) was I believe that it’s a bit pricey. I sure wish we did have to travel all the way to Decatur to visit the dentist.

resp.text: Hi Pete, I'm glad you had an overall positive experience. Aspen Dental practices do ensure their prices meet or beat market prices, but we do understand that cost is the main reason that patients avoid going to the dentist. If you have any questions about your care plan, don't hesitate to call your local office. - Emily, ADMI

name: Beverly Gonzalez
text: My experiences at Aspen Dental have been nothing short of great! In the past, I had suffered so many traumas from going to the dentist that I would have anxiety attacks just thinking about going. And, the cost that came with those visits, to me was not worth it. Well, Aspen Dental of Decatur changed all that for me! From the moment I stepped into their friendly staffed office on the Beltline; I was treated like a star. The receptionist was professional and polite. Ashley, the ex-ray tech, did everything to make me feel comfortable without making me feel "shamed" for the poor condition of my teeth. Dr. Tara Cochran (who will, probably, be my dentist for the rest of my life..I hope), she gave me all the necessary information so that I could make a good choice in my dental plan. And, Tawana, their VERY helpful, professional office manager helped me find a third-party finance party that gave me a VERY reasonable payment plan. NOW, I have a beautiful smile in the works thanks to Dr. Cochran, Chloe, Claire, Ashley, Savana, and Sean! I know that this is a long review, but I just want everyone who reads this, and you need ANY type of dental care; go to Aspen Dental of Decatur. You will not regret it.

resp.text: That's wonderful to hear, Beverly! Thank you for sharing! -- Kelsey, ADMI

name: JRJ
text:
Unfortunately, Decatur, Al. office does not perform implant dentures. I was redirected to the Cullman, Al. office which is  a further drive. Plus the visit was .a waste of a lot of time. Driving to and fro, and waiting to be seen  by the DR. I am disabled and do not drive but short distances  so this also involved another person's time.  Your staff was nice and  friendly.  Although
when i first made the appointment I was told this office did do implant dentures, I informed them I currently have  5 implants now. But wasn't redirected to call the Cullman office.
Thanks

Well now that I got the comfy lites that don't fit no better they sending me a bill for 2000.00 for the balance and the upgrade to the better ones. The staff is very nice and professional but their new manager is a different story. It's on my chart and I've tried to call and talk to the office manager and explain this they told me it wouldn't cost me nothing. And ever who answers these reviews isn't nice either! Ok now that I paid the 385.00 apparently they are charging me another 565.00 for the upgrade and have turned it over to collections! I don't understand why they say one thing and turn around and do another. I will not recommend them to anybody again. Something ain't right when all the employees go to somewhere else.

Plus state bill over $2000 but doesn't provide and itemized copy for you too review very shady....

name: Arielle Cain
text: The office manager is horrible. I had a root canal completed at another location. Fast forward and I begin to have issues with the tooth that had the root canal. I call the Decatur office (I now live closer to this location, unfortunately) and specifically ask if they will be able to address an issue that another location serviced. The office manager encourages me to come to their office for the issue. A month goes by and it is the day of my appointment. I call and ask if I may come in early since I finished up with work early. The receptionist puts me on hold to speak with the office manager.(DUM, DUM, DUM...*music fit for a villain begins to play**not really, but it should have*) He begins to say that they can't work on the issue and I would need to visit the Aspen Dental location that completed the root canal. ( If you're reading this Greg, in the future you might want to do your research about your company's policies before wasting another person's time) The office manager goes on to tell me that he called and left a voicemail yesterday to tell me all of this information. And I told him that I didn't have a missed call or voicemail from him. And that I thought it was ironic that the other five calls that we exchanged a month ago were never missing from my phone. Only now that I explain that I am irritated that when I called a month ago he gave me a different answer are his call and voicemail from yesterday "magically" absent from my phone. He proceeds to say, "well I know for a fact that I called and left a voicemail." To which I respond, " I know for a fact that I don't have a missed call or voicemail. He then laughs sarcastically. So I told him, " since he thought it was appropriate to speak to me that way then I decided to respond in the same manor." And the conversation ends with him telling me that they will not ever see me in their office. If I could give zero stars, I would. If he would have just apologized and not smarted off, I would have been understanding. Extremely horrible experience. I hope the office manager deals with a similar incident differently in the future. Too bad this compliant won't see the light of day in a performance review.

name: Melissa Simmons
text: I went in last Saturday to get 4 wisdom tooth removed when I got back in the room for them to proceed to do the procedure I feel it was a rush job and they was just ready to go home dr. Kelly had no bedside manners in my opinion she was just ready to clock out to me I feel as if she was trying to talk me out of it after I paid cash money with no insurance to get it done after about four to five days at home I noticed the back of my teeth had a funny taste with something coming out of them I put a napkin in my mouth to find that it was yellow stuff coming out of it I immediately called the office on a Saturday during business hours no one ever picked up the phone after I got off work I proceeded to call back that night in the answering service picked up and I told her that someone needed to get in contact with me because it was an emergency and what the situation was this was Sunday it is now 4:10 p.m. Monday and no one has still contacted me I went to the emergency room on Sunday night and they told me the antibiotic that I got with the procedure that I had I should not have that antibiotic they put me on more antibiotics of which I had to pay for my ER visit but long story short I wouldn't recommend taking a dog to this place with no one contact you about an emergency that is a red flag!!!!!

name: Melissa Rhoades
text: I have to give a shout out to Dentists 4 Children.  My grandson was very nervous when told he had an abscessed baby tooth that needed to be removed before it damaged his permanent tooth.  Not sure where to go, we contacted Dentists 4 Children.  The office staff was very helpful in the appointment process, getting him in quickly.  Even though my grandson was terrified of the unknown , the staff eased his fear of having a tooth removed, reassuring him he was going to be fine.  My grandson came out smiling, and stated it didn't even hurt.  They also found some other dental issues that needed to be address.  He had such a great experience that it was no hassle getting him back for his next visit.  If you are looking for a professional dentist office for kids, I encourage you to give Dentist 4 Children a try.  Dr. Thornton and her staff is amazing!  I just had to brag and say "Thank you" for making my grandson's experience a good one to remember:)!!

name: •kara•

name: brittany wiilliams
text: visited here this pass Monday with my child really didn't like the fact that no parent is allowed in the back with your small child although,in a previous visit i was allowed but for some reason now its no longer allowed. Front desk check in woman seems to me to be a bit racist or didn't want to be bothered with a black parent at the moment cause when i watched her interact with the other parent behind me she seemed to not have the same manner with her . Will be taking my daughter to a dentist with a better atmosphere.

name: A Newell
text: Dr. Thornton is truly gifted in dentistry! I have taken my children here now for 5 years and wish I had started there to begin with. I originally went to another pediatric dentist, and we ended up having troubles with the quality of work. Dr. Thornton however is a life saver. She is amazing with kids and her staff are also. I actually  have kids that like the      dentist now!!!! Truly!!!! My  kids have had to have teeth pulled for braces, exposures for braces, and all their regular cleanings. Not one tear !!!!!! Both my kids say they never felt any shots because of the numbing jelly and and I think this office is awesome!! When kids walk out with bloody gauze and smiles, you know it's good. I can't recommend them enough, honest. What a relief to know my kids are not going to be fearful of a dentist all their life. If your kids have teeth and you want the best for them, this is the place and Dr.Thornton is the dentist

name: Lisa Davis
text: My daughter absolutely loves Dr. Heather and the staff.  She's been a patient of theirs since she was 3 years old.  She's never had a bad experience and so she actually loves going to the dentist.  She's even had a filling and that was such a great experience that it didn't dampen her love of being there.  The office staff is super friendly and have always been helpful and have accommodated our needs to the best of their ability. I would highly recommend this dental practice!

name: Allison Hollis
text: My children have been going to this office for several years and I couldn't be more pleased!  We have never had anything but the best care from the Dentist, and the ladies up front are so nice and helpful.  The Assistants and Hygienist are amazing, making sure to always put my children at ease and explain everything that will be happening that day.  If you want great dental care and a great family atmosphere I'd highly recommend them!

name: Breanna Warren
text: I would not have even given them one star. We had an unexpected death in our family and my son had a dental appointment he missed because of this. Clearly our mind was not on the dental appointment. Friday when I realized he had missed it I tried to call but they were closed, I called back Monday to explain what happened and they refused to see him even after explaining the circumstance. Disrespectful!

name: J McCormick
text: Truly a loving and caring practice. They put the well being of the child above everything else. They are honest about the things that have to be done and need to be done. Dr. Thornton is the only dentist for my kids. Have had other dentist with bad experiences so much that they did not want to go to a dentist when they were small, but Dr. Thornton and her staff eradicated those fears. We have been going there for almost 11 years now. Only have one problem. They only handle pediatric patients. My oldest is 17 and will soon have to find a 'grown up" dentist and I don't know how well that is going to work out for her! They adore "Dr. Heather" and its going to be a hard sell for someone else to fill that place.

name: Carolyn Wilson
text: My son has always had good, even enjoyable, experiences going to the dentist thanks to the Dentists 4 Children staff.  Dr. Thornton is very thorough and attentive and fun!  And they recommended us to a great orthodontist group too.  Our son's mouth was overcrowded.  Dr. Thornton fully prepared him ahead of time for braces.  I truly believe her careful pre-planning in this area highly contributed to our son only needing to wear braces for the minimally required time.  He got them off this year and has a beautiful smile!

name: mankus777
text: I took my one year old for his first check and everyone was so nice! The ladies in the back all talked to him and made us feel welcome. Dr. Thornton was so sweet and thorough in her check and made me feel better about our teeth care at home. Dr. Vann saw us once for an emergency and took great care to inform us and make us feel at ease. Can't wait to take my little one back!

name: Leigh Ann Parsons
text: i highly recommend Dr. Heather Thornton and her staff.  Their office is friendly, warm and very professional.  My daughters ages 12 and 15 have been patients of Dr. Thornton since their very first teeth cleaning at age 2.   They have always enjoyed their dental appointments and cleanings.  We love Dentists 4 Children.

name: Brad Cole
text: Our experience here over the last 8 years has always been great. All of the doctors and Dr. Thornton in particular have gone out of their way to make us and our children feel at ease. We wouldn't consider using any other dental practice

name: Robin Darby
text: My son enjoys going to get his teeth cleaned at Dentists 4 Children.  Professional staff, exceptional service, clean and child-friendly environment. The hygienists and doctors have all been very patient and loving to our family.

name: Dodey Roughton
text: We absolutely love Dr. Thornton and the entire office staff!  Everyone from the reception area to the hygienist to the billing/check out area is so friendly.  I trust Dr. T to the utmost as she has always treated my children as she would her own!  I'm a Type A/OCD  mom and Dr. Thornton has never made me feel crazy :)  It definitely feels like family and my girls love it too!!

name: Stephanie Johnson
text: Wonderful dentist office and staff.  My youngest son chipped a front tooth a couple of years ago.  Dr. Thornton has always been concerned with the amount of anguish he is experiencing as we try and file the bonding to make them even.  She really cares about her patients!!  She's done a wonderful job in doing what he can tolerate and it looks great.  She always takes the time to answer mine and his questions.

name: Lindsay Lyons
text: Doctors and staff here are wonderful! They understand that a trip to the dentist can be a stress time for your little ones and they go out of their way to be sure that it goes as smoothly as possible for everyone. I would highly recommend this office to anyone looking for quality, friendly dental care.

name: Catherine Watts
text: We couldn’t be more pleased with our experiences at Dentists 4 Children. Dr. Thornton has gone above and beyond to ensure our children receive the best care in a compassionate atmosphere. She even coordinates care with our orthodontist and oral surgeons to ensure all our children’s dental needs are met.

text: Have always gone here and always have had a great experience.  Office staff as well as dental staff have always been courteous and professional. The waiting room is always clean.  We love Dr. Thornton!

text: My kids have been going to Dr. Thornton for years now. After a bad experience from another dentist office, we made the switch to Dentists 4 Children.  I'm so glad we made the decision to switch. My kids no longer dread going. In fact, my daughter asked me just this morning if it was time to have her teeth cleaned.  We love Dentists 4 Children!

text: I have always had a great experience taking my children to Dentist 4 Children. The staff is always friendly, and they do a thorough job. Our appointments are on time, with minimal wait.

text: We love Dr. Thornton! All the staff are great with children, the office is very kid friendly, and Dr. Thornton is great at what she does! I highly recommend for children of all ages.

name: Jamie Taylor
text: Love Dr. Thornton and Dentists 4 Children. I have six children and although going to the dentist can be unnerving for some kids, none of mine have ever had an issue with going to the dentist, thanks to the great Doctors and staff at Dentists 4 Children!

name: Robin Swicord
text: My children have always had a pleasent experience and the staff has always been helpful. We love Dr. Thornton and the rest of the staff.

name: Danine Bruner
text: My twins are about to be 12 and they have come here since they were 3. We have always had to have morning appts because my son has special needs. As a special education teacher of preK children, I understand the need for earlier appts for younger children and those with special needs....they are more tired in the afternoon and not as calm. I also understand the reason parents are not allowed back in the treatment area. Many times in the morning, the children will cry for their parents to stay when dropped off at school. The longer the parent stays, the more they cry. Within a few minutes after parents leave, they have stopped crying. I feel the best thing a parent can do is to prepare their child for a new experience by telling them something like "I love you and want you and your teeth to be healthy. I am taking you to the dentist so your teeth can be healthy. I will not be able to go back there with you, but I would never take you to someone who would hurt you. When you go back remember that they are there to keep you healthy. I will be right there to get you when you are finished."

name: George Lawton
text: We have 3 kids (7yo and 5yo twins) and found Dr. Jeff shortly after having bad experiences with 2 previous dentists. Nothing serious, but were ultimately unable to have kid's teeth cleaned due to tears and resisting. They were immediately disarmed by this office's decor, tvs, and theme. You can tell from the pic that they not only got their teeth cleaned but actually enjoyed it! We've recommended Dr. Jeff many times and everyone that goes has had the same reaction. Do yourself a favor, don't take the kids anywhere else.

resp.text: We love your family! Thanks so much for the kind words. We love making dentistry fun!!

name: Amber McLeod
text:
We have loved our time with Oak Mountain Pediatric Dentistry! We came from an office we didn't trust, so we wanted to find somewhere we could trust with our girls. This office is absolutely the best! They are all caring, kind, and genuinely concerned for your kids' health and happiness. They go out of their way to ensure you have a great experience.

We had a scary accident with our toddler when she chipped a tooth that ended up having to be pulled. Dr. Flannery was so patient in answering all 100 of my questions and reassuring me that we were making the right decision. For the extraction, he was very sweet and gentle with my daughter. They really helped us navigate this scary experience!

We will never see another dentist!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review! We love your sweet girl and so glad we could help!

text: We had our first appointment with Dr. Jeff and his staff yesterday. He had to fill two cavities for my five year old son. It was my little boy’s first time being numbed and Dr. Jeff took his time to explain everything to him to ease his nerves. Then he did an excellent job filling the cavities and being patient with my son. The entire office was so sweet and made us feel comfortable. I went ahead and scheduled cleanings for both of my children there before we left. I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the kind review, Courtney! So glad we could help your little guy :)

If you are wanting a place that will take the time to talk to you and communicate through any issues or questions and not just give you a pamphlet to educate yourself, this is the place to go! name: Dave and Loren Ashley and Brown
text:
Our little guy had been going to another dentist in town. On Sunday morning he fell and cracked both of his top front teeth. My wife and I panicked. We called the dentist office we had been going to. Left a message and was told we would hear from someone in less than an hour.

I then started googling emergency peds dentist. That’s where I found Dr. Jeff Flannery. Dr Jeff called me from his cell phone exactly 1 minute after I left a message at his office. This was Sunday morning at 10:30am. He stepped out of his church service to take my call and calm me and my wife down. He explained that what we had was not an emergency but if we felt like it was he would meet us at his office on Sunday afternoon. I called his office Monday morning. We got an appointment for later in the day.

Dr. Jeff Flannery’s level of customer service when two parents were in a panic just caused this set of parents to change dentist forever and we will recommend him to everyone.

Thank you doctor and your staff.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review! We are so glad we could help! Hope to see you all again soon :)

Wonderful, wonderful!

They quickly got us in for the appointment for the evaluation and crown. The dentist evaluated my son's teeth and explained the steps he would take to care for the tooth and the other molars in order to prevent the same problem occuring to those. The dentist and assistant were so patient with my son, answered all his questions and comforted him the moments he became anxious. Every employee at the office was so welcoming and personable. name: Jennifer Phillips
text:
I couldn’t go without leaving a review!
My 2 year old son was continuously chipping his two front teeth to the point of him developing an abscess and decay-so we were referred to OMPD.
I worked in dentistry for almost 9 years and was absolutely-beyond, impressed with this office. The staff was so attentive and sweet, genuinely caring and communicative! They were even able to get an x-ray on my son and he’s a real stickler, if ya know what I mean.
Dr. Jeffrey gave me sound treatment options and even read my demeanor on the level of comfort I felt which lead to his recommendations.
We ended up having his two teeth extracted, on the same day! (This helped me out so much since the weekend was here.)
For a two year old that can be so traumatic. Let’s just say after we left, my son happily ate a milk shake and played for the remainder of the day!
I’m very blessed I was referred and am even considering driving the 35 miles from Springville to have OMPD as our permanent pediatric office.
Thanks for all you do!!!
P.S. super cute setting too!!!
Love,
A grateful Mamma
