text:
I went to this dentist close when they first opened up.
They really really damaged my mouth.
They said they did 3 fillings but really did four... Not only that but they drilled to far and unfortunately i had to have all of them pulled. I had 3 surgeries trying to correct their mistake before we just had them pulled. i did try to reach out to them but when i called expressing something was wrong the lady in the front wouldnt listen and instead said they would look at it but in a month and said we needed to try and get the others. I had to then switch dentists and since then im terrified to even attempt to get something as small as a filling.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a review. Very sorry your experience wasn’t what you’d hoped. Our team will look into this.

name: Starr Lehner
text:
While I was saying wrong tooth she kept pulling stating she'll get it. I asked why won't it come out. She stated she'll get it.
So she pulled the good tooth and left decayed abcessed tooth beside it.
Wouldn't let me see tooth she pulled.
Had to go to another dentist who very easily pulled decayed tooth. He asked why she pulled wrong tooth.
When partial I've had more than 30 yrs wouldn't fit back I stated maybe because when you pulled tooth the others moved. Oh no that didn't happen. So she grinded on my partial making it for first time ever loose.
Well went back to get partial and they added a metal loop and wrapped it around another decayed tooth. Recently found out (from Dr)acid reflux quickly ruined my teeth. Always was complimented on my teeth and the care I took. So of course it broke off completely.
Of course Signature Smile wants their co-pay money. I sent what I could. Still I suffer. No apology.
Since the ordeal I've dealt with parotid gland pain.
I'm sure because I'm poor and on Medicare (cancer) I just don't meet their standard of a wealthy christian person so it doesn't matter. Wish I could post pictures of my mouth and what I live with because of them.

resp.text:
Starr,

We have tried contacting you directly regarding your review. Our records regarding the visits you mentioned are from 2017 and 2018, and we have documented consents for the treatment you requested. You also have recurring visits for comprehensive care after the treatment was completed, with no complaints or regard for any issues you mentioned in your review. We are happy to discuss this with you further. Our main priority is to give patients high quality care for their dental health and needs. We hope to hear from you soon!

Signature Smile

name: Chris K. Northington
text: I can not say enough good things about Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smile.  They are without a doubt the best Dental practice I have ever been to.  We turned to them to fix my wife's implants/crowns when no-one else in the area could make them look right.  From the moment we walked in the door, we were greeting with compassion and understanding, and assured that they could fix her crowns.  They immediately scheduled an appoint for that same week to do her evaluation.  In that first appointment, Dr. Wilson laid out exactly what needed to be done, gave us a time frame for the work to be completed with cost estimates, and hand made her a set of temporaries that looked better than any of the final crowns from the other dentists we had worked with.  He performed laser dentistry on her gums to give her a bigger smile, used the KOR whitening system to give her a bright white color to her teeth, and put on two new crowns that he gets from a lab in Hollywood, CA.  I can proudly say today that my wife has a beautiful smile that she is so proud of thanks to the work of Dr. Wilson and his staff at Signature Smiles.  They are now offering laser filings that can be done with no numbing or drilling.  If you are a new patient, they offer a free Smile Evaluation that includes a panoramic X-ray.  I have referred many customers to them because of my belief in the work they do.

name: L “lalani wuto” M
text: I have had several occasions to visit Dr. Wilson's dental practice.  I have not ever had less than a wonderful experience.  From cleaning to root canal services, I have had comfortable, painless, and easy sessions with Dr. Wilson and the staff.  He utilizes the latest technology including laser, easy and non invasive X-Ray sessions, and new ways of imagery when viewing bone structure.  I want to also send accolades to the front reception area as well.  The associates are so very friendly and helpful.  They were a great help with my insurance questions and very helpful on every thing I needed as far as administrative information.  I have never had to wait too long for my appointments and felt like I was always visiting family.

name: Mary Robinson
text:
I recently won a Sheer Whitening Gift Certificate at Blue valued at $149. I scheduled my appointment with the dental rep and asked what I could expect. She told me to plan to be there about an hour. They would clean, polish and then give me the Sheer Whitening treatments. Wow, I thought, pretty good prize. I proceeded to ask what kind of whitening treatments they used, 5 day strips, ugh, I thought, oh well.

Unfortunately, I arrived for my appointment about 10 minutes late, however, not intentional. The receptionist was a bit unfriendly and I thought maybe it was because I was late. Shortly, a dental assistant came to me with a clip board and 5 pages to fill out. I completed my basic information and soon realized they were wanting more info than was totally necessary to claim a prize. I began scanning over the pages and stopped immediately. They were asking me everything from signing to consent to pay for the charges they would render to me today and insurance could not be filed to authorizing them to obtain my dental records from my current dentist. I proceeded to the receptionist and told her there was obviously a mistake, I was asked to fill out patient paperwork and that I was only there to redeem my gift certificate. She told me to proceed completing the paperwork so that they could keep it on file. I looked at her in disbelief and sat back down placing the pen under the clip. I guess she signaled the assistant who came out and retrieved my paperwork. I waited for over 30 minutes before they called me back. I followed the assistant back to a dental room and she handed me a box of strips and about 5 minutes of instruction. Do you have any questions? I said, "Are we done?", she said yes that's it. Hmm, so they led me to believe that the cleaning and polishing were part of my prize when really they were going to bill me for this when they were finished. I guess I didn't fall for their trap. Talk about deceitful, a good reputable business does not do business this way. I will not be back. I will still use my strips, but could have got them at Wal-mart for $12.00. What a joke. Watch out?

name: Brenda Mickler
text:
Every visit that I have had has been so pleasant. I've not said that before about going to a dentist appointment. My visit today was extra special. Even though one of the dentists was out
because of a sick child, and one of the hygienist was with her child at her doctors appointment, everything still ran like clockwork. They didn't miss a beat. But you didn't hear any complaining at all from the employees. Its a very family oriented staff and I really like that. They make you feel so comfortable.

name: Braxton Nelson
text: E. A. Dental Group has earned my respect and admiration for the friendly, professional staff along with a Dentist who really cares about his patients... Dr. Riley is an empathetic and very careful physician who works with a great attitude and extreme attention to detail.  He tries very diligently to prevent any unnecessary discomfort or pain, and his work is well done indeed!  I would recommend this office to anyone seeking a professional and caring atmosphere as well as excellent dental work.

name: Linda Allgood
text: I have been going to the East Alabama Dental Group for the last fifteen years and I have nothing but excellent service. Dr. Thompson and his staff are the very best in the business. Lana has been my dental hygienist for several years and does an excellent job. The staff is always friendly and helpful. You cannot go wrong by using East Alabama Dental Group.

resp.text: Thank you Linda!

name: Susan Bruce
text: I broke part of a cap off and had an appointment with Dr. Thompson for a temporary cap. Everyone in the office from the time you enter the office door until you leave exhibits high standards of professionalism. As a patient you feel welcomed and well cared for. You can tell everyone that works there likes their job and where they work.

name: Larry Bein
text: The entire staff makes you believe that you are important to them and that your excellent dental treatment is their foremost concern. Dr. Thompson is easy to discuss with and is not pushy concerning the treatment option you should choose. He gives pro's and con's honestly and leaves the decision to the patient. He has always stood behind his work for my wife and me.

name: sue thomas
text: Dr. Thompson and staff are excellent. I cannot thank them enough for the time they take to make my appointments stress free. Dr. Thompson always explains things thoroughly and his calm demeanor is very much appreciated.  A very professionally run practice in all areas!

name: Jan Gunter
text: This is a wonderful dental facility!  From the moment I walked into the office, I felt at ease.  Not only were all of the staff very sweet and welcoming to me,  my dental exam and follow up treatments have been outstanding!  I am very pleased with Dr. Keith Thompson and everyone who works with him!  If you need dental work / care accomplished, this is the place!

name: Brent Hilyer
text: I’ve always had great experiences with this office. They do excellent work with great customer service. I’d recommend them to anyone.

name: Taylor Teel
text: Great people. Friendly, prompt, efficient. A place you will feel welcomed and comfortable in. They are the way a dentist should be.

name: Gid Alston
text: Excellent Dentist and staff! Everyone at East Alabama Dental Group is outstanding. The quality of their work is unsurpassed!

name: Layne Hudson
text:
I love EADG! The appointments are on time. I really appreciate that! Everyone is so friendly! Dawn, my dental hygienist, is the Best! She’s professional, personable and very good at her job. Dr. Thompson is, by Far, the best dentist I have used in my 62 years!
EADG ROCKS!!!

name: Andrew Click
text: Dr. Thompson, Dr. Riley and their staff are wonderful! I grew up not liking visits to the dentist. Now we take our four small children there too and they love the dentist and have no fear of their visits even with fillings. Would definitely recommend EA Dental Group to anyone.

text: East AL Dental Group has the best dentist & staff in their profession. Whenever something comes up for me to have done, I feel like I’m in the best of hands !

And, they took the time to answer all of my questions, as if I was the only patient they had to deal with that day!  I really enjoyed being there; and I look forward to them handling all of my future dental needs!

name: Shannon Lee
text: I recently moved to Opelika & needed a dentist to check a filling I cracked during the holidays. After reading reviews of various dental offices in the area, I chose East Al Dental. Much to my surprise, I was able to get in at 8 the next morning! They truly lived up to their 5-star ratings.  Everyone was courteous & everything was explained to me along the way. Unfortunately, I need a crown but they worked around my schedule to get me in to have that done quickly.  The rest of my family will also be visiting the office!

I posted the following review when I frist moved to the area.   Sure do wish there were more stars...I would have to give the entire staff a 10 Star rating...and the Dentists too!

Always professional,  helpful and friendly.  The whole family are patients here.  Quality, professional dental work.  So happy friends referred me to East Alabama Dental when my family moved to the area.  David and I are very happy with this practice.

name: Jane Allen
text: Was extremely uncomfortable with a tooth that was scheduled for a root canal. Called the office on Sunday, and got Christy. She listened to me, understood my needs, and advised what I could do to ease my pain. On Monday I received a call from Kelly, and she had called in medication I needed until I could get my root canal on Wednesday. Both Christy and Kelly were understanding, compassionate, and very efficient! There are a lot of dentists in the Lee County area, but if you want the best service in town, I HIGHLY recommend East Alabama Dental Group!!

name: Jerry Jackson
text:
Went today for cleaning/checkup.   I was in a wheelchair due to on going issues with my leg. Lana escorted me to the room where my treatment would  occur. She was very careful to make sure everyone stayed out of my path. When we got to the treatment room, Lana asked if it was difficult to transfer to the dental chair. I replied “no ma’am” and hopped right into the chair. As my teeth were being cleansed, I fell asleep!!! While Lana is poking all around in my mouth, also using water with suction. I told Lana that I was a high maintenance patient, she treated me like I was the only one she had to are for all day.  After all, I fell asleep while she was poking and running water in my mouth.
I have been cared for as well by others who work there, I would say that their premium treatment is a standard Dr. Thompson requires.
For today——Lana, you are my HERO.
Jerry Jackson

text: My son will never be going back there. My appointment was for 7:45 we arrived at 7:30, just for the doors not to be open. text: This place is absolutely terrible the supervisor of the entire building is a complete lunatic and breathes down the necks of the staff, staff is rude, undereducated, they have dirt and crud on their tools. name: Dione Smith
text: I understand with everything that is going on we have to be safely. My daughter appointment and we got their at 12:45pm for our appointment that was at 1 pm . I was told to call when we got there but no one every answered the phone. I had to get the attention to the young lady that was coming from another vehicle to let her know we have an appointment. She also, had an appointment on the dentist side and the orthodontist . Now the orthodontist got her back  and then bought her back out for the dentist side. My daughter had to get a chip tooth that they had to filled. It took them from 130 to almost 245 for the dentist side to finish. I feel that they over booked their appointments . We didn’t get finish until 330pm. I thing they need to reorganized the why they make appointments doing the COVID 19 so parents aren’t sitting in a car for 2 or 3 hrs . Better planning. I was very disappointment today!

name: Oneofakind
text: They take forever to come to the phone and when they do they leave you on hold for an very long time. I literally been trying to get in touch with someone for over an month to get my son braces. Very disappointed.

resp.text: We are truly saddened that your experience was not as great as we would have liked. We take bad reviews very seriously, and we would like to ensure that your experience is better next time.

name: Shondrea Cook
text: Love Vital Smiles for being multi-kid friendly,  however,  I feel the check in system could improve. Maybe off an online portal to update information prior to visit instead of having to physically fill out paper work. For the parent with multiples, this would alleviate unwanted anxiety of the child not being called back at their scheduled appointment time. It would also help, if all children of the same family finish together. Other than that, service is great, staff is friendly and knowledgeable!

text: The visit was comforting for my granddaughter and my wife was very pleased with the staff and the dentist. We would recommend this office without Hesitation. The staff has changed for the better. Good change.

text: Vital Smiles is a great place to take your children for their dental needs. The place has warm and caring associates from the front desk to the back dental room. Always a great experience. Lily

text:
Front office staff is nice, and that's important as they are the 1st people you see when you arrive. Doctors and Hygienist are extremely patient and nice.

My son no cavities 6 years.
They are a trustworthy company/place. I appreciate their work.

name: Melody R
text: We used to like going here, never really had any problems. Of course there has always been a nice wait time but we decided to continue going there despite waiting a while to be seen. But this last time really made us change our mind. We have 3 children to receive updates on as they are being seen. As I sit down near my youngest daughter, and reach for my phone her hygienist tells me I have to leave because I have my phone out. I'm shocked, because I had just taken my phone out to return a text from my husband  as he wanted to know how the appointments were going. She would not continue my daughter's appointment until she escorted me out of the area. Now I completely understand businesses asking for cell phones to be turned on silent but to tell me that I cannot use my phone AT ALL is completely absurd! I have taken time from my off day to come to this business to bring my children and you're telling me I have to go to a consultation room just to use my phone.  I have already driven 30 minutes to come from my side of town, I  could have easily changed them to a Dr less than 5 minutes from home and had little to no wait time. In addition to all this, I'm trying to get information on my best friend who is in the ICU and no one knows what's going on because I can't use my phone to get the messages. Someone must have notified the manager because she came to talk, but she wanted to do it around my children and that was not going to happen. She should have asked to step away and then we could have talked.......... In other news, we won't be going  back.

name: Elena Sudduth

name: Terri Combs
text:
Appointment was scheduled 6 months in advance for 9:30a for 3 children ages 5, 3, & 2 years old.  It was 12:40 when we left.  Waited over 45 minutes in the back to be seen and it was extremely cold for me and the children.
Thankful, they were well behaved!  But, all children can become restless. Obviously and I realize you have a large clientele, however,  it could be that you are over booking appointments.

name: April Winston
text: Great place to go for braces.  The staff are very friendly and professional. There's never a long waiting period. Usually in and out under 45 minutes. I was also pleased to find out that Dr. Phillips practiced from different locations. Therefore when we moved across town, we were still close proximity to his office. I would recommend Dr. Phillips to everyone in need of an orthodontist.

text: We had a fantastic experience at this dentist office. The hygienist made it fun for my little girl and the doctor was professional and thorough in his exam but made it fun for the kids! We look forward to visiting them for years to come!

resp.text: We're into "serious fun" here! (So glad you enjoyed) We look forward to seeing your family for years to come as well!

name: Tancy Hardee
text: Took in my daughter to have a chipped tooth fixed. 2 appointments later they fixed the wrong tooth. Dentist said come back next week because he didn't want to have to give e her more numbing medicine and he would not charge  me. Went back the 3rd time and he fixed the tooth. I they tried to make me pay even though he said he would not charge me.  Less than a year later the tooth is abscessed and I am still being harassed for payment.  Never go here these people are incompetent.

resp.text: Tancy, We've reviewed your file and are sorry for the misunderstanding. Due to HIPAA, we are unable to discuss your case online, but would love the opportunity to review your concerns over the phone. Please call our Practice Administrator, Bob, at 256.539.7447

name: brady glaus
text: Absolutely wonderful place and staff. Dr Lackey is top notch, knows teeth and children. Wish Tri-care was accepted, would love to have him continue work with my daughter.

resp.text: And we'd love to continue working with your daughter! Tri-care is actually a medical insurance rather than dental. Please contact us with your dental insurance information and we'll be happy to help. Look forward to hearing from you soon!

name: hannah stewart
text: The entire staff is excellent! From the sweet receptionist that helped me change my appoint location with no issues, the dental assistant that was patient and gentle with my daughter, to the Dentist who was friendly and knowledgeable. We had a wonderful experience and are looking forward to our next check up!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave this review. We certainly love helping and so glad we could! See you again in 6 months!!

name: Christina Morgan
text:
My kids (12, 5 , 3) we're pretty nervous to go to the new dentist. We were incredibly impressed from the moments we walked in the door! The facility itself is very welcoming for the kids and parents. There's a nice play area in the waiting room with toys, books, and video games. The front desk staff was quick and helpful checking us in for the first time.

When we got back to the treatment area, it was a large open room (with private rooms for procedures), and had a little waiting play area for kids who aren't actually on the exam table. They were very patient and understanding with my very little ones who were scared. My little ones cried, and they kindly helped them through it all. The dental himself was absolutely phenomenal! He was thorough, gave us good advice/tips, and my kids even had fun with him!

By the time we left, my kids wanted to know when we could come back!

resp.text: Wow! You managed to make our day. We look forward to seeing yall again.

name: Lisa Desgranges
text: The hygienists & other staff are so great here! My 5 year old jumps right in the chair with no reservations.  Very knowledgeable too.

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words! We love kids who are happy to jump right onto the chair and look forward to seeing you all again soon!

name: Mandy Davenport
text: Both of my boys love coming here! They make going to the dentist as fun as possible. Thank you for a great experience!

resp.text: And we love having them come! Thanks for letting us know and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Christine K
text: Wow. How can you only take one kind of child on Medicaid but not the other. Ive got an autistic son n a daughter without special needs n yet yall only will take one n not the other. What kind of busniess is that..

resp.text: Thanks for your feedback. We are sorry that we were unable to meet your family's needs. Our mission is to create a fun, loving, and nurturing environment where children will feel comfortable, secure, and excited about dental care. We specifically focus our specialty services on children with special health care needs, including children with autism. We take pride in creating an environment of excellence by communicating with respect, seeing patients on time, and providing quality care that exceeds expectations. We truly value forming relationships with our families. While we are not  medicaid providers, our doctors have tried to meet a need in our area by providing care to all special needs children in North Alabama. We have provided this service to our community for over 50 years and hope to continue for many years to come.

name: Leigh Wren
text: Dr L. and the hygienists were wonderful with my kids. They put my kids’ fears at ease and were fast and thorough.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review. We appreciate the feedback!

name: Leah Dion
text: Friendly receptionist Jennifer always greets us and I loved our hygienist Jennifer. Dr Lackey is funny and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a nice review.

name: Kim Cline
text: Friendly  staff Dr showed me what he found and made my grandson feel at ease

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave a review! Have a great weekend!

name: Amy H
text: Amazing staff!!  Kiddos actually enjoy going to the dentist!

resp.text: THanks for the feedback!

name: Abigail Costley
text: Dr Lackey is so patient, and great with children, and the rest of the staff is wonderful!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review.

name: Matt Stearns
text: Dr. Beitel and his staff make each visit pleasant and enjoyable while providing quality and professional care. Their process for bringing patients in and attending to them is top notch. I will never take my daughter anywhere else.

name: NICOLE DUNN
text: We Love, Love, love this dentist for our children. DR. Beitel is amazing. Friendly staff, clean waiting room and toys for kids to play while waiting. We started here when my oldest was 5 and never would change.

name: Annie Burwell
text: My 5 year old son had the BEST experience. He is a very energetic child and Dr. Beitel and his staff answered all his questions and were very patient. Thank you for caring!!!

name: Jenny Robinson
text: Dr. Bietel is the best dentist and has such a way with children. He took care of my son from day 1, and when the time came to put him under anesthesia to get his dental work done Dr. Bietel was phenomenal. He gave us his phone number and asked for us to follow up on how my son was doing. Dr. Bietel also answered any question I had. He made all of us feel comfortable and made my son’s mouth look beautiful! I trust him 100%, and that is saying a lot! We all love him! His office staff is also friendly and helpful.

name: Madison Steele
text: Had 2 appointments scheduled for my boys (4 & 6). My 6 year old had a blast!! Got X Rays loves the attention from all the staff everyone is extremely sweet !! My 4 year old is terrified to hear the word dentist the staff was helpful and encouraging and when it was obvious he was just not having it no one pushed or even seemed disappointed!! The Dr. came by checked him sitting in my lap let him hold the tools and kept it light and fun for him!!

name: Christina Bradford
text: My 4yo daughter had pretty bad anxiety when trying to get a filling at our normal family dentist so they referred us to Beitel. We could not be more pleased with our experience! The hygienist and the dentist spoke to my daughter through the whole process and let her touch everything she was curious about. They gave her options and let her feel like she had a say in what was happening. They praised her for her bravery and she left feeling like a champ! After leaving she said, “I love that dentist! That was fun!” And of course her Mr. Nose is sitting as a trophy by her bed now!

name: Christen Roth
text: We had a perfect checkup, as always. Our hygienist did a great job of explaining everything she was doing to keep my type A daughter calm, aware, and engaged. And thanks to Dr. Beitel’s skill and speed, even my wild child son had an excellent first exam!

name: Courtney Wells
text: We love Beitel Pedatric Dentistry! Our son looks forward to going for weeks before his appointment and leaves smiling and so happy! The staff there is amazing with children and they take time to explain to the kids what’s happening before anything is done. We especially love Brandi, she’s so good with all the kids! I recommend them to every mama I know!

name: Jason & April
text: This office works very well with special needs children. They are so patient and kind to work with my son who is autistic with sensory sensitivities. Very thankful to have found such a professional and compassionate pediatric dentistry!

name: Heather Ellenburg
text: I wish every child could be cared for by Beitel Pediatric Dentistry. Dr. Beitel has long been my hero for all the energy and care he gives children. He and his staff are wonderful!

name: NANCY STUART
text: Dr. Beitel and staff are so kind to my son. He enjoys going there. Everything is done with the well being of my son in mind. Dr. Beitel is an amazing doctor.

name: Kristin Woody
text: My son had his very first dentist appointment just a few days ago and it was such a great experience. The staff is very professional and friendly, very interactive with my son. He was so excited seeing all the tools they used and he loved picking out his own toothbrush.

name: Lizet Barrett
text: Wonderful place for my little girls. They always come out happy. Place is very clean. The staff very friendly and patient. Doctor Beitel is awesome with kids. I can’t be happier with this dental clinic.

name: Jenny Ingram
text: Everyone was so friendly and efficient! Loved Dr. Beitl. She was so experienced and knew exactly what she was doing. I hope my son comes to like going to the dentist!

name: Kymberly Price
text: Dr Beitel was so gentle with Breanna Best she didn't feel anything when he pulled her 4 teeth today . You can tell he really cares about his kids

name: Andrew Yarbrough
text: It was our 17 month old grandsons first trip to the dentist. Dr Caroline and Dr Beitel made it a very pleasant experience! They could not have been nicer or more professional. Dr Caroline took her time explaining what she was going to do and let our grandson touch her gloves and instruments before they touched him. He left with a sticker and a toy and I left with a lot of gratitude for his first impression of going to the dentist.

name: Kristina Allen
text: Dr. Beitel and all the staff are so amazing! They always put my kids at ease and make going to the dentist fun and stress free for the whole family!

name: URIAH STALLWORTH
text: Awesome staff! My 10 year old son used to hate going to the dentist before moving to Huntsville.  He is always excited to go now because everyone is so nice. We have been attending this dental office over 3 years now, and the patient care experience is always wonderful.

name: Stephanie Waggett
text: Dr Beitel and his staff are WONDERFUL!! The way they are with these kids is absolutely remarkable. We would highly recommend them to anyone and everyone with Children

name: Lisabeth Wiles
text: All of the staff were very friendly and helpful. They were very good at helping my 18 month old through his first dental visit.

name: Keisha Jordan
text: My children have been patients of Dr. Beitel’s for about 10 years. I love that he always addresses parents by their name. He is amazing with children, makes them feel comfortable. His staff is also A+ always a great experience.

name: Jean Graham
text: The staff is very nice and great with helping get nervous children calmed down! The doctors are wonderful as well!

name: preethi srinivasan
text: Highly recommend this clinic.Both Dr Brain and Dr Caroline Beitel are awesome and so are their staff.

name: Jessica Ellis
text: We love the Dr. Beitel’s!! They are the best dentists around! They really care about every patient!!

name: Amy Clark
text: Always the best experience. My kids love going to see Dr. Beitel. They love to see him try to toss paper towels into the trashcan from across the room or what funny thing he is going to ask them as he is examining their teeth.

name: Meghan Medlen
text: The entire staff did a great job making our first dentist appointment fun and comfortable!

name: Brandon Reeves
text: Every visit is exceptional. I drive a little over an hour one way to take my son here. I’d drive farther.

name: Katelyn Palmer
text: My daughter recently had to get some dental work done. She is 4 so is easily shaken. We have always loved Dr. Beitel but while at the hospital he went above and beyond to make sure I was updated while I couldn’t be with her, then gave his personal cell phone number to me to make sure I updated him on how she was feeling later in the day. That makes the difference! He truly cares about his patients!

name: Paula Mintzer
text: My kids love Dr Beitel, and until lately I would give more than 5 stars if I could. Now it is almost impossible to get an appointment. The next available is over 4 months away for an established patient, and that’s entirely too long. Hopefully that will improve. If not we will probably look for another dentist.

name: Paul Broadwater
text: They are very good with children.  My most pain sensitive child needed several fillings.  They made her comfortable and she did great.

name: Haley Loveday
text: This was my daughter's first dentistry appointment and everyone we encountered was so sweet and patient with her and made her feel completely at ease. They were very Covid conscious and checked temps as soon as we walked in and had hand sanitizer at the ready. I am so happy that we chose Beitel Pediatric Dentistry and look forward to many more years of satisfaction. THANK YOU!

name: nithda kiengkham
text: I have been taking my daughter(who is now 8) to Dr. Beitel since she was 2 years old and I have never had a bad experience with them. They are absolutely amazing and my daughter has not once been scared to go to the dentist. She actually gets excited and To me that says a lot!

name: Rebeka Fout
text: It is a great dentist to take your children. Everyone is very nice.

name: Robin Blankenship
text: The dentists, hygienists, and staff are the best! My son has Down Syndrome and they are amazing with him!

name: Amanda Cantrell
text: Dr Beitel is a rare find in a dentist....I've never before met someone who can calm anxious hearts and brings smiles out of potentially scary events for kids.   Dr Beitel is an AMAZING dentist...but also an AMAZING, caring, overall wonderful person.    You won't find anyone more genuine than him when it comes to caring for, and treating kids.   He really does make coming to the dentist a fun overall experience for all of my kiddos.   His staff also goes above and beyond , each and every time.   We are definitely blessed to have such a wonderful dental office looking after our littles!

name: Marissa Nguyen
text: Super friendly staff! Was gentle with my 6 year old as her adult molars were coming in! Definitely going to Dr. Beitel for her cleanings!

name: Keith Ferrara
text: Fantastic Practice.  We just moved to Huntsville and I’m very happy with our decision for our 5 year old!

name: Roz You
text: Dr. Beitel and staff are very friendly and caring. Very competent in handling children esp. With a toddler like mine. Always gives great advice and recommendations.

name: Marissa Nguyen
text: Super friendly staff! Was gentle with my 6 year old as her adult molars were coming in! Definitely going to Dr. Beitel for her cleanings!

name: Trudy Moore
text: The absolute best Pediatric Dentist and staff in the area!! My children are always asking when do they get to go back!! 😍

name: Heather Lindsey
text: Beitel Pediatric Dentistry deserves 5 stars! From the moment we walked in the door every person we came into contact was friendly and welcoming. The hygienist walked my girls through every step of the cleaning process while making it fun and entertaining. We saw Dr. Beitel and Dr. Caroline. They were both so good with the girls. They explained everything about their visit to me in a way I understood. My girls felt totally at ease during the entire visit! I would recommend them to everyone! Thank you for a great visit!

name: Lacinda Woodall
text: We have three kids, the oldest of whom is 26, so we have been going to Dr. Beitel for somewhere around 25 years. Not once have we ever had a bad experience. Dr. Beitel is fantastic with both the kids and the parents!  He is extremely knowledgeable of his profession, but is also very personable. We always come out of the dentist’s office with a smile from something goofy he did or said during the visit!  His office personnel is friendly and very helpful. We are excited to get to know his daughter as she is coming into the practice with him, as well. You will not be disappointed if you give them a try!  We love Beitel Pediatric Dentistry!

name: Kameron Peterson
text: I took my son, Olyver, to Dr. Beitel this morning, and we had a wonderful experience! Brandi made Olyver feel extremely comfortable, and she really took her time with him to make it a fun experience at the dentist! I would recommend to everyone to take your kid to see this dentist and his team!

name: Carleen Barker
text: When we first moved to this area, a coworker recommended Dr. Beitel. I'm so glad we were referred because Dr. Beitel and his staff are amazing! Very good communication and very friendly. Thank you for all you do!

name: Sarah McLain
text: Dr. Beitel is such an amazing pediatric dentist! His staff are amazing and so friendly. My son had to get fillings and he talked to him to make him feel more comfortable. Not once did he know that he was getting numbing put in his gums because they never let the kids see the needle. They have a "Mr. Nose" mask that sits on his nose giving him nitrous, so that way he doesn't feel the shot. My son always loves going and they are so amazing with all children.

name: Heather Brock
text: Dr. Beitel has always taken great care of my children's teeth, and all of his staff is wonderful to work with . He has worked hand in hand with our orthodontist to provide any early treatment to assist in providing the best possible outcome for their smiles. The atmosphere is calm but cheerful, and you can tell they really do care about your kids. Anytime I have ever had a question, their staff has been easy to reach and extremely helpful.

name: Tiffany Smith
text: The staff were so amazing with our three children. They were laughing and so excited to tell me about their experiences. They were thorough and explained the details of each child's dental needs. We are so happy with our choice!

name: Baylee Tiffin
text: I’ve been driving my children to Huntsville from the Shoals area for a few years now to see Dr. Beitel & his staff because they are the ABSOLUTE best! Their facility is always kept clean & in order.  My kids used to dread dentist appointments, but ever since switching to Dr. Beitel, they look forward to their appointments!! 5 stars and couldn’t recommend a better pediatric Dentist!

name: Baylee Tiffin
text: I’ve been driving my children to Huntsville from the Shoals area for a few years now to see Dr. Beitel & his staff because they are the ABSOLUTE best! Their facility is always kept clean & in order.  My kids used to dread dentist appointments, but ever since switching to Dr. Beitel, they look forward to their appointments!! 5 stars and couldn’t recommend a better pediatric Dentist!

name: Josie Lane
text: We had such a great visit! My 4 year old was too scared to let anyone look at her teeth at her first checkup, 6 months ago. The people at Beitel had this on her chart and took extra care with her, making her laugh and relax. It went great, they did a wonderful job with my 5 year old as well and were SO patient while I wrangled an 18 month old during the visit. Highly recommend.

name: Natalie Jones
text: Dr. Beitel and his office are the BEST!  Had another great experience with him yesterday.  My daughter had a previous traumatic filling experience with a different dentist and was so anxious.  He and his assistant talked her through the whole process, made sure she was extremely comfortable, and ended up doing an extraction without her even realizing it—or being upset at all!  Thank you, Dr. Beitel!!

name: Jennifer Tucker
text: It is always a wonderful visit with Dr Beitel and his crew ! They are fantastic! It’s peaceful and my kids love to visit .

Karina introduces her to all the instruments and let her touch them and get acquainted before suggesting to clean her teeth. I was impressed, my daughter let her teeth get cleaned and mouth inspected. I strongly recommend Dr. Beitel’s office.

name: Linsey Lee
text: I've been going to Dr. Beitel for years and have always had great experiences. It makes going to the dentist fun and easy for kids that might be scared and the staff is always the sweetest. Dr. Beitel's office is one of the best in Huntsville and I'd recommend it to anyone with kids of all ages.

name: Levore Arenz
text: Love Dr. Beitel and his staff. They are very kid friendly. Would definitely recommend them to anyone who's looking for a pediatric dentist.

text: Have been going to Dr. Beitel for 15+ years and have always been satisfied with the care I received. They are kind and very knowledgeable. His daughter made a wonderful addition to the team! Would recommend them to anyone needing a dentist.

text: We love Beitel Ped Dentistry!  Great experience and care!!

name: Anna Key
text: We love every staff member at Beitel Pediatric Denistry! They all take time to talk to the little ones who admire them so much. We won’t go anywhere else!

text: Dr. Beitel is amazing! He always make my kids feel calm and not scared. He even got my 14 month old to lay down and let him look at his teeth.

text: I absolutely loved Beitel Pediatric Dentistry. I brought my 2 year old here for her very first dentist appointment and she loved getting her "teeth tickled." She enjoyed meeting all of the doctors and dental hygienists. They were all very nice and made her feel comfortable.

text: Amazing! Staff and Dr. Caroline are so friendly and work amazing with my 23 month old. We loved our nurse Anna too! :)

text: What a wonderful practice! I took my son for his first dentist appointment and the entire experience was great. All of the staff is so friendly and fun and the dentists are great! I am so glad we picked this practice.

name: Laura Fallon
text: Everyone was awesome with my 3 children today!  Very patient and sweet! Thank you so much for a wonderful first visit!

name: Melissa Derrick
text: They are awesome here from start to finish! Dr. Beitel is amazing with children. She’s so patient and her calm demeanor puts my little boys at ease. I would highly recommend using their office.

text: Low wait time and VERY friendly staff! All of the staff were great with my son and made him feel comfortable! They also explained everything to us both. I highly recommend them!

name: Barbara Gillespie
text: Great care, as always. We love Dr. Beitel and his staff. They took extra precautions to keep visits safe.

name: Elizabeth Fletcher
text: Our little kids love going here! They are amazing and super nice. My 5 year old son talks about going to the dentist for weeks before going and weeks after.

name: Mark Ratliff
text: Awesome Docs, awesome staff!  Wouldn’t go anywhere else.

name: Amy Turner
text: Dr. Beitel and his staff are amazing!!! They are always so nice and explain everything! They never hesitate to answer in questions! My grandson loves how great they are to him!!

name: Sarah Ashley
text: We have a child with a complicated medical history need extensive dental work in the hospital.  Both doctors have gone above and beyond making sure we understood and he was feeling ok afterwards and we didn’t have any problems or concerns.

name: Matt Stearns
text: I couldn't imaging taking my daughter anywhere else.  The service is always top-notch and professional. They have state of the art equipment with a well lit and organized patient area.  The atmosphere is pleasant and enjoyable.  The personalities of the current father-daughter duo,  Dr. Brian and Dr. Caroline,  make for a fun visit.  I wish I could get my teeth cleaned there!

name: Liz Smith
text: My kids were very anxious for their dentist appointment but Miss Corina did an amazing job making them as comfortable as possible.  They gave great feed back and weren't pushy at all.

name: Krista Casper
text:
I think it was about 10 years ago my son became a patient at Beitel Pediatric Dentistry and we have NOT regretted that decision. Dr. Brian Beitel is so professional but so funny! He makes you feel like your a part of the family!
Recently his daughter Caroline came into the practice and has been WONDERFUL to work with as well. She is so caring and deals BEAUTIFULLY with anxious patients.
HIGHLY recommend!

name: Leah Crouse
text: I highly recommend Dr. Beitel and his staff. He was my dentist as a teen and now he is taking care of my girls. It is always a pleasant experience in his office. He is kind, informative, and proactive about your child’s dental health. It is clear that their office is taking the current situation seriously. During my girls’ cleanings their were many extra precautions taken to ensure everyone’s safety. Thank you Dr. Beitel!

name: Lauren Battle
text: Very caring, professional staff that are great with small children. Highly recommend!

name: Dana Rogers
text: Absolutely love Dr. Beitel and his staff. Have been using them for a few years now and wouldn’t go anywhere else! Highly recommend!!!

name: Nikki Elliott
text: Loved the care they give to my son during visits. Especially LOVED the care taken during cavities.

name: Jorda Cruz
text: Great atmosphere, great employees, and accommodating to family. Thank you for all that you do.

name: Alison Lovelace
text:
I cannot rave enough about the wonderful experience we had at our appointment!

My son has been to a different dentist before, but this was his first visit here, and his first real cleaning so I was a little nervous.  From beginning to end everyone was so kind and genuinely seemed to care about children.  Loved our hygienist, Hannah, she was so warm and talked my son through everything, and Dr. Beitel was a perfect mix of thorough and fun all at the same time.  So happy we found them and look forward to our visits to come!

name: Andrea Henson
text: Both of my kids go to Beitel Pediatric Dentistry and we absolutely love them. The entire staff is always so friendly and helpful.

name: Kelly Watson
text: All 5 of my kids get so excited when they know it’s time for their appointments and we absolutely love BOTH Dr. Beitels! So blessed to have found this office when we moved here years ago!

name: Ashlee Ciesielski
text: My oldest child has been going to Dr. Beitel’s office for more than 5 years. My youngest is almost 3 and has now been twice. They both absolutely love both doctors and every single staff member. My oldest is often anxious about new people and environments and the doctors and staff have always made him feel at ease. They both look forward to going to the dentist! We cannot say enough positive things about Doctor Beitel and the staff!

name: Savannah A
text: I love Dr. Beitel and his daughter. The dental assistants also. My 3 year old asks me when he can go back to the dentist. Also they do great with my 1 year old. Beat pediatric dentists I have ever seen.

name: Maria Kaa
text: Beyond expectations. Should be more than 5 stars. From the greeters and nurses to the Dr. This was my daughter's first and follow up appointment and it was excellent. Highly recommended.

name: Sara Webb
text: I have been going to this dentist office for the last three years. Last year I moved to Madsion and decided to try a dentist closer to the house. One visit elsewhere made my kids and I quickly realize how much we absolutely love Dr. Beitel and his team! So even though a little drive, we went back and are totally satisfied once again! Hands down best dentist I have ever come across! Wish he saw adults. Lol

name: Stephen Sparkman
text:
Beitel Pediatric Dentistry is an amazing establishment. They have consistently been caring with a toddler that does not like things in their mouth.

They have done a wonderful job, and even taught us a few techniques to insure a healthy dental life for our growing child.

name: Carla Burns
text: Dr. Beitel and staff are always awesome.... very friendly and helpful every visit!

name: Andy jones
text: Dr. Beitel is great with kids. Nice clean office. Very friendly staff and hygienists. Lots of specials touches just for kids. Colored sunglasses for the kids to wear during cleaning and always some stickers and little toys that the kids enjoy.

name: Stacey Hall
text: Husband’s dentist from when he was a child took our son there , still the great dentist he knew from years ago !

name: Shelley Barnes
text: Best pediatric dental experience ever!!

name: Melissa Parry
text: Dr Beitel does a wonderful job with the kids! He takes plenty of time to talk to them and play with them so they feel comfortable with him before he looks at their teeth. He schedules extra time for kids who are a little bit anxious. When my son wasn't able to hold the xray piece in his mouth, they didn't force it. They just switched to a different kind of xray instead. This is our first time going to a pediatric dentist and there are many thoughtful little details that make a big difference. My kids are 2, 4, and 7 and we've all had great experiences there!

name: Chris Green
text: Dr. Beitel was wonderful! He did an amazing job to comfort my 4 year old. Highly recommended.

name: Melissa Williams
text: Staff is ALWAYS professional. I completely trust Dr. B and Caroline with my children! They are knowledgeable, quick, efficient with a great staff. My kids LOVE going to the dentist!!!!!

name: Susan Lewis
text: I went to Dr. Beitel as a child, now I take my son to him. I can’t imagine a better pediatric dentist! He is so fun and cool, my son loves him. Everyone who works there is GREAT with kids and knows how to put them at ease and have fun with them. I absolutely recommend Dr. Beitel to everyone!

name: Melissa Clark
text: They are absolutely amazing with my son! Very friendly I highly recommended Dr. Beitel and his team!

name: Alicia Hilton-Gaskin
text: We love Dr. Beitel and his staff! They are always kind and patient with my kids.

name: natalie kosechata
text: the office is very nice. we had to wait outside for our appointment.. we were asked to come 15mon early so we did. about 45min of waiting outside in the 95 degree heat my daughter was stung in the face by a bee.. she is 2.. after calling them and letting them know what had happened they let us wait the remaining 30min wait in the lobby... after waiting an hr and 15min yo get called back we met a very sweet lady who play with my daughter for a bit. the doctor came. he is amazing... did great with my daughter and was very happy to answer all my questions! the 3hrs dental appt was worth it to me. i am sure this covid has not been easy to deal with from their point a view. over all happy!!

name: Lillian Couey
text: Our dentist very recently retired. Christian, our 10 year old son and 100% all adventurous boy, was riding moving dolly's on our concrete driveway.  He smacked his mouth on the concrete putting a great triangle chip in one of his front teeth. We were stressed trying to find a new dentist. As I was reaching out to friends, family and acquaintances for help Dr. Beitel's name kept frequently coming up. My husband called our pediatrician asking about Dr.Beitel and the staff called back telling us they loved him.  Dr. Beitel's office was so helpful, courteous and caring from the moment I called. They were so very understanding of  the situation we found ourselves in with a retired dentist, our sons accident and no dentist. They got Christian in that morning to see Dr. Beitel. Brandy, the dental assistant was so good and caring with him and really made Christian feel very comfortable. Dr. Caroline Beitel, Dr. Beitle's daughter, was the dentist who took care of Christian. She was very patient and kind with Christian and was able to also repair the tooth that day. Dr. Caroline was courteous toward the support staff and she and Brandy worked together well as a team. They both kept talking and cutting up with Christian. Honestly my son was so happy with them that he kept telling everyone after we left how great those two ladies were. Needless to say my husband and I think they are great and both our sons have found a great new father daughter team who are great with kids. Five stars from us and our son.

name: Kate Hammond
text: We love everything about Beitel Pediatric Dentistry! They are personable, patient, and make things fun for the kids! My daughter is always asking when her next appointment is 😊

text: Dr.C Beitel is amazing! My kiddo has severe dental anxiety and Dr.Beitel has done a great job helping manage her anxiety and making sure she gets the dental care she needs.

name: Tabitha Allen
text:
I was searching for a dentist who is patient, funny, kind, caring, and good with kids because I have a 5 year old daughter and 2 year old daughter who mean the absolute world to me. I am so incredibly thankful we found Dr Beitel after asking for references on Facebook and several people referring him to me!! He is so good with kids! He makes them feel comfortable! He makes my 2 girls laugh by playing with some of the dentist tools and blowing up a latex glove and just all around “having a good time!” Because lets be real the dentist office isn’t the most fun place for kids to go!! Kids pick up on people’s personalities quick. They are good at reading people and reading peoples vibes, Dr Beitel has great vibes and my girls picked up on it! His staff is super sweet. My friend Hannah that works there also referred us there and helped us get in there so we are always glad to see her when we go for 6 month cleanings! My older daughter who is 5 had to have 2 fillings on her 2 front teeth about 8 months ago, one tooth was chipped a little bit, but other than that we haven’t had to have any other work done on their teeth, and they had no cavities at their recent check up/cleaning😊 I was terrified for my daughter to have those two fillings done
and so was she. It’s something I hope we don’t have to do often or ever again so we BRUSH BRUSH BRUSH & FLOSS FLOSS FLOSS, but Dr Beitel did a FANTASTIC job at making her feel safe and he made her 2 front teeth look amazing, like they never had a cavity and like that one was never even chipped. I wish I had a before and after picture, because he did great! I’m sure he's done much bigger things that are also amazing but I wasn’t expecting for her two front teeth to look that good. Both of my girls still have all of their baby teeth, but we look forward to seeing Dr Beitel and his daughter for many many many more years to come!! We have only saw his daughter once, at our recent 6 month cleaning, and she was very nice! Last time I wrote a review this long I jinxed myself lol, so let’s hope everything continues to great with Dr Brian Beitel :)

name: Troy Hughes
text: Great staff.

text: The wait time is always 2hrs long and the front office lady never knows what’s going on and not very helpful. My son felt uncomfortable when he rubbed my sons stomach and so did I. The dental hygienist were great though!

text: Dr. Cook is a very gentle dentist.  He has a friendly staff too.  I've had several fillings at his office and it was a smooth and painless experience.  Highly recommend!!

name: Bethany Gray
text: After an extensive google search for dentists in the Birmingham area, I chose Dr. Cook's practice; so my review is titled, "Who does that anymore?" After a rotten experience with Affordable Dentures, I called Dr. Cook's office, explained my dental situation including my short three week timeline to have everything done in order for me to be able to return to my teaching position in Alaska and was given an initial appt. within two days. A plan of action for a misplaced implant and new upper denture were made that very day. Four short appointments later I walked out with a new perfect denture and smile! But, in between that short block of time I had in the dental chair with Dr. Cook, kudos go out to his wonderful staff as they called often for an answer to a question Dr. Cook had, easily accommodated me with their appts. versus my other doctor appointments, called and made an appt. for me with an oral surgeon for further consultation on my misplaced implant(Affordable Dentures). They also provided kids with a toy choice from their Treasure Chest instead of a lollipop and listened to my crazy life living in 'bush' Alaska. Dr. Cook and his staff are thorough, accommodating, gentle, good listeners and make you feel like you are their only patient for that day!!!! They are now my only choice for dental care!!!!

text: I had the most extensive dental exam that I have ever had.  Everyone that took care of my check up including the girls who did my X-rays and tooth scan, the hygienist, and the Dentist were so professional, knowledgeable and courteous.  They all made me feel very comfortable and they were very gentle.  I enjoyed being there- not the usual feeling going to a Dentist’s office. This is the first time since the pandemic started, that I had been to a Dentist, besides me being fairly new to the area, so I was not looking forward to going, but I was so pleasantly surprised.  I actually got a first appointment quickly, also, within a week of me calling for an appointment.  I had a female Dentist, I am sorry but I forgot her name, but she was great in every way.  I am a RN, so I recognize professional, knowledgeable and courteous, great patient care.  I just can’t say how impressed and pleased I am that I chose Aspen Dental to go to.  I am looking forward to my cleaning appointment in two weeks.  Thanks again.

name: The Gaming Husky
text: Everyone at Aspen was wonderful.  They are so nice and helpful.  No judgement if you haven’t been to the dentist in a while, they pick up where you left off.  They have payment arrangements that work with any budget and are more thank happy to help set things up and make a new smile happen.  Thank you to the staff to at Aspen Dental in Daphne, Alabama.

name: Diane Abercrombie
text:
This was my initial appointment at Aspen Dental. From the receptionist to the Dentist, I was treated with enthusiasm, respect , professional and courtesy.
I was extremely impressed with the technology used to evaluate the dental health of a patient in conjunction with the physical examination.
The dentist, dental hygienist, x-ray technician, insurance manager were absolutely superb!
The hygienist explained the findings on my dental scan, which I have not experienced anywhere else. It was very informative and helpful in making priority dental work decisions.
The dentist, Dr. Dickinson was the last to evaluate me. He thoroughly reviewed all diagnostics, medical history, medications, etc.
What really stood out to me was his quick whit and demeanor. He made you feel like a family member. His evaluation was positive, to include the discussion of problem areas. You didn’t feel marginalized and berated because your teeth aren’t celebrity status.
Aspen Dental is an entirely different type of dental practice. They offer flexibility in payment plans, especially for those without dental insurance.
The prices are excellent, and far less than other quotes I’ve received.
Aspen Dental is a one- stop shop. When you receive stellar front desk, hygienist, radiology technician, patient-centered education relevant to your specific healthcare needs, and a dentist who’s actually enthusiastic to provide your dental care; that’s a drop the mike, need I say more, touchdown 🙏🏾.

resp.text: I'm glad you appreciated your visit, Diane. Patient satisfaction is very important to Aspen Dental practices, and it's great to hear that the team helped you have a great experience. - Cindy, ADMI

name: Grant Ritter
text: It was a very pleasant experience.  The Dr. and staff were very nice and the exam was very thorough.  I would recommend this place 👌.

resp.text: It's so nice to hear that, Grant. I'm glad you had a 5-star experience, and we truly appreciate you taking a moment to recommend the Aspen Dental team! - Krista, ADMI

name: margaret c
text: My initial visit was awesome, I had a very extensive dental exam and was relieved to see that I could get my fillings done relatively cheaply without insurance. However I have an anxiety disorder and it felt like like they were rushing with me, I was not made to feel at ease. The second appointment I had was to receive two fillings, when it came time to restore the natural anatomy of my teeth, it felt very rushed. She ended up grinding my two teeth down on the sides as well as the fillings. My natural tooth anatomy is gone, I still can't believe that happened. What's worse is the fact that I'm experiencing alot of pain in these two fillings, they are super sensitive to heat, cold and, pressure. I cannot eat very well, I am already struggling since I need so much work done. I will be going to a different dentist to get the work fixed. In the end this will end up costing me more time, money, and comfort.

resp.text: I'm so sorry that your experience didn't live up to expectations, Margaret. We certainly value your feedback, and I wanted to let you know that I passed your comment along to our Patient Satisfaction team. I would encourage you call them too, so they can learn more and try to address concerns. You can reach them directly at 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

text: 1st time coming here...the ladies in the office was so sweet and polite...the lady that did my xrays was the sweetest and she made sure I was comfortable...definitely going to be coming back

name: Lee Lankford
text:
Went to Aspen Dental Daphne Alabama, a  month and a half ago in February  2021 set up an appointment for a month later on April 29th, 2021 after a full examination. Which was rushed and telling me if you don’t do the cleaning we want do your caps.  So I had another dental office do the cleaning because Aspens Office financial manager  said they can't do the caps on the same  day they do the cleaning, evening though thats the way they scheduling it.

Anyrate  So called on. April 28th to ask if my appointment is still scheduled for April 29th,  no one answered, I left message. I received a call back within an hour “Amazing!!  Well the association told me they had no scheduled appointment for me at all and are completely book up.  Not willing to help me at all.. I’m blown away !! I’ve  been waiting we’ll over a month, and half  amdyou have nothing scheduled?!  What kind of business is this?!!!  Aspen Dental is a complete and utter JOKE!! The most non customer service  oriented dental business I’ve ever had to deal with. Unbelievably the worst dental business ever.If I could give them a 0 or no star . I would, their not deserving of one star.

I would pay 3x times amount to someone other dental office  than have these clowns touch my mouth.  Can only imagine the work they would  do in your mouth if this is how the Business is ran. I will pass this forward to friends family social media etc.

Thanks wasting my time. You guys are horrible!!

Lee L

resp.text: I'm really sorry to hear that, Lee. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

name: David Cissel
text: My fell off. They told me me the crown fell off because I missed an appointment with the dental hygienist. They were not able to fit me in right away, so I had a serious problem with sensitivity to cold where the crown was missing. It was a different dentist to redo the crown, she said, “who did this crown? It is too shallow.” Anyway, she got it back in, but it came out again 6 weeks later, it fell out again while I was eating a piece of boiled potato. I found another dentist and he took great care in redoing it again, and it seems solid now. I will not tell anyone not to visit Aspen Dental, but I will not return.

resp.text: Hi David, I'm sorry that you didn't have a positive experience. If you would like to share more detail about your visit, the team and I would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. – Cindy, ADMI

name: Lynn Drake
text:
This rating is only for the Aspen in Daphne, Alabama.  I've been to another Aspen in Florida and it was awful.  Tiara, Lauren and Dr Evans were amazing.  They educated me on my teeth and put a plan in place that is good for me and my teeth.  As most people, I hate the dentist but they made me feel comfortable.  Very friendly.

A few weeks after this 5 star rating, I received a bill in the mail for $24.   Not sure what it was for as I paid in full to the business manager before the cleaning was completed. That's how they do it there. Pay first and then the work is done. So sad and mad that they think they can add to my bill after it was paid in full.  Shame on you Aspen Dental.

resp.text: I'm glad you feel comfortable with the team, and I hope that you continue to have positive experiences. - Dawn, ADMI

name: pamela bruno
text: Pulling my teeth on bottom was very agonizing. Dr didn’t give me enough sedition on my teeth to pull them out! Her assistant was not trained enough for suction in my mouth. name: Lorri McDaniel
text: After breaking a tooth on Friday and calling multiple places, I was told that Aspen would be able to help me on Monday morning. The location nearest me was unavailable for 2 weeks, I would have to drive to the next location which is an hour away. After induring a weekend of pain, I got up and made the hour trip. After multiple xrays and being told the tooth would need to be capped. I was then taken to someone to discuss payment options. I was then informed that it would take 2 weeks for the cap to come in. I asked about a temporary cap and was told that they don't do that. There was no way I could indure another 2 weeks of pain. I would not recommend using for emergency treatment. Thankfully I was able to find a much closer dentist who was able to remove my old filling and put on a temporary cap. Also, my permanent cap will only take 4 days. Only a $90 difference in price but, I'll receive quicker service and not have to wait 2 weeks in pain.

resp.text: I am so sorry Lorri, this was not the experience we want for our patients. If you haven't called the Patient Satisfaction team yet, my team would appreciate the opportunity to talk to you: 1-866-767-0890. - Cindy, ADMI

name: Nicholas Beisel
text: Dr. Stephanie and her whole team were great! I was very apprehensive about having dental work done at all, much less to the invasive degree I knew I would need. However, they went out of their way to make sure I wasn't embarrassed, my concerns and worry weren't marginalized, and aside from treating me very professionally, did so in an extraordinarily compassionate manner. While I am still in a fair amount of pain a few days out now, my expectations were managed very well and the procedure and aftercare haven't been nearly as bad as I had anticipated. I would highly recommend this Aspen Dental office and Dr. Stephanie in particular and will continue to use them again for all my future dental needs! Pricing was also very competitive in my opinion, and every effort was made to make sure the total came in under the number I needed in order to get the most important and pain relieving procedures done in the single visit I requested. Will post an update after completely healing as well.

resp.text: I'm glad you enjoyed your visit, Nicholas. Patient satisfaction is very important to Aspen Dental practices, and it's great to hear that the team helped you have a 5-star experience. - Dawn, ADMI

text: I was late for my appointment and they had to reschedule me me but got me in late day so that was nice. Everyone was professional. I felt this was really bad form. They didn't say anything from the time I booked till I was done Xrays etc that I wasnt seeing my requested dentist. The lady I saw was very nice and I liked her. But she wasn't who I wanted. I found them expensive in the optional add on charges like a pressure sensing toothbrush they sell. Found it at Costco for half the cost. Now I also found out I have to drive an hour to see the dentist I wanted to see at the start. I was supposed to hear from the office manager about getting an appointment with the dentist I want but it's been a week and no word. Poor form again. So basically I'm pretty disappointed with mostly everything. But the office manager at Aspen who I went thru my charges with at the end of the appointment was very nice. Just wish he'd called like he was supposed to. I kinda just want to go somewhere else now........raspberry.

name: Delta Blue
text:
All-all, it was one of the best Appointments at a dentist I have ever had, since I developed an extreme anxiety to dentists, dental offices, and anything else associated with the mouth and teeth.  The anxiety was a result of an unfortunate event as a child while at the dentist.
I am having major work done, to the tune of nearly $9000.  No, there are no implants included in that work.
The only downside was, after having my appointment schedule, the morning of, they sent me a message about coming in a half hour early, to have an unplanned cleaning.  I had recently had a cleaning.  This news about the cleaning the morning of, totally freaked me out, and turned me into a slobbering idiot.  I had to call several times, crying, to get them to understand what happens, when anything changes on my calendar within a few hours, if it is something I already fear.
However, when I got there, after I had explained on the phone, I couldn't do the cleaning and the procedure back to back, I calmed down, took with me everything to distract me and get me more comfortable, it was FINE.
Before I knew it, we were done!
Yahoo!
I have another appointment in 5 days, for dreaded cavities, and am praying the appointment will go just as smooth!
Thank you guys at Aspen, for helping me restore my teeth and smile.  God Bless.

name: Shirley Rallo
text: It was a good experience.The staff was very nice and friendly.They all had their jobs and they did them well.The dentist was also very nice and easy to understand.A little pricey for me but I have just moved here.

name: Emily Chinal
text: We thought we would switch to Aspen because you always see their ads on TV saying how reasonable they are and how they didn't even make a veteran pay for his dental work on a cavity. Well, we are a military family as well and they sure as heck charge us even when they made the mistake of doing full stays when our insurance only covers some xrays. Their mistake cost us over $100. And they would not do anything to help us out when I asked. Then my husband went in for a tooth that was bothering him. They literally took a few minutes to look at it and sure enough they wanted to take xrays and when he said insurance wont cover it so he cant do them they didn't help him out and sent him on his way knowing he will be gone for a few months at his base. And I just got a bill for over $60 for them just to poke his tooth. Seriously NOT reasonable dentistry. I highly recommend going elsewhere!

resp.text: Hi Emily, thank you for your feedback.  I will certainly pass this information along to the staff, so they can address your concerns. — Dawn, ADMI

name: B Lewis
text: One of the worst dental experiences in my life.  I went to them initially to have an annual checkup and to have a chip/break in my front tooth repaire.  The repair they made looked fine but only  lasted less a few weeks.  Then the dentist recommended that I get a crown.  My tooth was prepared and they took molds of my teeth for the crown and supposedly  did a color match (WRONG).  When the tooth came back it was the wrong color.  But the temporary tooth that was put on in it's place fell out the first day.  No adhesive was applied.  The  doctor left before the temporary was placed in my mouth and the technician who put it in obviously used no glue.  I did not go back for them to glue the temporary (my fault/busy schedule).  I just persevered until the crown came in,  When the first crown came in it was too long and the wrong color.  So it had to be sent back for a color change and to be  shorten.  I received another temporary tooth.   Well the doctor put on another temporary this time and  he really glued it on.  He glued it on with an adhesive that obviously was WRONG for a temporary because they could not easily remove it.  The next dentist I saw had to drill the temporary tooth off.  Then the second crown again was the wrong color (WRONG AGAIN!).  Another temporary was made and put on.   So now I am waiting for the crown (Third time) and hoping it is the right color.  In the meantime the temporary I had fell off while I was eating a salad a few days ago and is broken and can no longer be used to hide the ugly tooth stub.  I have this HIDEOUS gap and STUB of a tooth in the front of my mouth.   I have had so much anxiety regarding this dental situation and no resolution in sight for a few more days. This is not a matter of insurance, nor a matter of money...I have both and have paid in full my co-pay for this procedure.  It is a matter of good dental service of which I have yet to receive.  After the first two disastrous  appointments and having not received a crown that matches and is acceptable I  am very disappointed and disgusted with ASPEN Dental.

name: Sharon Nichols
text: Great office and great dentist! I have two daughters who love to see Dr. White. I know this office cares about my children from the moment I get out of the car and see their names on the birthday cupcake board on the front door to the hugs and smiles they get from everyone in the office. The office is bright and cheerful and extremely clean. The entire staff makes you feel as if you are their only concern. They take time to talk to you and answer any questions you may have. Dr White talks to my girls and makes them feel very special and important. They listen to what she tells them and they talk about it on the way home. My girls would go to see Dr. White and her staff every week if they could. I appreciate all that this office does to make my girls love brushing their teeth. If you are looking for a great office look no further. My girls could not be any happy anywhere else.

name: Macey Starling
text: I was a patient from ages 3-17! I have always loved going to Dr. White's office to get any and all of my dental work done. I love the hygienists, especially Ms. Sharon! They all have a great sense of humor, a lot of patience, and are super friendly! Dr. White is very passionate about her work. It is a strong Christian environment! I would recommend anyone taking their children to see Dr. White for any dental needs!

name: PJ Warren
text: This dentist does not allow parents to go back with their children which is concerning. I have a responsibility to my child to oversee and protect her. For this reason we will not be returning but will find another dentist that is more parent friendly.

text: My experiences at Dr. White's office have been nothing but amazing! Very friendly and relaxing atmosphere for children and the staff is wonderful as well. I would recommend this office to anyone looking for a knowledgeable Dentist and staff.

name: David Lowe
text: First of all, I can never get anyone on the phone, and when they finally get on the phone they don't seem to care. As a nurse, I am always going above and beyond for my patients and making sure that they have everything they need. I went in for an adjustment and they made a huge mess all over the dentures and told me that I would need to clean it. When I tried to schedule the appointment for my actual dentures I was told I had to wait another month, then they finally scheduled me, then sent me an email saying they needed to reschedule me and left a voicemail, YET when I tried to return the phone call NO ONE ANSWERED the phone!!!!  WORSE DENTAL CARE I HAVE EVER RECEIVED!!!!!

resp.text: I’m really sorry to hear that, David. The Patient Satisfaction Team would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you in order to learn more about your experience and address this concern directly: 1-866-767-0890. – Mitch, ADMI

I had a consultation at affordable dentures I am cancelling because this is gonna be the place for me to get my teeth taken care of .Thank you all at Aspen y'all are amazing.
UPDATE :
I got 24 teeth removed in that office. Still 5 stars did a good job with my dentures.

name: Gracie “Spaghetti soup” May
text: I was nervous going in cause of some of these reviews but I really enjoyed it the staff was extremely kind the cleaning was good I go back for a root canal soon but everyone was very kind I really enjoyed it

resp.text: Hi Gracie, Each person experiences life in their own way. Often times, a patient can come in with their own preconceived thoughts, as to how the outcome should be. However, when a dentist does the exam, and finds something different, they immediately feel upset. No one likes to get news of possible dental work that will need to be done. It's scary, and costly, we get that. Everyone has their own way of dealing with good and bad situations. We would hope that all our potential patients would rather make up their own decisions, based on their own experiences. You were pleasantly surprised, and we are thrilled you took the step to see for yourself!! Be well - Cindy, ADMI

name: Drew Humphrey-Morgan
text:
The receptionist keeps her front desk on point, sharp as a tac! The young lady over financial is a pleasure to work with. Kindly direct, honest, and offers very helpful advice!

My nurse delivered excellent care. Very considerate and thoughtful, she was in for the win during my predictable “episode” (Fainted. I don’t much like needles). But under her tender ministrations, I was soon ready for the main event.

Don’t let the young appearance of the doctor fool you, he is very competent and professional. I’m always apprehensive at the dentist, but his bedside manner and cool disposition proved to be very settling. I felt no pain! Zero, zilch, nada! Even now, I’m feeling great the day after having two teeth pulled!

I still have a long road ahead of me, but I’m glad I decided to go with these people. They are wonderful!

resp.text: I'm happy to hear that, Drew. Thanks for sharing! - Dawn, ADMI
