name: Natalie Cisneros
text: Dr Steinmetz has the best pediatric practice! My 3 year old is very anxious about visiting any kind of doctor but was very much at ease and excited as she walked in the doors. The waiting room has a sweet space that they transformed into an aquarium adventure with cute seahorses painted on the walls, adorable fish suspended on the ceiling and a cool black light to make the whites pop. My girl loved it. During her appointment Dr Steinmetz and her staff took their time to introduce themselves to my daughter and gain her trust and also explain to her what they were doing. I’ve never been so proud of how at ease and cooperative  my girl was and it was all possibly because of caring spirit that you feel when you first walk in.I absolutely recommend this practice.

resp.text: Thank you Natalie for your kind words. We are so pleased to hear you and your adorable daughter enjoyed her first dental visit with us. She is a “rockstar”! Thank you for noticing our attention to details that create a fun and relaxing environment for all. Y’all made our hearts smile and we look forward to future preventive dental visits. Smiles, Stephanie Steinmetz

name: Alex Grodner
text: Dr. Stephanie and all of the dental hygienists were extremely warm and welcoming to my son and me. They provided all the helpful information leading up to the visit and gave us more (do's and don't's) on our way out. My 2 year old son LOVED his experience and is looking forward to his next visit!

resp.text: Thank you.   We are excited to have you in our dental family.  We had a blast with him and look forward to seeing him for his next visit.

name: Beth Hontzas
text: I am thrilled that we made the switch to Dr. Steinmetz! Our daughter has Down syndrome and our past dental visits have always been very stressful. Knowing that, Dr. Steinmetz and our Dental Hygienist Khurstie went above and beyond to make it the most wonderful experience for her! They knew her love for Trolls so they all dressed like queen Poppy and had Trolls music going! She absolutely felt like a queen! Khurstie gained her trust so much that she let her use dental tools that she completely refused before. I highly recommend them!

resp.text: Yeah Beth! It was a pleasure meeting you and your sweet daughter. We love playing dress up! We’re happy y’all had a fantastic time with us. Glad you “found your daughter’s happy dental place!”. Thanks for your trust. We’re thankful for amazing families like you. Looking forward to future preventive dental visits with your rockstar daughter! Smiles, Stephanie Steinmetz

name: Meredith Stinson
text: Today was our first visit.  Dr. Steinmetz and staff made us and our son feel very welcome and well taken care of!  It was such a wonderful experience!  She was my husband's dentist when he was a child and now having my son see her is so special!  We love Dr. Steinmetz and highly recommend her!

resp.text: He had a great visit and left us smiling.  We are thankful for the confidence your husband has in our  dental team to let us be a part of taking care of your family. We look forward to many more fun, preventive dental visits.  We appreciate your kind words. Smiles, Dr. Stephanie and Staff

name: Nicole
text: My children LOVE going to see Dr.Stephanie. Her office and team make a visit to the dentist so much fun! Dr.Stephanie truly cares about our children and is the only place we'll take our family. We couldn't ask for better care!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words.  We always enjoy seeing you and your family.

name: rtide2
text: My son has been going to this office since he was one years old. We always receive the best care.  We tried another dentist one time due to distance.  We quickly came right back to Dr. Steinmetz.  He is very comfortable with the staff and Dr. Steinmetz.  So worth the extra drive time!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review! We are so glad you guys came back! Thank you for allowing us to be your dental home.

name: Laurel Novack
text: My two year old had her first check up today. It was such a wonderful experience! The office was welcoming and so fun. The staff was so sweet to greet us as we arrived. My little one was happy to be there, and not scared at all! She left the office and talked about it the rest of the day. I know her dental care is in good hands! I can't say enough about how wonderful Dr. Stephanie and her staff was to us. Highly recommend to anyone!

resp.text: We are so glad she had such a great visit! We loved meeting your sweet family. Thank you for picking us as your child's dental home.

name: Kelly Parson
text: We love Dr. Steinmetz and her team. They are so kid-centric at their office - all smiles and rainbows. The office is colorful and fun and the staff is so warm and friendly.  Our daughter loves going here for cleanings and checkups.  She unfortunately had her first cavity and had to have that filled, but they did it with such ease. Mommy (me) was out of town for work and anxious about the procedure. They sent me an email with photos right after that eased my mind.  Everything went so smoothly. I would recommend them to anyone with kids!

resp.text: Thank you so much!  Your daughter is precious and had a fun operative visit. She loves having her picture taken! Thank you for allowing us to be her dental home. Stephanie Steinmetz

name: Panda Man
text: This place is the BEST! It is decorated so cute, they have fun playrooms and books for the kids. The waiting room and restroom are nice and clean. Dr. Stephanie and all of her staff are top notch!! My kids are always excited to go which is an experience I NEVER had as a child. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you so much Kelli.  As always it was great to see all of you today.  Our patients makes our day so much fun!!

name: lauren wall
text: Dr. Steinmetz and her staff are always extremely nice and friendly. They always have big smiles on their faces, and they genuinely care about their patients. I've been going to Dr. Steinmetz for about 18 years, and I have never once had anything to complain about. The dental hygienists are always very careful when they clean, so it doesn't hurt at all, which is a great plus when the patients are children. I highly recommend Dr. Steinmetz's dentistry.

resp.text: Thank you Lauren. Your kind words mean the world to us. I love watching my patients grow up with positive dental experiences! We look forward to seeing you soon. Hugs, Dr. S

name: WBRC Fox6
text: We have always had a wonderful experience with Dr Steinmetz!  She was my dentist when I was a child and now my children see her - how special!  We love Dr Steinmetz!

resp.text: Thank you sweet Clare. What an honor it is to see your precious children. We always look forward to their visits and seeing you! Hugs, Dr. S

name: Lacy
text: Cutest office and fantastic staff!! We had the best first time experience with our 20 month old!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words! We loved getting to meet your sweet boy!

text: It is a pleasure to see Dr. Steinmetz every time we take our children to her office. Dr. Steinmetz is wonderful! She is so great with children and such a thorough, very professional dentist at the same time. Her staff is always so sweet and patient with the children. I would recommend their office to anyone and I would not send my children to anyone else!!

resp.text: Thank you so much! Great seeing y'all. Stephanie Steinmetz

text: My kids have been going to Dr. Steinmetz since they were two years old, and they are 10 and 14 now. They love her and the staff and always look forward to their visits. resp.text: Thank you Anne. It's always nice to see you and your sweet kids. I'm so glad it's always a positive experience coming to visit us! Stephanie Steinmetz

text: We have had a wonderful experience with Dr. Stephanie and staff!  I have four children with varying ages, and they all enjoyed their visits.  My 6 year old was a little apprehensive, but was quickly set at ease by a well trained and personable staff.  The office is also inviting and conveniently located.  Thank you!  We will be back!!

name: Misty Cuthbert
text: Dr. Stephanie and her staff are the BEST! Her office is warm and inviting, my daughters always feel comfortable there, and I feel like we receive top notch dental care. Last year when one of my children experienced a dental "emergency," they worked us in quickly (no wait!) and were so kind, caring, and thorough in answering our questions. I would not hesitate to recommend her practice to anyone!

resp.text: Thank you Misty! We treat our  patients as if they are our own children. I'm so glad your pleased with the dental care, customer service and attention to detail that we strive to provide. I appreciate your kind words. Stephanie Steinmetz

text: Dr. Stephanie and her staff always take such great care of my four children. They go to great lengths to spend time explaining the exam and their recommendations. The office is always clean and inviting and the entire staff is friendly and welcoming. My kids actually look forward to going to the dentist! As a mother, I couldn't ask for a better dental experience for my children.

resp.text: Thank you so much for noticing the attention to detail we strive to provide to everyone in our dental family. It is a pleasure and super fun seeing you and your fun kids! Stephanie Steinmetz

name: Christina Saunders
text: Loved, loved, loved our visit. Dr. Steinmetz is wonderful and welcoming. Her hygienists did great with my girls, 3 and 5, and the staff was super friendly. We've been to a different pediatric dentist in town, and I have to say that Dr. Steinmetz's office put the other one to shame. Very caring and made our girls feel comfortable, welcome, and well taken care of. Highly recommended.

resp.text: Wow, wow, wow Christina! Y'all were so much fun. I am thrilled the girls had a wonderful dental experience  with us at their new dental home. Stephanie Steinmetz

name: dawn brian
text: Dr. Stephanie and her team are miracle workers!!  My son has special needs including extreme sensory issues and dental appointments tend to be a challenge.  However, Dr. Stephanie and her staff have an intuitive sense of how to distract and calm my child ensuring a successful visit every time.  They are filled with patience and compassion as well as have a strong heart connection with children with special needs. Five stars aren't enough!!

resp.text: You are so kind. It is our pleasure to see your beautiful family. Thank you for  your trust, confidence and friendship ! Much appreciated, Stephanie Steinmetz

text: Today was our first visit, and Dr. Steinmetz and staff made us and our daughter feel very welcome and taken care of!

resp.text: It was a pleasure meeting your sweet family today! So proud of  your daughter and such a fantastic first visit! we look forward to  future preventive dental visits❤️

name: Heather King
text: I took my daughter for her first dentist visit today and Dr Steinmetz and her staff were wonderful! They spent one on one time with my daughter and made her feel very comfortable. Their kindness made this appointment a great experience. You never know how a child will do at the dentist, especially the first time, so I am so thankful that they made us feel at home.

resp.text: So nice to meet y'all today. What a great first dental visit! We are excited to be your sweet daughter's dental home!  Stephanie Steinmetz

text: Dr. Stephanie is truly blessed with the gift of pediatric dentistry. We had seen another “pediatric” dentist for my son, they don’t even compare to the kindness and child oriented atmosphere of Steinmetz Pediatric. We are so very thankful for Dr. Stephanie and her team!

text: We've always been very pleased with Dr. Steinmetz and her staff.  They seem to really care about their patients' ongoing progress and future dental care needs. Side benefit: The office is cute and helps ease the children's fears with fun toys, fish tank and elevated train track.

resp.text: Thank you  Stacey! So nice to see your sweet family. Very pleased with all the great dental progress we have made. I really appreciate the opportunity to provide great dental care to your precious children. Stephanie Steinmetz

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words. We love having your family as part of our dental family. They are so sweet and we always look forward to them coming in! Stephanie Steinmetz

text: We just had our first visit with Dr. "Stephanie" Steinmetz and I could not have imagined it going better for my shy and sometimes fearful 2 year old. name: RC Hunting
text:
My elderly mother had a toothache, so I called her normal dentist, The Dental Office in Moody. We scheduled an appointment, got ready and drove her down there. After we had waited about 10 minutes, we were informed that she could pay out of pocket or reschedule because her insurance provider's site was down. I asked the obvious question, "Why can't she be seen now and file her insurance later?" The receptionist took my question to someone in the back. She came back with the answer that doing it that way would be insurance fraud! Whaaat?!?!?!?!?

I called my dentist's office in Birmingham, told them the situation. The lady who does the billing and insurance happened to be the person who answered the phone. She said that was the craziest thing she'd ever heard. Needless to say, I will not be taking any of my family to The Dental Office in Moody again.
If they will turn away an old lady in pain, what might your future hold if You decide to use them?

name: Randy Langley
text: Came in for my scheduled cleaning and Maddie worked on me. She is very professional, is gentle and very thorough. It was the best cleaning I've ever had.  You Rock Maddie! Keep up the good work.

name: patrick c
text:
Erica is the best. If you want a good cleaning with no pain, she’s the hygienist for you, an Dr. Engel is just the best.
I love going there & I hated the dentist for most of my life.

name: Lisa Love
text: On April 24th, 2021, I Lisa Love a new patient of The Dentist Office of Moody, Al. I had a filling come out  of my back molars tooth. With such a awesome dentistry team working together such as Dr. Cordero DMD and his amazing assistants named Kayla, Laura, & Arlene it turned out I needed a root canal. Dr. Engle DMD came in to give a second opinion and all was confirmed it was definitely in need of a root canal. At this time I overheard there was three root canals in a row. Well, without any hesitation the whole staffing jumped into gear and with great performance I was all done with prescriptions for pain in hand. With my deepest sincerely and my great surprise the pain meds were unnecessary because I never had to use them. I never felt any pain. I guess that what you call a outstanding dentistry office. I give them a TEN!!!! ( For Most Satisfied New Patient)

name: Jennie Rhymer
text: I’ve been going to the dental office since I was a kid. They have progressively got worse over the last few years. I would not recommend to anyone and will be looking for a new dentist today.

resp.text: Hi Jennie, sorry we did not meet your expectations.  The issue with the insurance plan was out of our control.  Our insurance staff do everything in their power to get as many details as possible from insurance companies. Many times we are advised by an insurance company to have the employee read their handbook.  It is NOT the response we want but it is what we get more times than we would like.  We will send your records to any dentist of your choosing.  We wish you the best.

name: Ullman Mitchell
text: Doctor Engle & his staff are great!!

name: • K I M B E R L Y •
text: This place is AMAZING! After going to 5 different places and not being helped, I came across this great place and not only were they super nice, they were able to help me and give me what I need and want! I definitely recommend this place to everyone!!! Also, I have to point out that the office manager is an agel!! She was extremely helpful and nice to me! Thank u everyone who helped me! Yall made my Christmas!!

resp.text: We are lucky to have so many AMAZING patients.  You are one of them.  THANK YOU and Happy Holidays!

name: Shawn Hobbs
text: Excellent service and very friendly staff. I am a new patient and everyone made sure I felt welcome. Looking forward to my next visit. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Hi Shawn.  Well you certainly made it easy!  Thank you for this review and Happy Holidays!

name: Reginald Tillis
text: Dr. Engle and his staff are the best! I love the way he jiggles your face before he numbs you to ease your anxiety. I would recommend The Dental Office Of Moody to anyone!

resp.text: THANK YOU Reginald.  Your comfort is important to us.  Dr. Engle has alot of tricks for making numbing you up easier.  Happy Holidays!

name: Audra Widner
text: I went to get a cleaning and have previous dental work looked at. The dentist said I needed 3 filling which seemed kind of odd considering I had just been to a different dentist 2 weeks prior and I was cavity free. But I trusted him and he did 2 fillings and the 3rd filling he just put a deep hole in my bottom tooth and sent me home. When I got home I realized there was a big deep open hole in my tooth. So I go back up there to have it filled. The dentist said out loud, "why did I do that?" Which lets me know he messed up. While he was sticking needles in my mouth to numb everything, which never got numb, he hit one of my top teeth with the needle and made a hole. The whole procedure was so incredibly painful and they just kept going. So now I have to get that hole fixed plus the tooth he put a deep hole in then filled, it still hurts. Also while drilling he hit so many surrounding teeth with the drill, made punctures and grooves in teeth that are now sensitive.  I can't chew  anything even a little bit crunchy on the right side of my mouth.  When I called asking for a refund nobody ever got back with me and they feel like they did everything right. I wish I had never came and trusted them to touch my teeth because they were just fine and pain free before all this. I'm calling the Dental Board and the Better Business Bureau.

name: Mark
text: The front office staff is completely incompetent. They have issues verifying your insurance and insist on getting you SSN (which is not needed as long as they have the Name and plan number of your insurance). They have a high turnover of Dentist. So if the practice is ran like the front office I understand why they have a high turnover. So enter at your own risk.

resp.text: Hello. Insurance companies OFTEN require the ss# of the insured. Name and plan # do not identify the individual insured. Thankfully you have many offices to choose from. We wish you well.

name: Trishia Layfield
text: The office staff is unorganized and quite rude. My husband and I will find a different dental office to go to...

resp.text: Hi Trisha. We were more than happy to work in Mr. Layfield even though his appointment was on a different day. Sorry he felt we were rude for trying to work this out for him. It takes a few minutes to accommodate unscheduled appointments.

name: Amy Cone
text: Excellent Service, Nice friendly staff,  2 root canals in less than a week, they were able to take my pain away!  The doctor is easy on the eyes too ;)

resp.text: Amy. Thank you for your review. Tooth pain is the worst. Glad we could help you. Happy Holidays!

name: Ja Smith
text: I would gladly give more stars, if it were possible.  Dr Engle took a bad experience and turned it around completely. These teeth fit perfectly!  I recomend them 110%.  Best experience at the dentist I've  ever had!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this humbling review. You made it easy.  We appreciate you!

name: karen everett
text: Had an appointment scheduled for today. They left a message asking that I call and confirm the appointment. I called and confirmed when I woke up. Found out this morning from my Emergency contact they called them yesterday to change my appointment. A fact they didn't bother to tell me personally when I called to confirm. Not to mention calling an emergency contact over a non-emergency

resp.text: Emergency contact should not be used for appointment reminder. Our mistake. Thank you for sharing your experience.  Glad you gave us another opportunity to be better.

name: Valerie Tyler
text: I had a tooth extracted in October and had many complications from it. Rather than being rude and frustrated to see me for 3 separate follow ups over the course of 2 months for what should have been a minor procedure, Dr. Cordaro was extremely generous and did whatever he could to help fix the pain I was in.

resp.text: Hi Valerie, complications happen from time to time and we want our patient to be comfortable and out of pain.  There are all kinds of reasons a patient can have complications that can not be predicted or prevented.  There is never a good reason to be rude!  Thank you for being a great patient!

name: Jessica Carmichael
text: They get you in and out quick and they make sure your comfortable

resp.text: Thank you Jessica! We do our best.  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review.

name: Brittany Smith
text: Updating my review.They have rude staff. My daughter had to have surgery, was prepped and taken back ALMOST put to sleep and then the dr came out and said his office made a mistake with the paper work and we would have to reschedule. Just terrible experience with everyone.

resp.text: IMPOSSIBLE         Brittany,  I looked at your chart and your daughter would have to be very young.  WE DO NOT put children to sleep - ever!   I think this review is for some other office.    I hope you locate the correct office.  205 640 1717  Tamie

name: Rhiley Hyde
text: Chad Damnley pulled my wisdom teeth at 28 weeks & was great no pain . Very short & painless. Today pulled a broken tooth (painless) that one dentist could not bc it was too painful . Highly recommend!

resp.text: Hello Rhiley.  Thank you for taking the time to write this great review.  We have to agree - Dr. Dammling is beyond amazing.  We appreciate you being our patient.

name: Laura Greene
text: Doctors work well with the children .staff that works out front very very very rude!!

resp.text: We were not able to verify you (or any children) as being a patient here.  However, thank you for the kind words about our doctors.  We agree - they are awesome!

name: Janie Norris
text:
I several teeth extracted and received an  upper denture three days ago at The Dental Office in Moody. The entire staff ensured my comfort throughout the procedure which resulted in a very pleasant experience.  The professionalism and kindness shown was very much appreciated.  The COVID-19 coronavirus was in full swing with all precautions taken for the protection of their patients and staff.

Thank you all for a job well done. I look forward to my next procedure.

Janie Norris

resp.text: Janie, you were a great patient. We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. Patient safety and care are top priorities.

name: Michaela Newell
text: Dr. Engle is hands down the best dentist you will ever see. He is VERY knowledgeable and he takes the time to share with you the information to why you need certain procedures. Dr. Engle has done many procedures on me a root canal, build-up and crown, pulled a tooth, placed a bone graft, placed an implant and an implant crown, a few fillings, and now he is doing my Invisalign treatment. Dr. Engle is the only dentist that I have ever had that can give an injection (numbing medicine) and it not hurt. He always try’s his best to make sure that you are completely comfortable before he starts any procedure. There is absolutely no one else I would trust more than him. His kind heart pours into his work. You can definitely tell he loves what he does. He is always putting his patients first. The office is always so nice and clean. Whitley, my hygienist is also amazing. She works very hard to make sure you are comfortable during your cleaning. The office as a whole is just wonderful. I used to have anxiety about going to the dentist but Dr. Engle and his staff have completely changed that for me.

name: kyle Parker
text: I recently switched dental offices and I have to say this is the best I’ve ever been to .  The staff are so friendly and it’s very easy to get an appointment.  They also offer a variety of services to fit your needs. I have also had my teeth whitened by them for my wedding and I was not at all expecting this much of a difference. Excellent dental office I highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you for this outstanding review.  We appreciate you!

name: Drippy Sausage69
text: If you don't have a lot of money, don't come here. They take Medicare, but you won't get much out of it. One of my teeth had a absence, so they had to remove it. But they wouldn't replace it unless my family had $2,000. Now I'm stuck with a missing tooth. So if you're poor, don't waste your time with these people.

resp.text: Your plan dictates your treatment and cost.

name: Skye Underwood
text: Hands down the best dentist I have ever been to. I had a painless and effortless root canal and bridge and they quickly knocked it out in one sitting at an affordable price. Not to mention, all the employees at The Dental Office are very kind and genuinely care about the customer’s satisfaction. Couldn’t be happier.

name: X P
text: This place is not friendly.  It is not professional.  Does not come recommended!  3 New patients last week, follow up this week (without work completed) & about 8 hours tied up in the 2 visits, again epic fail 2nd visit!  Don’t go there!  These were kids & not 1 of them enjoyed the people or the atmosphere!

resp.text: We will be more than happy to forward any records to a dentist of your choice.  There are many offices in this area.  Hopefully, you can locate one that fits your needs.

name: Madison Kelly
text: I absolutely love this place. Dr. Kentros is an excellent dentist and always listens to my concerns. Arlene usually works with him and I love her! Every time I'm there they have made the experience phenomenal. Thank you all for everything you have done for me. You have made my smile beautiful again.

resp.text: THANK YOU MADISON!

name: Blake Howard
text: Had a root canal and crown. After getting the crown I mentioned that the tooth was still hurt. I was told it simply couldnt because there werent any nerves to hurt. Now 6 months later sometimes when eating it will ache like it was before the root canal.

resp.text: Hello Mr. Howard.  THANK YOU for posting this in a public forum.  It helps us to know what is going on with patients and gives us insight for where we can improve.  Speaking in general terms,  other teeth on either side of the one treated can cause pain.  You may call our office to schedule for any remaining treatment or we will forward your xrays to an office of your choice.  Thank you again and best wishes to you.

name: Allison Jones
text: I cannot praise Dr. Engle and his staff enough! I have a real fear of the dentist due to past experiences and I called them with an emergency and they took the best care of me, came up with a treatment plan and made sure I understood everything they were doing step by step. Absolutely over the moon about this crew!

resp.text:
Allison, we are here for your dental needs. Even though you said you were nervous you did GREAT!
Thank YOU for being an awesome patient.

name: dana Saab
text: Well I was a patient years ago, left for various reasons. So after years I thought I would go back due to location and had heard management had change. Well to say the least on the day of my first appointment which was at 1015, at 1100 still not spoke to or seen. I ask the receptionist how long it would be and response not sure, so I continued to wait. 11.10 is was over left. Best of luck doesn’t seem much has changed

resp.text: Hi Dana,  thank you for taking the time to write a review.  Although it is tough to know we let you down and did not live up to the standards we have for our patients, your review will help us to be better.

text: I have always had a great experience at The Dental Office of Moody, but I have to give a shout out to Erica the dental hygienist who took great care of me while I was 7 months pregnant and got sick during my cleaning. name: John Higginbotham
text: Very warm and friendly staff! I always feel like my dental needs are more than taken care of. I always feel more than welcome. I highly recommend The Dental Office of Moody!

resp.text: Hello John.  You made it easy.  We appreciate you as well!

name: Syquitta Oneal
text: I had my tooth pulled on SATURDAY THE 12th and the doctor was very very good. Even the staff was very friendly...thank u beautiful woman u all made me very comfortable.It took him 2 minutes and my tooth was out... Later that day after  the numbness went away I haven’t felt anything...I WILL HIGHLY HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM ....I will return for all my treatments 💯!!

resp.text: What a great review!   Some treatment can be uncomfortable BUT we do our best to make patients are comfortable as possible  We care about you!

name: Yvonne schneckenberger
text: I just moved to town and I am so glad we decided to choose this dentist office! Everyone was so friendly and helpful! Prices were very reasonable compared to last place. I would definitely recommend!

resp.text: Welcome to our office.  Thank you for allowing us to provide your dental care!

name: Steven Raughton
text: Absolutely love these guys! Always a great experience. Very friendly and do a fantastic job keeping my teeth looking their best. Can't brag on them enough!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.

name: Logan Naijiana
text: Very nice and professional staff! Helps you get on a better path to good oral hygiene and always keeps it real. Dr Banks is so nice!

resp.text: Hi Logan.  Dr. Banks is in a word - awesome.  Our doctors and all the staff care about our patients and their oral health.   Thank you for choosing us!

name: Katlin Johnson
text: I went in for my teeth cleaning and right from the start I was pleased. the staff was very nice and I was able to get back in a timely manner and while I was back getting work done they always made sure that I was comfortable. the staff  from the time I walked through the door to leaving was very nice and considerate. I would definitely highly recommend them for any dental needs.

resp.text: Thank you Katlin.   This is what we strive to do for every patient.

name: Kendall hubbard
text:
Lisa Hubbard, Dr. Anthony Engle is amazing.   Dr. Engle had to put a LOT of shots in my mouth for both appointments.  The most dreaded part of any dental visit. I have NEVER had a dentist that could give you these shots without killing you.  Well Dr. Engle CAN.    If you have a fear of the dentist as I do,  I promise Dr. Engle is the dental professional for you.  I cannot thank Dr. Engle enough for the beautiful smile he has given me.
His staff is professional, friendly, and caring.  I Highly recommend  Dr. Engle and his staff at The Dental Office of Moody.    Lisa Hubbard 4/10/2020

resp.text: Thank you sweet lady!

name: Julie Glenn
text: I took my girls to this office, because it was the closest. Our first time in there my fifteen year old daughter was told that the black from the Fluoride would be between her teeth and we wouldn’t be able to see it. She went out to the car and I finished paying the copay. When I got out to the car she had black all over her teeth, all over her mouth, splattered all of her arms, and on her brand new jeans she was wearing. The second time I took my sixteen year old daughter to have a filling done. She was flossing two days later and the filling came out. She had to have shots in her mouth again to fix it. Never has there been an apology. I was told my youngest daughter could wash the black splatters off with soap and water that she smeared all over herself. It was not smeared. You could see were it landed all over her from them working on her mouth. This place is ridiculous. If you are reading reviews the are giving away a TV if you leave a good review.

resp.text: Hello Julie.  Although this review is difficult to read it is valuable to us.  I appreciate you taking the time to describe your experience.  I will call you on Monday and see if there is anything we can do to correct this.  We do care about our patients.  My name is Tamie Smith.  I am the business admin for the practice.  Please feel free to reach out to me anytime.  205 640 1717.  I look forward to resolving this on Monday.  Thank you again.

name: Amy lee
text: Excellent visit coming from one who has severe dental anxiety! Keisha & Dr. Swicord were just what I needed! So patient  understanding, accomodating,professional! A root canal actually ended up being pleasant! I am super impressed! Please give them a chance if you need any work done! They absolutely made sure I wasn't in any pain! Everything ran so smooth. Office staff verified my 2 insurances & let me know what my out of pocket price would be! So impressed in several areas!!

resp.text: We want you and all of our patients to be comfortable.  A comfortable patient plus a well informed patient is a HAPPY patient!

text: I've been going to the Dental Office of Moody for a few years now. I really like that they have Saturday appointments. When I first started going I needed a decent amount of dental work done and the Saturday appointments made it where I didn't have to miss a lot of work. They have a very friendly staff as well.  I will continue going there for years to come.

resp.text: Hi Randi.  Thank you for your wonderful review.  Our Saturdays are very popluar!

name: Audrey Webb

text: My family has always had a great experience. My children are always treated with love and have been going here since they were little. Jennifer Kirkland an Devin were wonderful with our boys today. Everyone has clean teeth!!

text:
The wait was long , but only becouse of how biz they are today.( which in it's self shows it's a good place) But I have a friend that works here , and I know my pregnant wife will be well cared for.   The few staff members I talked with where very friendly and knowledgeable.
Over all I'm very happy. And thank you the dental office of moody ( and to my friend she knows who she is lol)

resp.text: Hello James.  Thank you for this great review.  We try to stay on time but some patients need more than others.  Once you are in the chair we give each patient the time they need.  We care about every patient - every appointment.  Best wishes to you and your wife!

name: Carrie Wilson
text: I have had 3 cleanings at The Dental Office of Moody and have had a great experience every time. The receptionists are friendly, professional, and accommodating. My hygienist, Jennifer Kirkland, and all the dentists have provided excellent care. I definitely recommend this place!

resp.text: Carrie, thank you for taking the time to write this review.  We care about our patients.  100% satisfaction is our goal.

name: Maggie njoyinlyf
text: My family has always had a great experience. My children are always treated with love and have been going here since they were little. Jennifer Kirkland an Devin were wonderful with our boys today. Everyone has clean teeth!!

resp.text: Maggie, your review means alot to us.  We strive for a great experience for every patient.  Thank you!

name: S Carroll
text: Great staff. Wonderful job at explaining things. Always a good experience. So glad I started going to Dental Office of Moody.

resp.text: We are glad too!  Thank you!

name: Breanna Martin
text: Had a great experience here! They were all so kind and helpful. Great work 👍🏼

resp.text: Breanna, thank you for the wonderful review.  You make our job easy!

name: Tammy Defoor
text:
Been coming here for awhile. Every visit is an schedule appointment!! I sit either in waiting room or in the back for a least an hour ,and a half before they start.  Just tired of the wait!!
I understand completely about running into problems BUT EVERY TIME WE COME IN!!

resp.text: Tammy, thank you for taking the time to post this review.  I want you to know your input is important to us.  We will do everything possible to make sure this is resolved.   Your input will make us a better office.  I thank you again for taking the time to post a review.  Please accept my apologies for your having to wait for your treatment.

name: Cortez Horn
text: I went recommend a dog to go here because they do not care about your time, you can show up on time for a appointment and still wait 45 minutes to get seeing they are bad overbooking patience.

resp.text: Mr. Horn, any delays in our office is not about over booking. We have two doctors and four hygienists. The doctors and hygienists work efficiently and carefully with each patient. Some patients and/or the treatment requires extra time in the chair. Once treatment begins, we are bound to complete it. We can not ask a patient to get out of the chair just because their time is up. We take the time needed for each person. We may not be the fastest but we CARE about every patient. Whether you stay with us or any great office the first appointment of the day may be best for your schedule.

name: Jakobee Jackson
text: I have gone to this dentistry for years and have always loved it. They are always friendly and professional. I used to come when I was a kid and they had the perfect staff to make sure I was okay and as a 19 year old young adult, they still know how to make me smile and keep a good atmosphere. I will continue to go here!

name: pam calamusa
text: I found this place through a web search under the search term "denture repair while you wait." So, I called them and told them how my eye tooth on my upper denture had broken off. The lady said come on in and we will help you with that. I was so excited and hopeful! I went to their office, filled out paperwork, presented insurance cards, etc. They took me back, put me in a dental chair, the dentist came in and said we can't help you, we don't have a lab on site. I suspect that they could have repaired it, but the cost would be too low for their taste. If you're gonna advertise dentures repaired while you wait on the interweb, you should probably offer that actual service. Of course they were happy to give me a quote for a whole new denture! False advertising? At the very least. In the future if I do buy a new set of dentures, it will most definitely not be from these yahoos!  Tom Calamusa

resp.text: Unfortunately, all denture repairs can not be done in office.  Our goal is to give you the best service possible.    Sorry we did not meet your expectations.

name: Becky Shirley
text: My mother had to have a crown replaced. They told her a price and what her part was going to cost. She paid it right then. After 2 months the procedure was finished, why it took 2 months is beyond me. They are now sending her bills for more money even after the insurance company has paid their part too. Also charged the insurance company for 2 tooth crowns and not just one.

name: BJ Kidd
text: Terrible experience.  Unorganized.  Worked on the correct tooth for one family member but applied Novocain shots to the wrong side of the mouth.  Performed a filling that is failing only after a couple of months.  Another family member sat in the Dentists chair for 2 hours and 30 min without performing any work.  Billing was also a headache very difficult to work with and a confusing bill.  Complete waste of time and money.

name: Keith Foshee
text: Was referred to this place by my Dental Insurance Company.    Called at  3 various times during business hours and got answering service every time.    Very little command of English language.    Left message on 3rd try for someone to please call me back to schedule an appointment.    24 Hours have passed and still no call.    If this is an indication of how they run the business- then I wouldn't do business with them anyway.    So very unprofessional.

name: kash05052010
text: Anita is awesome! She’s sweet and does her job well!!

name: Amberlyn Porter
text: Tammy was my dental hygienist and she was amazing. I absolutely love how comfortable and aware she made me in the time of my visit. This place is definitely home for me!

name: James Mucha
text: From the front counter upon entering the facility, to the dental hygienist, to Dr. White, I received phenomenal service and a thorough exam. Staff were very friendly and professional. I know what to expect each and every visit and have never been disappointed. I will continue my dental care at Cumberland.

name: Kindeth Martin
text: Very rude unprofessional group. I called to get a bill resolved because they did not file my insurance, (which I gave them the correct insurance card at the time of my appointment), she told me she'd have to send my information to corporate, (which was suppose to be done at my appointment) and I told her I didn't care what they had to do, I just wanted my bill resolved, I got hung up on. I called back, I asked for a supervisor, I was told a supervisor would call me, (mind you none of my information was asked for) I asked her is she was gonna take my information, in a smart tone she said "We have called ID", I explained to her I was calling from work and wanted them to call me back on my cell phone, well then she proceeded to remember who I was. Please do not waste your time here, they do not care about you nor your health and the also will not allow you to make payments on your bill. Go to someone who cares because its obviously not this group.

name: LWV Tuscaloosa
text: I have been going to Cumberland Dental for 8 years.  Right after I moved to Tuscaloosa the front half of a molar broke off.  I picked Cumberland Dental from the Yellow Pages, found that it takes my dental insurance and got a prompt appointment with Dr. White.  He made a crown for the tooth that is completely satisfactory after 8 years.  He has replaced a couple of old fillings and the new ones are fine.  Emily, the hygienist who takes care of my routine visits, is really competent, professional and friendly.  I certainly would recommend both of them to anyone.

name: Raymond C
text: There is a long wait time between visits but Dr White is excellent. He does not hurt you when he gives the numbing shot. The assistants are mostly nice. However whoever they call in to do tooth extractions will hurt you. I wish Dr. White would teach them how to give a shot.

name: Alethia Smith
text: This is the worst dentist ofice, to go too! The woman that did my cleaning, had a nasty and unprofessional attitude. She didn't speak to me or ask how i was doing and act like she really hated her job. I want EVER go back there. So please stop emailing me..for a follow up on my cleanings. I have never ever experienced such bad attitudes in my whole life on earth. The equipment , looks horrible and looks old. I can go on. I should of left as soon as i meet the woman that i dealt with. She looked so mean and unhelpful. You all want ever have to worry about me EVER again. I wasn't comfortable at all in there.She acted like she was even more mad, because i had braces on and that i just needed to get a cleaning. They need to fire her. She is one of the main reasons..you all or getting bad business. Please get more educated and professional workers in there. Its like going to hell and back, going there straight up.  People, please take my advice and don't waste your money or time!!!!!! No stars, none whats so ever! I'm still pissed off. Hate i had to even like one star...to submit this post.

name: Sheila Garner
text: I have had a wonderful experience!!!! Couldn’t ask for better service, friendly and helpful staff! Staff takes time to answer questions that you may have, I highly recommend them!!!

name: Mary Black
text: Every one is caring and they took great Care of my needs. I have high anxiety and they were great helping me stay calm etc.

name: Sherri Custred
text: Came here for implant surgery. Am now 5 MONTHS BEHIND schedule because their implant dentist and scheduler can't seem to get things right. I have rearranged my schedule to be here 5 TIMES and been told I have to reschedule. As soon as I am finished here,  I WILL NEVER COME TO THIS OFFICE AGAIN. IF I HADN'T MADE THE MISTAKE OF PAYING FOR ALL OF MY PROCEDURES I WOULDN'T EVER COME BACK!

name: Shamaria Borden
text: The first visit wasn't bad at all. The lady who did my cleaning was very informative and nice. However, I have been rescheduled 3 consecutive times for my cavities to be filled. Whoever this lady is, who's supposed to perform my fillings, has been out of the office seems for months now. My rescheduled appts. have now ran into a 3 month period. It's extremely frustrating. I have chosen to switch dentists.

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: They make you feel comfortable during your stay, I was very impressed with the care that I had!! I would definitely refer anyone to Cumberland dental!!!

name: Js Bell
text: Everyone was very nice and professional. Procedure was quick and painless.😊

name: Sandi Moss
text: Horrible! Worst place to ever go!!!! I was charged for some procedures twice one procedure I didn't need at all! I wear a medical bracelet AND my file list my allergies in BOLD LETTERS and the dentist completely overlooked it proceeded to touch me. Ihad to leave and spend 2 days in the hospital because my throat began to close! I DO NOT ADVISE ANYONE TO GO HERE AT ALL!

name: Kat Robison Hasani
text: Waited over an hour and after showing up early and still hadn’t seen the actual dentist and they couldn’t even say when the dentist would be in. We left. Worst dental experience ever.

name: Ashley Delahanty
text: I'm 30, I've had a lot of dental work in my life and the oral surgeon is the first to actually make me cry. She was so rough and to top it off, I still have pieces of tooth sticking out of my gum causing a lot of discomfort. My experience was so unpleasant, I don't even want to go back for her to check on it

name: Cheryl Farley
text: I have been a customer of Dr. White's for over thirty years.  I always refer people looking for a dentist. Also my dental hygienist Montana and Dr. White really care about they patient's. 👍

name: Shalandra Washington
text: Ms. Anita is awesome. This last visit was great and very timely.

name: Natalie Davis
text:
Normally I go to the dentist at home but it was an emergency. I woke up one morning with a lot of pain and swelling. I went in and they gave me some antibiotics and ask I return to have the tooth fixed on completion of my antibiotics. The service from this visit was great!
I returned on completion of my antibiotics and that's when the trouble started. They decided I needed to get a root canal on the tooth. It was still very sensitive and painful. The hygienist was very general when taking x-Rays and getting me into my room. The dentist came in and put a bit of numbing medication on my gums. The shot was done before the gum was numb and he started the dental work before the tooth was numb. He would not stop no matter what the hygentist or I did. I walked out of the office in tears and it wasn't until I got to my car the full effect of the numbing medication kicked in. The office staff and hygentist all seemed very upset about how the doctor did this. Needless to say I did not return to have my permanent crown done at this office and for purposes of all emergencies will seek care elsewhere!

name: Alden Ammons
text: Really slow, expect to wait an hour, even when you have a scheduled appointment !

name: Pierre Tubbs
text: False Advertising THE RECEPTIONIST TURNED ME AROUND AT THE DOOR..they DO NOT ACCEPT WALK-Ins

name: Michael Lindsey
text: They are expensive, unorganized, unprofessional and SLOW!

name: Amy Ervin
text: I am not a fan of going to the dentist, but this is, hands down, the BEST PLACE to go for family dentistry.  Dr. Skalnik and his staff ALWAYS go that extra mile to get to know their patients, check in on them after a visit, call, text, email with reminder updates for the entire family.  Dr. Skalnik does excellent work as well.  DENTAL CARE SOUTH is the BEST!!!!!!!!!!

name: Tracy Turner
text: Dr Skalnik and everyone that works there are super nice and very professional!!

name: Kanesha Hood
text: My family and I have been patients at Dental Care South for several years. We have always received great dental care.  Dr. Skalnik and his staff are very kind and go out of their way to make every experience great.  I highly recommend!!!!!

name: Darryl Lovell
text: The best customer service from Dentist and staff alike who know every customer by name and treat them like family.

name: Mark Christensen
text: Fantastic. Very caring. Up to date. Highly recommended.

name: Dr. Brent Tidwell
text: Awesome Dentist, very gentle!

name: Brandi Graham
text: I highly recommend Northcutt Dental in Bay Minette, they thoroughly explained my treatment plan and gave me several options as well. The staff is very courteous and friendly.

name: Bobbie Caraway
text: I love Northcutt! I love Dr Peterson! Dr Peterson makes you feel comfortable. The whole atmosphere at Northcutt is like no other to me. Super nice people!

name: Brenda C
text: The staff was so friendly. I am a very nervous & anxious person but they were so sweet & understanding.  Dr. Peters was awesome.  This was the first time I have been to the dentist ever & had NO pain. She is the best. I would definitely recommend!!

name: Troy Mims,Sr
text: Very professional and Very good customer service. I came from Florida to Bay Minette for care at this location. The doctor has a excellent bedside manner,  she cares ,she is Good, she helps as much as she can... I am very happy and I highly recommend  NORTHCUTT Dental #1.😁❤️🙏✌🏽

name: Glenda Averett
text: I was treated very nice by all staff. And was satisfied with the dental work.

name: sneerious grinch
text: The staff at this dental practice are all beyond amazing. Everyone is very professional and  very organized. I was given a very clear explanation of pricing and procedure. The women up front as well as the techs in the back were very knowledgeable and extremely patient with my dumb questions. The dentist, Dr Peter's is a master at dentistry. She was very thorough with everything and confident in her work. It is obvious she has a passion for what she does. The quality of care that was provided was absolutely outstanding. Any fears I had about having dental work done are gone and I actually look forward to going back. The peace of mind from knowing you are getting the best is worth every penny. I would highly recommend this dental practice to everyone.

name: Tee Huff
text: THIS IS THE BEST DENTAL OFFICE TO COME TO IN BALDWIN COUNTY!! LOVE THE STAFF FROM THE FRONT DESK,  DENTAL ASSISTANTS, & TO THE DENTIST! 😍

name: Deidra Edington
text:
Awesome staff! The assistant went out of her way to be sure I was comfortable! She went as far as singing a song for me!

Seriously though, great staff and I was in and out!

name: Mark Whittington
text: I am pleased with Northcutt Dental in every way. From the moment you arrive you are treated with great care that is personal and professional.

name: Caroline McConathy
text: Highly recommend Dr. Schneider in Bay Minette. I didn’t even know he had given me a shot, when I had some fillings done. If you have to go to the dentist, go to him. The staff are warm and explain the costs to you upfront. Liz did a great job cleaning my teeth and it was painless.

name: Kellie Simpson
text: Truly the greatest dental visit my husband and I have ever had! The staff are very knowledgeable and go above and beyond to ensure you are comfortable and understand the treatment they will provide! We have always procrastinated dental visits, but thank goodness we no longer have to! We love Northcutt Dental Bay Minette!!! ♥️

name: Yvonne McWilliams
text: The staff was very polite from the time I walked in until the time I walked out...each and everyone

name: Brittany Tindle
text: Extremely friendly staff. The hygienist took her tome while cleaning my teeth, the dentist did a comprehensive exam of my teeth, and the office manager spent a great deal of time with me going over my treatment plan and costs associated. The entire process was excellent. I highly recommend this entire team. This is my second Northcutt location to visit. All I can say is that HR does a great job with hiring amazing employees.

name: James Mitchell
text: Extremely professional,  hospitable,  and careful.  Highly recommended.

name: Scher Hill
text: Wonderful Dental office! The staff was well-organized professional and continually made sure that I was comfortable and well taken care of. I definitely recommend Northcutt Dental!!!

name: jasmine hansell
text: Very helpful and friendly staff. They were very informative and went over all my options.

name: Jason Lyons
text:
Basically a doc-in-the-box for dentist

Told me one price for an exam and a range for pulling a tooth depending on how hard it was

Charged me more for the exam just to tell me they coulsnt do anything. Wont be back, shouldnt have paid this time

name: Martha Falk
text: My last visit for routine cleaning ended in pain after I can in with no problems.  After 1st followup visit .. pain meds & med rinse prescribed.. I had to return in week bc of continued pain.. My Oral surgeon recommended Antibotics...but Dr Peters would not prescribe.  What!😕

name: Roger Robison
text: Great group of professionals. Thanks for the wonderful care given.

name: Diane Williams
text: The staff at Northcutt Dental are some of the most professional and niciest people that I have ever met. Dr. Peterson  is such a caring professionalist.  She takes so much time with you and has such a great bedside manner. I am so glad to be part of the Northcutt Dental family of Bay Minette, AL. I know that I will be in great hands when it comes to my dental health.

name: Jeremy Mockmore
text: I was beyond pleased with the service at this office, the ladies that helped me showed excellent customer service and patient care was amazing. I’m a nervous wreck at the dentist but once my service was underway I was completely put at ease by how friendly and gentle they were. When I met the dentist she took her time explaining to me what my issues were and the best plan of action to take and why. I’ve never had a doctor of any kind do that for me. I will be returning for all future dental work and I’ve told others how great they treated me.

name: Kayland Lamar
text: Dr. Tucker and her dental assistant Kennedy did an amazing job working together during my procedure. They made me feel comfortable and provided me with a sense of security during the procedure. GO SEE DR. TUCKER! She is amazing! The staff is friendly and helpful!

name: Theresa Padgett
text: I hate going to the dentist,  and in fact avoided going for many years.  I've been using Northcutt dental for a number of years now.  Their staff is amazing, friendly,  courteous,  and patient.

name: Lee Walker
text: I absolutely love this dental practice!  Everyone here has made me feel so welcome.  I am impressed with the up-to-date technology they use also.  Their ability to handle so much in their office is also a plus....as well as their hours of operation.  You won't be disappointed! :-)

name: Anita Sigler
text: Excellent dental hygienist! She was very friendly and tentative! Did a great job with my cleaning!

name: Jamaica Jones
text: I’ve been going here for 2 years now and I absolutely love the service. I recently switched my children so they now go here too. They are very good at explaining everything in language you can understand. So glad I found them.

name: SHERRICK63
text: The entire staff is exceptional, They all work very well together, Great atmosphere. Everyone is very customer oriented and friendly. Twice i have gotten same day service when calling, And the staff met my appointment time with little to no wait. Dr. Knight has been great. He's very informative, friendly and professional.

name: Samantha Day
text: I had a tooth emergency and they were able to see me that day and worked quickly to figure out the problem. All of the staff was very nice and thorough!

name: Zack McGhee
text:
This may be unbelievable, but Northcutt Dental Practice is actually a pleasant place to visit.

I know, I know, what could be so pleasant about a dentistry practice? Everything, to be honest.

The staff are always pleasant and always have a smile ready. They're talkative, and will remember you after only 1-2 visits. Quite a difference from what you will probably find in other practices.

The people actually working on your teeth are very professional and knowledgeable. They know what they're doing and how to get it done with minimal pain. By far the best dental experience I've ever had (and I've had quite a few).

Gentlemen, take note: each and every woman there is a looker. That might not sway your opinion of this establishment, but hey, it doesn't hurt.

In short, Northcutt is the best dental practice around, and if you decide to get some work done, you'll do well to make an appointment with them.

name: Kathy Skipper Buckhault
text: The girls here are friendly,  courteous and treat you like family.   I would recommend Northcutt Dental Practice to everyone.  You can have late appointments, if needed.  I saw Dr. Spivey today and she was amazing.  My cleaning was done by Liz and she was so nice did a great job cleaning my teeth.  Can't wait until February!

name: Cranking Horses
text: Visited there for the first time this week and I have to say by far the best all around service I have ever received,From the time you walk in to the time you walk out everyone one of those young ladies was outstanding in there jobs.I highly recommend this place to everyone.(Island Man)

name: Mary Grace
text: Warm atmosphere !  when you walk in you're always greeted with a friendly smile. The receptionist at the front desk always greet you with welcome to North cut dentist. My two daughters feel very comfortable when they have to get dental work done.

name: Michell Mcmilian
text: They are so professional and nice. I will definitely be going back

name: Chasity Brown
text: The staff is amazing. They were very caring and had a wonderful bedside manner. Would definitely recommend you to use them.

name: Rebekah Tolin
text:
Don't expect pain relief after an extraction. Expect them to fix the complications? Nope. The dentist will call you in & slice on you more, charge money and tell you to put a cold compress on it.
This is bones being pulled from your skull.
Why are you making me suffer?
Don't go to this place.

name: Olivia House
text: I have been with this particular dentist office for 6-7 years now and have absolutely NO plans of changing. Liz is my hygienist, she is very gentle, caring and funny. I urge everyone to try this office for your next checkup, you won't regret it. By the way, you can watch tv while in the chair to ease your nerves and they also sell great prescription toothpaste at the front desk. :)

name: Shaun Livermore
text: Friendly, clean, and efficient office! Liz did a great job on my cleaning. Whitney was willing to joke around with us. Feels like visiting friends instead of the dentist office. Recommend giving them a try.

name: Pam Martin
text: Great place to have your dental care done. I love Liz, she’s my hygienist and does a great job. Bre and Dr Tucker were great today doing my temporary crown!

name: Miranda Bounds
text: The staff at Northcutt Dental consistently go above and beyond.  They are friendly, professional and are great at what they do.  The atmosphere is fresh and modern and very comfortable. My hygienist was the best and answered all of my questions and the Dentist was very thorough.  I highly recommend them.

name: Chasity Brown
text: The staff is amazing. They were very caring and had a wonderful bedside manner. Would definitely recommend you to use them.

text: Great place to have your dental care done. I love Liz, she’s my hygienist and does a great job. Bre and Dr Tucker were great today doing my temporary crown!

name: Ashley McMillin
text: The people there are warm and inviting, they explain everything their gonna do and give you a reasonable price in a comfortable environment. I would definitely recommend this place.

text: My Northcutt Dental visit was very good.  I had my teeth cleaned, and Liz did an excellent job.  She was very professional and thorough. I enjoyed meeting Dr. Crawford and know that she will do an excellent job on my dental work.

text: All of the staff at Northcutt Dental are very friendly and professional.  Everyone is very accommodating to my dental needs and happy to explain everything about services that need to be done.  I am always very pleased.  I would highly recommend this office to anyone looking for a new  dentist.

name: Ashley Odom
text: This place is amazing! Dr. Tucker is the sweetest and explains everything as she goes along. The dental assistants go above and beyond to make sure the patient is comfortable. I highly reccomend them!

text: They are so professional and nice. I will definitely be going back

name: Ruth Mezza
text: My visit today with northcut dental was excellent. I received excellent care with Dr Peters, and the staff as well. RAVEN IS so attentive at her job. Will continue to be a patient in the future.

name: Joe Perry
text: Super friendly and professional staff. Made sure I understood everything and was happy with all of the results.

name: Kym Coleman
text: First impression was a lasting impression!! Great service. Nice Staff. Clean and welcoming office. Liz you were great... Kym Coleman

name: Cindy Parsons
text: I’m totally terrified of the dentist and have been searching for a number of years for the right sympathetic dentist.  I have super sensitive teeth and the water, air, and the dental tools bring me to tears but the staff listened to my concerns and fears.  I recently had my first procedure and was more at ease the the Northcutt staff than I have been in years.

name: David Caldwell
text: Had a cleaning from Rhonda and it went great. She did an awesome job. I then had a crown prep and Raven was awesome and so was Meranda. They took great care of me and it was an excellent experience.

name: Brian Bfd
text: Minimal wait time, late afternoon appointments available, friendly staff, nice modern facilities and equipment along with a professional atmosphere.

name: charity maestas
text: Northcutt Dental of Bay Minette is simply the best dentist in town! I would highly recommend them for all your dental needs! The staff there are the friendliest and make you feel at ease while your at the dentist. They really care about their patients at Northcutt Dental!

name: Courtney Brown
text: By far the best dentist I've been too! Last visit Raven worked with me and she was awesome! So friendly and sweet! Highly recommend Northcutt Dental!

name: Ginger Boutwell
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. Reasonable cost.

name: Kimberly Glidewell
text: I love Northcutt Dental!  All the ladies are always do a great job and are always friendly and professional.  I really recommend them and can't imagine using anyone else!

name: Lechandra Fields
text: Hannah has excellent customer service. She helped me reschedule my appointment and Help me have a better understanding of my treatment plan.

name: Kristen Pickron
text: I've been here 3 times and have been happy every visit.I am absolutely terrified of going to the dentist but they were great.I haven't had to wait no more than 5 minutes to be called back each time.

name: Katelin Denton
text: I do not enjoy going to the dentist but NorthCutt Dental made my appointment go by very smooth and my nerves settle. Raven weaver kept me entertained and my mind was at ease. Because of this I am actually able to say " I enjoyed my visit to the dentist." They have an m amazing crew and it's great to see so many smiles.  Thank you, NorthCutt for the amazing visit.

name: Connie Wilson
text: I am so glad that we found this dentist office. Everyone that we came in contact with was so nice and helpful. It will definitely be our new dentist office. I would recommend them to everyone!

name: Garrett Stewart
text: This office was awesome. It will definitely be my new dental office. I'm so thankful that Raven referred me!

name: Diam0nd Sakura
text: I love this dentist office. The yare so professional and caring. I been afraid of the dentist, but not anymore thank to them..... and  the laughing gas. I've went to being scared to having braces on my teeth now thanks to the referral.

name: Tiz Day
text: Thank you Nortcutt Dental Practice for taking such good care of my family and our dental health.  The friendly staff was so patient and kind with my boys. It is so nice to have a family, friendly business in our a great city.

name: Jessica Allen
text: Love the doctor and the staff! They are so quick and efficient. Last time I was in, my appt was at 8, and I was out by 8:30! Will never have to find another dentist.

name: Kati Roberson
text: Words cannot express the wonderful experience here at Northcutt. From the moment you walk into the door or even a phone call you are instantly family. The doctors, is specially dr. Tucker, know exactly what they are doing to completely ease and take away any potential pain. As someone who has not been to the dentist in a long time and is scared of dentist. This is the perfect place. I swear they are magicians with how easily they fill cavities, clean teeth, and perform surgeries. Insurance or not this is the only place to get your teeth serviced.

name: Taylor Westwood
text: I got my teeth cleaned by Liz she was kind and gentle. Very professional great atmosphere. I love it there!

name: Felicia Amerson
text: Dr Tucker and staff go out of their way to give you the best care!!!

name: Kimberly Johnson
text: They greet u with a smile and are very friendly. The whole staff is great, makes me proud to have them as my dentist.

name: Tammy Butler
text: Amazing staff . Without a doubt the best dentist i ever been to.

name: Gene King
text: My experience at Northcut is always great. If you get Raven as your hygienist you'll get someone who is confident, professional & friendly - like all the rest of the staff at Northcut.

name: Jason Kolbe
text: Love my hygienist and the after 5pm appointments. The staff is always happy and smiling.

name: Will Carnley
text: Highly recommend this place for all of your dental needs! The staff is awesome!

I enjoyed the welcome atmosphere the employees are so nice as well as
Dr. West and Raven made the visit seem easy .Ms.Raven understood all my concerns.This is the first time in 30 years I have went to a new dentist I was well pleased with my experience. I plan to continue my dental needs at Northcut Dental in Bay Minette .
